title: Software Engineer
description:
Direct message the job poster from Sysdig

Susanna Firmo
Talent Acquisition Specialist at Sysdig - We are hiring!

Sysdig is the secure DevOps company, and we‚Äôre at the forefront of the container, Kubernetes, and cloud revolution. We are passionate, technical problem-solvers, continually innovating and delivering powerful solutions to confidently run cloud-native applications. Our consistent contributions to open source software projects reflect our commitment to the open cloud movement.

We value diversity and open dialog to spur ideas, working closely together to achieve goals. And we're a great place to work too ‚Äî we were awarded the¬†2021 Bay Area Best Places to Work Award from San Francisco Business Times and the Silicon Valley Business Journal. We are looking for team members who share our commitment to customers and are willing to dig deeper, understand problems and deliver innovative solutions. Does this sound like the right place for you?




Your Opportunity

As a Software Engineer, you will work end to end on our security side of the product, from architecting to delivery, creating new features and functionalities. You will work closely with our established engineering team located throughout the US and Europe, product team and customers. Sysdig is a high growth startup, and there will be significant expansion opportunities for this position. Our customer base is enlarging¬†fast and so is the scale demanded of our backend. As a consequence, we are adding new features to our secure product line and enhancing existing capabilities.




Your Responsibilities

You'll lead projects as part of this effort that will allow us to build services to help customers manage their infrastructure in a secure manner.
Work as a main point of contact and interface with various teams including Product, Frontend, Design, Customers and other stakeholders
Build distributed services which can consume and process billions of customer‚Äôs system events and network activity.
Put machine learning features into production
Handle security data on a daily basis across multiple platform tiers (Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, GCP)




Your Background

Prior experience building distributed services
Systems software experience including good understanding of system calls
Strong computer science fundamentals in design, data structures, and algorithms
Experience in Go is highly preferred
Experience in Java is a plus
Prior experience with AWS/GCP and building security products is a plus
Experience with Kubernetes is a plus
Startup / entrepreneurial experience is a plus
A positive ‚Äúcan do‚Äù attitude with the ability to articulate thoughts and ideas and see them to fruition
An appetite for varied data




Key Technologies

Go
Java
ElasticSearch
Redis
Postgres
Kafka/NATS
Linux




When you join Sysdig, you can expect:

Competitive salary

Generous monthly allowance that can be used for the following types of expenses: employee wellness, house cleaning services, home internet, phone expenses, office supplies, office furniture and more
Ticket restaurants
Fantastic office location in the heart of Brera district!

title: Data Strategy Consultant
description:
Why Accenture? To discover the energy and commitment we devote to our customers by transforming their working method with the most advanced technologies. At Accenture, you'll grow as a member of an international network. Each day, you‚Äôll make a difference using whatever makes you unique.

Data Strategy Consultant

Milano

Your challenges

Help our clients take faster and smarter decisions thanks to your analytically-informed delivery solutions and play a critical role in helping them tackle complex business issues. Your focus will be data and you will be able to define the best approach to reach the goal combining different technologies and skills.

Shape and design big data platform, the development of the data supply chain, the establishment of the data governance, and the definition of an analytics strategy to rotate their business and operating models towards a Data Driven Company.

Combining cutting-edge data management methods, technologies, big data and advanced analytics (Descriptive, Predictive and Prescriptive Analytics) and AI (Cognitive Computing, Machine Learning), you will be responsible for:



Deliver Analytics and Data Strategy projects by designing and developing strategies (across industries and market) to manage, transform and consume data in an effective way


Design operating model, roadmap and blueprint also in terms of organization structure, governance mechanisms, roles and responsibilities, processes and enabling capabilities and technologies


Define big data and analytics architectures and platforms


Implement data management and analytics programs, including data modeling, data supply chain, data governance, data management, MDM, data consumption and analytics


Articulate business cases to prove the business value of Analytics & Data strategy initiatives, prioritize identified use cases and shape an actionable roadmap



Innovation follows a path which you will help design at Accenture. You'll help customers identify goals and achieve them by guiding them through a technological transformation. Find out how your skills can make a difference by making new application solutions into reality ‚Äì just as our consultants did for Ducati https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=2&v=7Sc1575NBN4

Why we would choose you? The challenges you face reflect your ambitions; this is your chance. To stand out and face them in the best way you have:



Deep knowledge of big data and analytics architectures and relevant market solutions


Understanding of emerging technology trends (Big Data, API, RPA, AI‚Ä¶) and impact on both overall enterprise architecture and operating model


Good knowledge of IT and Digital Unit operating model and passion for technology and digital trends


Ambition and desire to shine in the newest strategic consultancy environment


Exceptional presentation skills ‚Äì ability to convey technology and business value propositions


Excellent leadership, communication (written and oral) and interpersonal skills


A Master‚Äôs Degree ranging from economics, engineering, statistics, mathematics, and computer science.


You speak and write English fluently


You love to share and learn different things


Every day is a new challenge for you and an opportunity to learn something new



Are you determined to face and beat off the challenges this role brings even if you don't have all the required qualifications? Apply and tell us how you can make a difference.

Unleash your talent and build your career with us. Visit our website and discover the FAQ section to better plan your application: https://www.accenture.com/it-it/careers/

title: Cybersecurity Researcher
description:
As Acronis is dedicated not just to Cyber Protection but to the general protection of its potential and current employees, recruitment and onboarding process are being held online during the current global COVID-19 situation.

Acronis leads the world in cyber protection - solving safety, accessibility, privacy, authenticity, and security (SAPAS) challenges with innovative backup, security, disaster recovery, and enterprise file sync and share solutions that run in hybrid cloud environments: on-premises, in the cloud, or at the edge. Enhanced by AI technologies and blockchain-based data authentication, Acronis protects all data, applications and systems in any environment, including physical, virtual, cloud, and mobile.

With dual headquarters in Switzerland and Singapore, Acronis protects the data of more than 5 million consumers and 500,000 businesses in over 150 countries and 20 languages.

Acronis brings advanced cyber protection solutions to web hosting providers and website owners. As a Cybersecurity Researcher at the global Cyber Protection Operations team, you will be fighting against modern web cyber attacks by comprehensive analysis of latest threats and creating security definition for Acronis products. As an expert in cyber threats you will participate in research, design and development of new cyber protection technologies.

Responsibilities

Perform research in some of the following areas of server and endpoint protection:

Vulnerability assessment and configuration assessment;
Network security, intrusion detection and protection, including web applications protection;
Prevention and detection of attacks that utilize malware/hacktools and targeting Linux/UNIX systems.
Develop, support and tune vulnerability, misconfiguration and threat detection rules.
Conduct online research of latest cyber threats and ensure it can be prevented/detected with existing technologies. Share research results in blogposts and articles.
Analyze suspicious scripts, traffic, websites and their contents both found "in the wild" or retrieved from customers, adding latest threat detections or fixing false alarms.
Design, develop and monitor automation scripts and pipelines to minimize manual efforts required from analysts/researchers.
Advise colleagues and customers about real-world attacks and the corresponding detection / prevention countermeasures.
SKILLS & EXPERIENCE:

3+ years of experience in a system administration / system or web development / security audits for some of the following: RHEL (CentOS) / Debian / Ubuntu;
Deep understanding of common cyber attack techniques and methods; network protocols; vulnerability and configuration assessment
Knowledge of Linux security subsystems, tools and conceptions, including logging abilities
Decent skills in configuring at least one of: web / application / database / mail servers running on Linux/UNIX
Good interpersonal, written and verbal communication skills
Upper-intermediate English
Would be a plus:

Technical security certifications like OSCP (the best choice) or CEH or proven experience in security assessments
Skills in configuring at least one of: web / application / database / mail servers running on Linux/UNIX
Practical skills in security scanners, vulnerability & configuration assessment tools, SIEMs, WAFs, traffic analysis software
Background in development security software or routine security task automation
Knowledge of OWASP methodologies
Skills in programming languages enough for fast PoC creation (Python, shell, etc.)
Decent experience with other UNIX operating systems
Knowledge of PHP v5+ language
Practice in reverse engineering and corresponding methods, techniques and tools
Some Machine Learning skills or wish to improve yourself in this area
Experience with virtualization, containerization and cloud technologies

title: Back-end Developer
description:
PLEASE NOTE: This position is based in our Swiss HQ in Mendrisio, Switzerland, just 7km over the border from Como, Italy. Mendrisio is easily commutable from Milan, Como, Varese or Lugano and Cloud Academy provides the train ticket for you and we‚Äôre happy to facilitate your relocation to this area if needed!

Cloud Academy is the leading digital skills development platform that enables every enterprise to become a tech company through guided Learning Paths, Hands-on Labs, and Skill Assessment. Cloud Academy delivers role-specific training on leading clouds (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform), essential methodologies needed to operate on and between clouds (DevOps, security, containers), and capabilities that are unlocked by the cloud (big data, machine learning).

Companies like Turner, Cognizant, SAS, and ThermoFisher customize Cloud Academy to contextualize learning and leverage the platform to assign, manage, and measure cloud enablement at scale. Now is your chance to join our talented team that delivers unparalleled educational content to developers worldwide!

We‚Äôre looking for a Back-End Developer to help us take our product to the next level. We move seamlessly from full-stack web development, to mobile, to deployment/scaling. This position will take ownership of how features are implemented, from user experience to backend, involving our web app, mobile app, APIs and backend infrastructure.You‚Äôll have an opportunity to make a large impact on the culture of our development team.

Our ideal candidate is a humble leader, equally capable of teaching and learning.

Responsabilities

Able to write well-structured, maintainable, idiomatic code with good documentation; unit tests for every feature, bug fixing and code reviews.
Communicate with the rest of the company (e.g. sales, marketing, UX, etc) to ensure the functionality you're implementing is what was intended.
Collaborate in a cross-functional team, including mobile developers, designers and product managers in order to quickly deliver new features.
Work closely with the Operations Team to ensure smooth deployments, ensuring that errors are logged with enough info to debug effectively.
Job requirements

Passion for coding, web technologies, and shipping features that drive users adoptionSolid experience in coding with backend programming languages, such as Python, Go, Java, NodeJS, C/C++, C#.
Experience with Python, Django, Celery or ORM is preferredSolid experience with relational database and with other type of databases (no sql): PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis is an advantageAdvanced knowledge and experience on modern web patterns: AJAX, RESTful APIs, SOA, WebSocket, client-side rendering, etc.
Understanding of client-side technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Web Components,Experience with distributed version control systems: mostly Git (Github and/or Bitbucket).
Familiar with cloud-oriented technologies: AWS, Google Cloud, Heroku, DockerFamiliar with cloud architecture patterns and best practices for designing highly available, scalable and secure systems.
Good level of English proficiency, both spoken and written.Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with a sense of urgency and integrity.
Bonus points

Passion for and experience in e-learning projects is a strong bonus.
Ability to find creative solutions to interesting problems
Benefits

Competitive compensation with an annual bonus potential. The salary range is determined by the level of engineer a candidate is assessed at, and we have a range for each level of engineer at the company. The salary for this position (Software Engineer II) is a minimum of 50,000 CHF, plus an annual bonus of up to a 10% of the salary.
Train ticket paid for by the company
Budget for professional development
4 weeks paid vacation per year
17 paid holidays per year
Remote working policy including 1 month a year of remote working from anywhere
Great company culture and work environment!
Highly-skilled teammates and lots of opportunities for growth and development!
Relocation bonus

:

title: Internship Operations, Milan
description:
We believe in a future where inner cities are free of cars, congestion and pollution. By offering our dockless electrical scooters and bikes as convenient alternatives for short-distance travel, we believe we can make that future possible. Our mission is to free our cities with clean rides for everyone in Europe and beyond.

Founded in Europe, Dott is comprised of a highly experienced team of inquisitive minds in mobility and tech. What we do today has a tangible impact on tomorrow. We reached our in-house sustainability target of 100% renewable energy, and ensure equitability in our communities through collaborating with city charities, officials and safety boards.

What You'll Do

Help us to develop, improve and optimise processes;
Work on recruitment, formation and management of our local teams;
Monitoring and follow daily KPI‚Äôs to manage the operations, and work continuously on improving those;
Organise scheduling, attendance, and general administration of your operations team;
Oversee operations in the warehouse from facilities and vehicle upkeep to workplace safety;
Have an overview of the inventory and logistics;
Be in touch with other operating local teams;
Own special projects.


What You‚Äôll Need

You speak fluent Italian and English;
A great mix between ‚Äúground-work‚Äù and analytics skills;
Initiative spirit, with a capacity to innovate;
A results-oriented culture and a tireless determination;


The Details

6 months internship, based in Milan, Italy
Competitive monthly salary
Starting as soon as possible
A stimulating environment in a booming company
Hiring opportunities at the end of the internship


What‚Äôs in it for me?

Alongside a competitive compensation plan, we invite our employees to participate in our stock option plan. You‚Äôll be part of a collaborative, energetic and international team who enjoy the perks of flexible working hours, medical insurance contribution and fun company events.

At Dott, we are passionate and challenge each other to deliver on our dreams. We constantly perfect our craft. We own our mission and keep pushing for the company, cities and planet. On that note, be prepared to take on exciting challenges. We operate a consumer service that sees millions of transactions every week. Our operations services are backed by deep machine learning, and our large fleet of vehicles features its own hardware and embedded software challenges. You‚Äôll get to see it all, so come along for the ride.

Closing & equal opportunities employer statement

Come as you are

Dott is an equal opportunities employer. We invest in diversity, ensure equality and encourage expression. We have a zero-tolerance policy for harassment, bias or discrimination towards applicants and employees.

Want to join us for the ride? Let‚Äôs do this right ‚Äì together.

title: Credit Risk Analyst
description:
Societ√†

Banca Mediolanum

Posizione

Credit Risk Analyst

Responsabilit√† primarie

La risorsa sar√† inserita nell‚ÄôUnit√† di Credit Risk Management e si occuper√† principalmente della definizione e gestione del modello di controllo relativo al Rischio di Credito per il business del credito al consumo.

Principali Attivit√†

Sviluppo, monitoraggio e backtesting dei modelli statistici di probabilit√† di default e delle politiche creditizie utilizzate nel processo di erogazione.
Monitoraggio andamentale del portafoglio crediti: definizione, implementazione e gestione dell‚Äôattivit√† di reporting periodico verso il Top Management e le Autorit√† di Vigilanza.
Controlli di secondo livello in tema di qualit√† degli asset, coerenza delle classificazioni, congruit√† degli accantonamenti e adeguatezza del processo di recupero utilizzando il DWH aziendale.
Definizione e calcolo degli indicatori di Risk Appetite Framework, stima prospettica nei processi di budgeting e stress-testing, con particolare riferimento al costo del rischio di credito.
Applicazione del framework metodologico IFRS 9 per il calcolo dell'Expected Credit Loss.
Analisi normativa, aggiornamento delle Policy interne e definizione, in collaborazione con le strutture di primo livello, dei processi aziendali per la gestione del rischio di credito (erogazione, monitoraggio e recupero).

Profilo competenze

Per essere il candidato ideale, sono richieste le seguenti caratteristiche:

Esperienza di almeno di almeno 3/4 anni di esperienza nell‚Äôarea Credit Risk Management di realt√† bancarie, finanziarie o consulenziali;
Formazione universitaria in discipline economiche/scientifiche (Economia, Statistica, Matematica, Fisica, Ingegneria Gestionale, Informatica) e con una formazione di base quantitativa;
Esperienza pregressa nell‚Äôambito del business del credito al consumo con particolare riferimento allo sviluppo e all‚Äôimplementazione delle scorecard di accettazione: la conoscenza e l‚Äôapplicazione degli algoritmi di machine/deep learning costituiscono titolo preferenziale;
Ottima conoscenza di Microsoft Office (Excel e Power Point) e dei linguaggi di programmazione quali SAS ed SQL come requisiti minimi, Python, R, ecc;
Conoscenza della normativa comunitaria e nazionale e predisposizione all‚Äôaggiornamento continuo;
Conoscenza della lingua inglese;
Interesse per le nuove tecnologie, l‚Äôinformatica e la statistica.

title: Digital Functional Analyst
description:
Direct message the job poster from AGS S.p.A - Advanced Global Solution

Serena Larghi
Corporate Human Resources

AGS S.p.A. √® una societ√† leader nel settore della tecnologia in Italia da pi√π di 20 anni.




Ogni giorno in AGS Spa raccogliamo le sfide delle Digital Transformation. Guidiamo il cambiamento progettando soluzioni innovative ed erogando servizi tailor-made ad alto valore aggiunto. Formazione e ricerca sono i pillar del nostro approccio al lavoro.




Entra nel team di AGS nella divisione¬†Consulting¬†dove governiamo oltre 247 progetti su differenti temi. Farai parte di un ambiente dinamico, seguirai i singoli progetti a 360¬∞ e avrai al tuo fianco un Manager che ti accompagner√† nello sviluppo delle tue competenze e conoscenze.







Opportunit√†




All‚Äôinterno della nostra divisione Consulting siamo alla ricerca di un Digital Functional Analyst per clienti leader nel settore Finance.




Il candidato ideale ha maturato esperienza nel ruolo di Analista Funzionalematurata in contesti strutturati fortemente orientati alle iniziative digital

¬†

Il candidato si occuper√† delle seguenti attivit√†:

Raccolta requisiti e stesura di analisi funzionale dettagliata
Analisi di requisiti desiderati lato Business e analisi delgli impatti sui sistemi
Redazione dei documenti di analisi funzionale di dettaglio¬†e dell‚Äôarchitettura applicativa (data flows e sequence diagram per le integrazioni)¬†
Relazione con le diverse Business Unit per il raffinamento dei requisiti e la negoziazione tra BU e team tecnici
Review requisiti e del design UX/UI, coordinamento incontri di approfondimento, analisi di fattibilit√† con i team tecnici¬†




Requisiti:

Laurea magistrale preferibilmente in Economia, Ingegneria gestionale, Ingegneria matematica e/o ad indirizzo digitale

Esperienza di almeno¬†4 anni in progetti inerenti a tematiche legate preferibilmente alle tematiche dei pagamenti

Conoscenza della metodologia di sviluppo applicativo (Agile, SCRUM)

Redazione di documenti di analisi funzionale e tecnica e di formalizzazione di concetti tecnici e funzionali in presentazioni PPT o documenti formali

Esperienza professionale maturata con metodologia Scrum/Agile

Approccio analitico

Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese




Hard Skill:

Website e mobile App (con competenze frontend, backend, CMS, integrazioni e processi); conoscenze teoriche/funzionali di elementi applicativi (web server, application server, data base, Json, WSDL)

Soft Skill:

Ottime capacit√† di relazione, capacit√† di interfacciarsi con il Business e IT
Ottime capacit√† di rispetto delle scadenze




Cosa offriamo:

Inserimento in un team giovane e internazionale
Ingaggio su progetti stimolanti ad alto contenuto innovativo per primarie aziende
Crescita professionale ed economica commisurata alle competenze acquisite
Welfare¬†aziendale (Smart Working, assistenza sanitaria, orari flessibili, mensa aziendale, convenzioni‚Ä¶)
Corsi di formazione in aula/online all‚Äôinterno del programma AGS Academy e percorsi di certificazione e di sviluppo professionale
¬∑Tiplogia contrattuale: assunzione con contratto a tempo indeterminato




In AGS consideriamo la¬†formazione¬†delle nostre risorse come¬†motore di crescita¬†e di nuove idee. Un investimento continuo per l‚Äôinnovazione e lo sviluppo. Chi entra a far parte di AGS entra in un network di crescita personale e professionale continua e in un ambiente di lavoro altamente stimolante ed innovativo composto da centinaia di talenti.

AGS ACADEMY¬†realizza decine e decine di corsi per aggiornare e ampliare le competenze dei nostri specialisti; programmi strutturati di aggiornamento e specializzazione, che possono arrivare fino alla Certificazione presso enti terzi.

I corsi di AGS Academy vengono tenuti in¬†due modalit√†: ‚Äúin aula‚Äù presso le nostre Sedi e ‚ÄúCorsi Smart‚Äù, che possono essere fruiti dove e quando si preferisce, in completa autonomia anche da Smartphone o Tablet.




ABOUT AGS

AGS S.p.A. oggi √® composta da Business Unit che lavorano in sinergia per offrire soluzioni all‚Äôavanguardia su varie aree di competenza:

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Consulting:¬†da anni collaboriamo con i¬†Big Player¬†del mercato di varie industry (Banking, Telco, IT, Automotive, Pharmaceutics ), confermando e rinnovando la nostra partnership ormai pluriennale.

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Software Factory:¬†all‚Äôinterno del nostro HQ realizziamo prodotti, soluzioni e servizi per grandi clienti. La nostra Factory √® composta da vari professionisti nel mondo dello sviluppo divisi per competenze verticali. Sempre all‚Äôavanguardia in ambito tecnologico, abbiamo integrato le aree di:¬†Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Artificial Intelligence e CP7.

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Produzione:¬†dopo anni di Ricerca e Sviluppo, abbiamo creato nuovi materiali (Polimetilmetacrilato, Acrilico, Azanite) ottenuti attraverso cicli produttivi ad energia pulita, innovativi ed ecofriendly, adoperati nella riqualificazione energetica e nella realizzazione delle facciate termoventilate.

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Real Estate e Facility Management:¬†nel 2020 abbiamo creato la divisione AGS Real Estate per andare incontro all‚Äôesigenze del mercato. Formata da pi√π di 50 architetti e ingegneri, uniamo le nostre varie anime per sviluppare soluzioni di efficientamento e riqualificazione di immobili.

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Robotics & Automation:¬†l‚Äôesperienza consolidata da AGS in oltre 20 anni ci ha portato a creare macchine all‚Äôavanguardia diverse dalle altre presenti sul mercato. L‚Äôutilizzo di materiali innovativi e le migliori competenze IT, ci hanno permesso di affermarci in contesti Business e Medicali grazie alla realizzazione di¬†IdeaHub¬†e¬†UVC-O3¬†Sterilizer.

La nostra Vision

Aumentare la leadership tecnologica, investendo nelle competenze nei settori pi√π all‚Äôavanguardia dell‚ÄôIT, anticipando l‚Äôevoluzione dei mercati e rispondendo alle richieste dei clienti.

La voglia di osare e l‚Äôabilit√† di plasmarsi a un mercato in continua evoluzione hanno portato AGS ad effettuare continui e importanti investimenti in Ricerca & Sviluppo in nuove aree, fra cui Artificial Intelligence, Machine e Deep Learning, IIoT (Industrial Internet of Things), Monomer & Polymer Synthetic Surfaces e Building & Lighting Automation.

I nostri Valori

Progettiamo innovazione. Creiamo prodotti originali, nati dalla ricerca e dalle tecnologie di ultima generazione, che si distinguono per funzionalit√†, usabilit√† e innovazione.

Soluzioni IT sempre un passo avanti. Offriamo Consulenza, Progetti, Servizi e Soluzioni IT mirati alla creazione di valore nei processi delle aziende.

Innovazione,¬†Tecnologia,¬†Ricerca & Sviluppo¬†sono i nostri valori distintivi. Con spirito innovatore abbiamo diversificato le attivit√† aziendali, raggiungendo livelli di eccellenza nei settori dove operiamo.

title: Global FP&A Analyst
description:
Scelte Strategiche, Search & Selection firm, is selecting a Global FP&A Analyst for a leading multinational company (job location: Milano).

¬†

The role is part of the Global FP&A Supply Chain team which partners the Global Supply Chain Heads as far as financial processes and business performance are concerned.

The role reports to the Global FP&A Logistics and Procurement Director who in turn reports to the Global Supply Chain FP&A Director.

¬†

Key Responsibilities and Activities

The Global FP&A Analyst is the finance business partner of the Global Procurement Director and in conjuction with the Global FP&A Logistics and Procurement Director is responsible for:

¬†

Global Procurement Strategic Plan partnership on the management of the Finance portion and subsequent facilitation with relevant stakeholders
Definition, in cooperation with the business leaders, of the Budget targets and objectives
Coordinating and recommending the Regional SC FP&A in order to monitor performance, analyse variances and identify and address corrective actions
Supports and contribute to business decision making around overall and regional procurement network strategy and design with appropriate financial performance analysis
Defining operational KPI‚Äôs and consequent monitoring

Supporting the overall Global Supply Chain FP&A, he/she is in charge of planning and reporting activities such as:

GSC budget and RB‚Äôs process coordination and data consolidation
GSC actual results reporting process management and data consolidation with focus on variance analysis and corrective actions identification and guidance, in coordination with the full SC FP&A team

Experience in consumer goods industries preferred

Technical Skills

Pragmatic and hands-on approach, team player, able to effectively influence counterparts / stakeholders within a multi-cultural context. Problem solving skills, strategic thinking and international mindset complete the profile.

¬†

title: Backend Engineer
description:
TrueLayer‚Äôs Data Products team builds products that reduce the friction and cost involved in financial transactions, using data. Our data products power many of the most widely-used fintech apps in Europe today ‚Äî from personal budgeting tools to online lending to onboarding for all kinds of companies. We do this by allowing clients to retrieve financial data securely and quickly, with millions of API calls being made every day.

In 2020 we doubled the number of our connections to financial institutions across the UK and Europe. As we continue to grow, we're looking to find new ways to help our clients provide a first class experience for their users. To do this we‚Äôre continuing to optimise machine learning models models trained on millions of rows of transaction data, scale services that process millions of API calls every day and improve our frontend components so that hundreds of thousands of users can easily connect their accounts every day.

To achieve this we use best-in-class technologies including C#/.Net Core for development, Docker containers orchestrated with Kubernetes, AWS cloud infrastructure, ElasticSearch, Prometheus for observability, RabbitMQ, Redis, Postgres and more.

Who We Are

At TrueLayer, we build intelligent financial infrastructure that puts fintech at people's fingertips.

Businesses use our global network, built on open banking and PSD2, to securely access financial data and enable instant payments. Headquartered in London with offices in Milan, Dublin, Sydney, and Hong Kong, we‚Äôve raised $142M to date and we‚Äôre trusted by some of the biggest names in tech, including Revolut, Trading 212, and Zopa.

We are systems builders, design thinkers, product crafters and committed doers. We work in a collaborative, transparent environment where people can be their true selves, embrace ownership and accountability, and build something that will define an industry.

Our vision is to create a financial ecosystem that is open to everyone. We‚Äôve grown from a UK leader in 2020 to a global provider in 2021, operating in 12+ countries. The thing is, we're just getting started‚Ä¶

As a Backend Engineer, you will

Help design, build and maintain TrueLayer‚Äôs API products and associated services, delivering features that impact thousands of users
Build new product features, from breaking down requirements, to planning tasks, and shipping to production rapidly and regularly
Help make our platform globally scalable, reliable and available
Share knowledge and proactively identify process and tooling improvements, raising the bar for engineering across the organisation
Contribute to our culture and help make sure TrueLayer remains an exceptional place to work


Voluntary On-Call Duty

While being on call is a fantastic learning experience, we understand being on call out of hours is not for everyone, so at TrueLayer it‚Äôs voluntary. If interested, you can train with, and join, our on-call rota, which will involve compensated rotations of

Being On-Call to respond to critical incidents affecting the availability of our platform
Identifying, mitigating and resolving root causes of such incidents
Coordinating our response to potentially major incidents, and being an active voice in postmortem/root cause analysis discussions to prevent future problems.



Requirements

You‚Äôll need to demonstrate

Experience with C#, especially .NET Core
Understanding of SOLID and other common design patterns
Familiarity of API design and experience with at least one web framework
Understanding of Object‚Äìrelational mapping technologies
Appreciation of challenges surrounding microservices architecture
Familiarity with testing best practices - TDD, Unit Testing and Integration Testing, etc.
Experience with observability and alerting of mission-critical distributed systems


We‚Äôd be particularly excited if you have

A solid grasp of SQL and efficient use of caching
Understanding of Protocol Buffers, gRPC, and message queue systems



Benefits

What you can expect from us

Competitive salary and meaningful equity in the company üí∞
Flexible hours ‚åõ and remote work üè°
Choice of Linux or Mac technology üíª
A remote-working stipend to help set up your home office üí∫
Flexible holiday policy ‚úàÔ∏è
Generous parental leave üë©‚Äçüë©‚Äçüë¶
Private Health Insurance üßëüèΩ‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è
12 fully-paid Wellbeing Days a year (on top of the holiday allowance) üïäÔ∏è
Membership of mental wellbeing platform Spill üßòüèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
Learning & development allowance üìö


Inclusion & Diversity

At TrueLayer, we don‚Äôt just do inclusion and diversity. We embrace people that have different opinions, perspectives and personalities. Because we believe that by seeing the world from all sorts of angles, we can make life better for all the people who live in it. So we want you to know that the things that make you, you ‚Äî like your age, ability, background and identity ‚Äî are things that we celebrate and support. All we ask is that you believe in what you do (And know what an API is).

title: Sustainability Data Specialist - Milan
description:
Capabilities

Big data & advanced analytics, Sustainability, Technology & digital

Industries

Automotive & Mobility, Biopharmaceuticals, Consumer products, Education, Energy & environment, Engineered products & infrastructure, Financial institutions, Health care payers & providers, Insurance, Media & entertainment, Medical devices & technology, Metals & mining, Private equity and principal investment, Process industries & building materials, Public sector, Retail, Social sector, Technology industries, Telecommunications, Transportation, travel & tourism

Who We Are

Boston Consulting Group partners with leaders in business and society to tackle their most important challenges and capture their greatest opportunities. BCG was the pioneer in business strategy when it was founded in 1963. Today, we work closely with clients to embrace a transformational approach aimed at benefiting all stakeholders‚Äîempowering organizations to grow, build sustainable competitive advantage, and drive positive societal impact.

Our diverse, global teams bring deep industry and functional expertise and a range of perspectives that question the status quo and spark change. BCG delivers solutions through leading-edge management consulting, technology and design, and corporate and digital ventures. We work in a uniquely collaborative model across the firm and throughout all levels of the client organization, fueled by the goal of helping our clients thrive and enabling them to make the world a better place.

Practice Area Profile

BCG GAMMA combines innovative skills in computer science, artificial intelligence, statistics, and machine learning with deep industry expertise. The BCG GAMMA team is comprised of world-class data scientists and business consultants who specialize in the use of advanced analytics to get breakthrough business results. Our teams own the full analytics value-chain end to end: framing new business challenges, building fact-bases, designing innovative algorithms, creating scale through designing tools and apps, and training colleagues and clients in new solutions. Here at BCG GAMMA, you‚Äôll have the chance to work with clients in every BCG region and every industry area. We are also a core member of a rapidly growing analytics enterprise at BCG - a constellation of teams focused on driving practical results for BCG clients by applying leading edge analytics approaches, data, and technology.

Position Profile

What You'll Do

We‚Äôre looking for a passionate and talented Sustainability Data Specialist to join our rapidly growing SIGMA team. In this role, you‚Äôll have the chance to roll up your sleeves and work on real-world business situations with a data-driven approach, focusing on sustainability topics with our clients and global partners. Your core focus will revolve around major data topics such as carbon emissions accounting, target reduction setting, reduction initiative identification and roadmap design. You will also be able to work on Sigma‚Äôs internal initiatives (tool development, public reports creation etc.). Successful candidates are intellectually curious builders who are biased toward action, scrappy, and communicative. You will also get the chance to travel: we have clients in New York, Paris, Stockholm, Peru‚Ä¶ Make sure your passport is ready to go!

Who You Are. You

What You'll Bring (Experience & Qualifications)

Have a deep understanding of global sustainability topics, with a strong general knowledge of the ecosystem, ideally from a data/quantitative perspective
Are able to explain sophisticated concepts in an understandable manner to audiences with various levels of knowledge on sustainability
Can create complex quantitative models on sustainability topics (e.g. carbon accounting) and present them with clear and understandable visualizations
Are at ease handling large amounts of data from various sources, with variable levels of cleanliness and granularity (collecting, aggregating, cleaning, imputing, transforming etc.). Knowledge of a scripting language is a plus (Python, R)
Are comfortable in a client-facing role with the ambition to lead teams, with project management skills and are able to work on multiple projects simultaneously
Display genuine interest for other social impact topics, ideally with volunteering experience

Job Requirements

Master‚Äôs degree in Business or Engineering with 5 ‚Äì 7 years of experience in sustainability consulting (i.e. Carbone4, Quantis, PwC), preferably with a quantitative profile
Prior knowledge of carbon measurement tools, data sources, manipulation and protocols (GHG, CDP, ADEME)
Prior knowledge of other sustainability topics (energy, water, biodiversity etc.) is a plus
Prior experience in mobility / energy / industrial sectors, experience in chemical sector is a plus
Excellent problem solving, data manipulation and presentation skills
Strong record of extracurricular activity, professional accomplishment, and leadership
Fluency in English and local office language is required
Strong scientific and technical appetence in Data Science and Visualisation tools is a plus

Work Environment

Fast-paced, intellectually intense, service-oriented environment
Position is located in either Paris, London, Germany, Nordics, Warsaw, Milan, Zurich or Madrid

title: Technology Partner Architect
description:
Introduction

Technology Partner Architects (TPA) are the technical experts and advisors to IBM sales teams and Business Partners. As a TPA, you understand the partner's business requirements, technical requirements, and competitive landscape. You apply your business and technical insights to build, and maintain partner relationships, leveraging IBM Cloud and Data Platform software into client-valued solutions and ensure client readiness for production release. This is an opportunity to shape the future for both IBM and its partners. Start your journey now!

IBM Ecosystem is getting an incresingly important role in the go to market strategy and we need to find a professional which helps us to develop business initiative with our Partner networs in the area of Data Science, Machine Learning and Aritificial Intelligence. The role has a strong content of Proof of Concept and Minimim Viable Product realizations.

Your Role and Responsibilities

IBM's Ecosystem is seeking a Technology Partner Architect. The candidate will provide technical sales support for their sales territory of Ecosystem Partners, supporting the IBM Cloud and Data Platform Software Portfolio. A self-reliant, technical leader with hands-on experience with Data and AI and Automation Technologies, is desired. Understanding of hybrid cloud deployment architectures and DevOps is important. Experienced technical professional who will deliver technology presentations, compelling demonstrations, proof-of-concepts, deep-dive discussions, and whiteboard sessions. The candidate will demonstrate the business value and technical strength of the IBM Software Portfolio to Independent Software Vendors, Cloud Service Providers and Managed Service Providers looking to integrate/deliver IBM software value add capabilities with their commercial solutions.

The successful candidate has technical sales, technical design, and solution delivery experience. They will collaborate with the IBM Ecosystem BUILD sales team to provide technical sales support to progress and close deals, while developing relationships with partners.

Required

Technical and Professional Expertise

BS in Computer Science/Computer Engineering, Science, Math or equivalent experience
At least 2-3 years of experience selling/implementing IBM Data and AI and/or Automation technologies
Experience with IBM Cloud IaaS & PaaS
Understand API models, XML, Web Services, RESTful Architectures
Knowledge and experience with Data Warehousing, and Data Lakes

Preferred Technical And Professional Expertise

2 years of experience in a direct customer-facing technical sales role
2 years of exp. developing with IBM Data and AI and/or Automation technologies
Experience with, and Understanding of Cloud Architecture and DevOps(Public, Private, Hybrid, Multicloud)
Knowledge in developing web applications using Javascript, modern JS libraries, HTML5, CSS3
Core enabling technologies on LUW like containers, networking, cluster computing, scripting languages like Python/JavaScript, and Java programming

About Business Unit

IBM has a global presence, operating in more than 175 countries with a broad-based geographic distribution of revenue. The company‚Äôs Global Markets organization is a strategic sales business unit that manages IBM‚Äôs global footprint, working closely with dedicated country-based operating units to serve clients locally. These country teams have client relationship managers who lead integrated teams of consultants, solution specialists and delivery professionals to enable clients‚Äô growth and innovation. By complementing local expertise with global experience and digital capabilities, IBM builds deep and broad-based client relationships. This local management focus fosters speed in supporting clients, addressing new markets and making investments in emerging opportunities. Additionally, the Global Markets organization serves clients with expertise in their industry as well as through the products and services that IBM and partners supply. IBM is also expanding its reach to new and existing clients through digital marketplaces.

Your Life @ IBM

About IBM

Location Statement

IBM wants you to bring your whole self to work and for you this might mean the ability to work flexibly. If you are interested in a flexible working pattern, please talk to our recruitment team to find out if this is possible in the current working environment.

Being You @ IBM

IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, pregnancy, disability, age, veteran status, or other characteristics. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

title: GAMMA Associate Director, Data Science in Financial Institutions
description:
Capabilities

Big data & advanced analytics

Industries

Financial institutions

Who We Are

Boston Consulting Group partners with leaders in business and society to tackle their most important challenges and capture their greatest opportunities. BCG was the pioneer in business strategy when it was founded in 1963. Today, we work closely with clients to embrace a transformational approach aimed at benefiting all stakeholders‚Äîempowering organizations to grow, build sustainable competitive advantage, and drive positive societal impact.

Our diverse, global teams bring deep industry and functional expertise and a range of perspectives that question the status quo and spark change. BCG delivers solutions through leading-edge management consulting, technology and design, and corporate and digital ventures. We work in a uniquely collaborative model across the firm and throughout all levels of the client organization, fueled by the goal of helping our clients thrive and enabling them to make the world a better place.

Practice Area Profile

BCG GAMMA combines innovative skills in computer science, artificial intelligence, statistics, and machine learning with deep industry expertise. The BCG GAMMA team is comprised of world-class data scientists and business consultants who specialize in the use of advanced analytics to get breakthrough business results. Our teams own the full analytics value-chain end to end: framing new business challenges, building fact-bases, designing innovative algorithms, creating scale through designing tools and apps, and training colleagues and clients in new solutions. Here at BCG GAMMA, you‚Äôll have the chance to work with clients in every BCG region and every industry area. We are also a core member of a rapidly growing analytics enterprise at BCG - a constellation of teams focused on driving practical results for BCG clients by applying leading edge analytics approaches, data, and technology.

What You'll Do

Are you interested in pursuing a successful career in a top strategic consulting firm? Would you like to interact with a global network and make the difference? Your skills and motivation are what we are looking for!

BCG Milan is currently looking for a Senior Professional to join our BCG Gamma Hub.

POSITION PROFILE

We are seeking a strong candidate with significant advanced analytics experience preferably into Financial Institutions field , to fill an exciting senior position within BCG Gamma. The Associate Director is expected to be recognized knowledgeable in data science and will manage a team of data scientists to build innovative new products and analytics solutions. He/she will show they can frame problems in a way that analytics team members can then execute to drive impact and results. Exceptional candidates will also show strong curiosity, going beyond the immediate case requirements to understand the fundamental drivers of advantage and look for clues that may change the basis of competition.

Associate Director will be involved in all aspects of advanced analytics, from helping to create relevant products and service offerings by working with priority global Practice Areas, to leading and executing analytics work and continuing to expand the analytical foundation and competitive value proposition. Strong candidates will be a thought leader in analytics methodologies and technologies ‚Äì they will be instrumental members of the team for designing and building new products mainly in Financial Institutions area.

In client contexts, the Associate Director will need to provide senior analytics project management oversight for large-scale efforts, including managing of external relationships and project budgets / timelines. At the client site, he/she will be responsible for a large portion of client relationship management for the analytics effort. He/she will also need to interact with client counterparts day- to-day to ensure expectations are aligned and that in-progress analysis and findings are tested. Where findings are controversial, a key role is to socialize the analysis and findings so that clients and members of the wider BCG team have the time to ask questions and identify issues prior to the formal presentation of findings.

Providing mentoring to analytics team members on both a formal and informal basis is also part of the role. Feedback and suggestions for development can occur at any time during a project. That said, each project starts with a formal identification of analytics team member development needs and an action plan for achieving them. Progress against this plan should be checked on a regular basis with specific, actionable feedback provided at frequent, regular intervals.

What You'll Bring (Experience & Qualifications)

10+ years of relevant professional experience in the Financial Institutions field , providing advanced analytics solutions. A consulting background will be considered a plus.
PhD or advanced degree required in a field linked to business analytics, statistics or geo- statistics, operations research, geography, applied mathematics, computer science, engineering, or related field
Fluency in Italian and in English is required
Looking for individuals with deep technical and data science expertise , acute strategic and analytical skills, ability to lead and persuade, drive and energy, and desire to work in a project-based environment on strategic issues.
Strong record of professional accomplishment and leadership.
Demonstrated ability to lead and manage projects and teams.
Proven ability to drive topics and make a commercial impact in the Financial Institutions field
Experience in core analytics methodologies: Strong expertise in core Data Science techniques, in Statistics, Machine Learning (supervised/unsupervised)/predictive modelling, optimization. Expertise on deep neural networks, NLP, image analytics, spatial analysis is a plus.

Key Competencies

Deep Technical and Data Science Expertise: The successful candidate will have a strong expertise in applying advanced analytics to a variety of business situations focussing on Financial Institutions. They will efficiently and effectively advise multiple teams on the best path to uncovering critical insights for clients and deliver impactful analytical solutions.

Experience in core analytics methodologies: Strong expertise in core Data Science techniques, in Statistics, Machine Learning (supervised/unsupervised)/predictive modelling, optimization. Expertise on deep neural networks, NLP, image analytics, spatial analysis is a plus.
Familiarity with technical & IT tools and analytics SW development: Knowledge of relevant programming languages (e.g., R/Python) and analytical libraries, Data access tools (e.g., SQL, Hadoop/Hive, Spark) and Visualization (e.g., Tableau, Dash). Understanding of modern IT landscape (containerization, and Public Cloud providers, ‚Ä¶) and best practices in SW development in analytics (code versioning, agile‚Ä¶). Experience in integrating analytical solutions in Corporate IT environments is a strong plus.
Experience in applied analytics in Financial Institutions: Outstanding experience building analytical solutions in the Financial industry, e.g.: Pricing, Customer value maximisation, Churn management, Cross/up-selling & Next best action, Operational effectiveness & automation, Branch network optimization. Cross-industry experience is a strong plus.

Analytical and Conceptual thinking : A successful candidate will be able to conceptualize business problems and drive frameworks for analysis that consultants can then follow. Principals will produce leading edge business models and must be able to work in a hypothesis-based environment where inductive rather than deductive thinking is the norm. Strong business focus with experience with 80/20 approaches.

Engagement Management and Team Leadership : The successful candidate will have demonstrated ability to manage engagements, client relationships, provide ‚Äúthought leadership‚Äù to teams, and ultimately be responsible for the quality of engagements. They must lead project teams in the design and development of innovative long-term business strategies for clients that maximize shareholder value. This individual will supervise junior consultants as engagements are executed, but must have the ability to ‚Äúdo the work‚Äù as well. Strong presence, strong collaborator and leadership skills and ability to operate effectively in a matrix organization are a must.

Client Relationship Management: The successful candidate will have a business focus and a solid track record of developing strong client relationships with large organizations. The candidate with have a demonstrated ability to communicate effectively and professionally with clients, delivering impactful solutions and presenting work in a concise and thoughtful manner, while demonstrating technical expertise (fluency in English is required). Also, begin deepening those relationships to think longer-term about growing BCG‚Äôs presence at these existing clients.

Analytics Innovation: Must be an autonomous self-starter with a passion for analytics and problem solving. He/she will help build new Analytics service offerings that grow our portfolio of products and will captures proprietary content as well as analytics insights to the knowledge infrastructure. The candidate will support the creation of proposal/selling documents and provide perspective on relevant Analytics value propositions.

Personnel Development: The successful candidate will have demonstrated ability to guide consultants in their consulting skill sets, motivate them, and build the company‚Äôs foundation for future growth. This will take place in both formal and ad-hoc settings.
WORK ENVIRONMENT:
Fast-paced, intellectually intense, service-oriented environment
Position is located in Italy Gamma Hub in Milan, but there will be plenty of chances for international exposure
Willingness to travel

title: Senior Analytics & Optimization Manager - Milan
description:
The Senior Analytics & Optimization Manager will play a key role in maintaining a portfolio of Analytics & Optimization clients‚Äô projects, either directly, or through advising others.

You will be responsible for leading the client data measurement, optimization and personalization strategy as well as the day to day management of assigned client accounts and planned campaigns, focusing on successful measurement insights discovery, measurement tracking implementation and optimisation of their marketing channels, journeys and web properties.

You will provide frequent input into Product design, Product evolution & evangelization, as well as liaise very closely with Directors and VPs on internal initiatives aiming to improve efficiency and quality of the work.

Last but not least, you will also be coaching and mentoring team members from both a strategic and technical point of view for Analytics and Optimization.

Responsibilities

Be a passionate subject matter expert on digital marketing, digital measurement, web analysis (inc. web analytics, app tracking, audience strategy, incremental revenue), Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO), Personalization and Usability and possess a strong understanding of the media ecosystem, particularly GMP and mainstream optimization and personalization platforms
Drive performance of analytics and optimization capabilities to impact overall business results
Provide support and mentorship for other members of the team, ensuring they are progressively able to take on more complex tasks and upskill others
Find opportunities for the business to cross-sell other services, including data analysis, attribution, ad-tech, CRM integration, marketing automation, UX, Visual Design, Development, QA, etc
Work closely with the Development, QA, UX, Design, Content and Project Management teams to strategize, ideate, define and run the planned projects and campaigns and to communicate strategy, progress and results
Work closely with Directors and VPs to establish specialisms goals and strategies, defining processes and frameworks

Requirements

What you‚Äôll need

Demonstrable experience with Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager, both web and apps, is required
Demonstrable experience with Google Optimize and/or other mainstream web & app Optimization and Personalization platforms (eg. Adobe Target, Evergage, Dynamic Yield, Monetate, Leanplum, Tune, Optimizely, Qubit, etc.)
Must have a fluent understanding of Google Marketing Platform, the key benefits and how to leverage the Google stack to the greatest advantage of clients
Deep, hands-on experience working with analytics and experience optimization solutions, ranging from auditing, campaign ideation, definition, setup, launch and reporting, measurement implementations, data analysis & insights, in-housing, presenting to large audiences and training
Strong experience in unearthing insights and forming optimization recommendations using heat-mapping, form analytics and live user testing
Experience with persona based marketing, UX methodologies and a good visual eye to detect what works well (and what doesn‚Äôt) in a brand‚Äôs journey
Strong analytical and visual thinking skills, with the ability to identify business questions, pain points and opportunities, analyse quantitative and qualitative data, prioritize findings using different models , and develop actionable recommendations and experimentation/personalisation roadmaps
Ability to clearly communicate processes, strategies and general requirements to both internal and external stakeholders
Able to manage projects and delegate seamlessly across multiple teams and regions, to ensure that all deliverables are as per Jellyfish standards and deadlines are met
Able to stay positive under pressure, teamwork with a diverse set of stakeholders and live Jellyfish‚Äôs values: be positive, be the solution, be passionate, be accountable, be you

Advantageous

Proficiency with Python/R or other scripting languages is highly desirable
Experience with Google Cloud Platform and BigQuery, ability to query large databases and write SQL queries
Experience with (and positive results from) running campaigns on other web and app experience optimization / personalization platforms besides Google Optimize 360 would be highly desirable
Knowledge and experience with recent Google technologies and tools such as Google Analytics for Firebase, App+Web properties and Google Ads Data Hub is a very big plus
Knowledge and experience with Machine Learning principles and Marketing theory is a big plus
Knowledge and experience with advanced segmentation analysis, session playback, lo-fi wireframing, treejacking, designing polls and surveys will be a big plus
Nice to have experience with the following: Adobe Marketing Cloud, Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Segment, Tableau and Looker

title: AI Expert | Artificial Intelligence Architect
description:
Job Description

In Avanade lavoriamo per fornire ai nostri partner le migliori soluzioni possibili, sfruttando al meglio le tecnologie pi√π all'avanguardia. In questa ottica, facciamo ampio uso di soluzioni AI ove queste diano un valore aggiunto per i nostri clienti, nell'automazione di processi che potrebbero altrimenti essere onerosi. Abbiamo un team specializzato in soluzioni di Artificial Intelligence e siamo alla ricerca di profili di livello che vadano ad arricchire il nostro set di competenze. Stiamo cercando un/a AI Solution Architect che si occupi di design, sviluppo e testing di progetti di Artificial Intelligence, con un particolare focus su chatbot e cognitive services.

Lavorerai in un team coeso, inserito in una realt√† multinazionale e multiculturale, con possibilit√† di crescita considerevoli e opportunit√† di apprendimento continue. Potrai confrontarti sia con i colleghi del team che con le diverse worldwide communities, accrescendo sia le tue competenze specifiche che le tue soft skills.

Questa √® La Tua Occasione Se Hai

consolidata esperienza in sviluppo BE con linguaggio C#;
esperienza di sviluppo di web API, con pattern asp.net MVC CORE e database relazionali (MS SQL Server);
esperienza di sviluppo di applicazioni web su Cloud Azure, in particolare:
Azure App Services
Azure Functions
Azure Blob Storage
esperienza in sviluppo FE con Javascript (Typescript) e almeno uno dei relativi framework (React, Angular 2+, Vue.JS);
esperienza di sviluppo solizioni Chatbot con Microsoft Cognitive Services e/o Bot Framework;
conoscenza di uno o pi√π database NoSQL (Mongo, Dymano, Cassandra, ....)

Per Via Del Ruolo Ricoperto, Saranno Inoltre Considerate Importanti

capacit√† di stimare e guidare attivit√† di pre-sales su soluzioni AI per progetti enterprise;
forte interesse nell'ambito Intelligence Automation e conoscenza di base del Machine Learning;
esperienza di team management su gruppi di lavoro di media/grande complessit√†;
predisposizione all'apprendimento e alla sperimentazione di nuove tecnologie (specialmente in ambito Microsoft)

In Avanade troverai un'azienda che investe sulla formazione. Per questo, oltre ad un programma completo di certificazioni Microsoft, offriamo un ampio pacchetto di benefit e un insieme di iniziative e servizi per rispondere alle esigenze professionali ed individuali di ciascuno. Farai parte di una community inclusiva e aperta, attiva in 20 paesi, e potrai confrontarti con professionisti provenienti da tutto il mondo. Avanade √® una Community Internazionale: la conoscenza dell'inglese, sia scritto che orale, √® un must.

Curiamo molto la crescita individuale delle nostre persone, per questo offriamo percorsi specifici, definiti col supporto di Career Advisor e supportati da una continua formazione, anche grazie alle partnership privilegiate con Microsoft.

Se pensi che questa possa essere l'opportunit√† giusta per te, come and join us!

#weareAvanade #AvanadeProud #Avanadefamily #orangefamily

About Avanade

Avanade leads in providing innovative digital services, business solutions and design-led experiences for its clients, delivered through the power of people and the Microsoft ecosystem. Our professionals combine technology, business and industry expertise to build and deploy solutions to realize results for clients and their customers. Avanade has 29,000 digitally connected people across 23 countries, bringing clients the best thinking through a collaborative culture that honors diversity and reflects the communities in which we operate. We welcome all, and seek talented individuals who can bring their whole self to work, build inclusive teams and encourage diversity inside and outside the organization. Majority owned by Accenture, Avanade was founded in 2000 by Accenture LLP and Microsoft Corporation. Learn more at www.avanade.com .

title: Sr. Backend/Python Engineer (London)
description:
Join us today and make a difference in people's lives!

The Senior Backend/Python Engineer is a unique opportunity and an exciting time to join the EPSY Team.

We are looking to hire in London but if you have an exceptional curriculum, live in an European location and for any reason are not able to relocate, we would like to hear from you anyway. We are willing to evaluate a remote position.

Epsy is a leading digital health platform, on a mission to accelerate the path to optimal treatment for everyone living with epilepsy. Winner of Google Material Design Awards 2020 and CES Innovation Awards 2021, Epsy is focused on incorporating the latest technologies and state-of-the-art data analysis into user-centric experiences, ultimately making life with epilepsy brighter for patients, their caregivers and healthcare professionals.

We‚Äôre looking for skilled and ambitious developers which are:

genuinely interested‚Äì motivated, as well as open to change and new challenges
eager to cooperate ‚Äì able to work in a group in order to achieve collective goals
strive towards professionalism ‚Äì focus on the highest level of their performance
effective ‚Äì able to handle complications and take advantage of beneficial circumstances
product and customer oriented ‚Äì care about long-lasting and rewarding relationships, are able to listen to and meet the expectations of our users

Your Role

work as a member of the team at every stage of software development life cycle - being capable of designing solutions, writing and testing application code and finally manage the deployment (with automated pipeline)
research and innovate during your day to day work ‚Äì gather and share knowledge
provide input and influence discussions around best practices and new technologies, helping us to develop an effective basis for future developments

You Will Work On

modern microservice architecture fully build on AWS stack with dozen of components like EventBridge, API Gateway, DynamoDB, Cognito, Amplify and AppSync etc.
data pipeline for gathering and processing high volume of the data collected from global network of IoT sensors ‚Äì including customer electronics
our Machine Learning platform implementation, build together with our Data Science engineers
global infrastructure managed with terraform and CloudFormation
our high performance internal and external APIs build with Serverless, Flask and Amplify frameworks

Required Skills

And Experience

5+ years of Python experience, building API powered solutions
good understanding of microservice architecture
experience with at least few common Python frameworks and libraries (flask, pyramid, bottle, celery, tornado, pandas...)
familiarity with API gateways, configuration, rate limiting
experience with client-server architecture using REST and GraphQL protocols
good knowledge of relational and non-relational databases (DynamoDB, PostgreSQL)
building, testing and deploying applications using Docker container on AWS ECS platform
building and deploying cloud native solution with AWS using SQS, SNS, EventBridge, Kinesis, API Gateway, Cognito just to name a few
understanding of continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) tools and systems (ideally if you can participate in continuous improvement of our delivery pipeline)

Desirable

Skills And Experience

managing AWS with infrastructure as code using terraform and CloudFormation
building and deploying services with Serverless framework (both APIs and async services)
multi-region, geo-distributed applications with performance, privacy and compliance management
web application security best practices (OWASP), nice to see some security testing experience
other backend / data processing languages knowledge ‚Äì Node.JS, TypeScript, PHP, GO, R
experience with designing and building distributed, event based solutions using message brokers and enterprise integration patters
experience in big data processing from set of IoT devices using AWS tech stack

If you would like to see what we use to power our amazing platform please visit: https://stackshare.io/epsy-health/epsy-health

Why work for Epsy?

Join our growing team of motivated and innovative individuals. Our friendly team encompasses experienced designers, app developers, product managers, marketeers, customer success managers and data analysts. At Epsy we pride ourselves on our all-team collaborative approach and actively encourage learning, whether it be in your speciality or simply an area you might like to learn about (examples include talks about Hedge Fund management and wine!). If you are looking to develop as a candidate in a supportive team who actively want to better the lives of millions of people, then Epsy is the place for you.

Here is an illustrative list of what you can expect at Epsy:

Engaging and multicultural work environment
Flexible work from home arrangements
Supportive senior leadership with a real positive and enthusiastic atmosphere throughout the company
Pension contribution
Cycle to work scheme
Private Medical Insurance/Eye Care
Employee Assistance Program (EAP): core resources available with additional access to discounted merchandise and a Wellbeing Assessment
Company Sick Pay
Life Assurance
Gym Membership
Company Shares purchase program
Long Service ‚Äì extra day off for each year of the service, after first one
Newest MacBook Pro and all software you need to work effectively
Opportunities to shine with our various collaborative team meetings
Lots of social events or virtual events (due to the current situation)

Our Commitment To Diversity & Inclusion

LivaNova values equality and celebrates diversity. We are committed to ensuring that our recruitment process is fair, transparent and free from unlawful discrimination.

Our selection process is driven by the key demands/requirements for the role rather than bias or discrimination on the basis of a candidate‚Äôs sex, gender identity, age, marital status, veteran status, non-job-related disability/handicap or medical condition, family status, sexual orientation, religion, color, ethnicity, race or any other legally protected classification.

Background Checks At LivaNova

This offer therefore, is contingent upon a clearance of such a background investigation and/or reference check, and can be rescinded, where permitted by local legislation, based upon data received in the background check and/or refusal to cooperate with or any attempt to affect the results of this check. title: Senior Software Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD
description:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of remote full-time jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Trilogy. Have you got what it takes?

If you are a high-performing software engineer looking to step up your career, we think it‚Äôs about time that you explore the possibility of writing code for a broad portfolio of 100+ products.

At Trilogy, you won‚Äôt be siloed to one single product or technology. Instead, you will have the chance to work with all the latest tooling and languages on a variety of products that encompass the full IT needs of enterprise customers.

If you are excited about technology advancements, especially cloud computing and machine learning, apply now. Join us and start pushing the limits of cutting-edge technology like DynamoDB, Lambda, RDS, AppSync and EventBridge.

What You Will Be Doing

Writing production-ready feature code for 100+ different software products, using different technologies, databases, and languages (especially Java, JavaScript, C#, or C++).

Examples of products we are working on include:

Cloud-based engine that can calculate the costs for all of the world‚Äôs cell phone users
Simpler CRM system that is 10x cheaper than the industry standard it is 100% compatible with

What You Won‚Äôt Be Doing

Fixing defects in code written by someone else
Wasting your time in meetings and administrative tasks

Basic Requirements

Senior Software Engineer key responsibilities

Technical/quantitative university degree.
3+ years of coding experience in Java, JavaScript, C#, or C++ for a software service or product.

Nice-to-have Requirements

Experience working 100% remotely with asynchronous communication dominating how you collaborate
Cloud development experience, especially AWS

About Trilogy

Hundreds of software businesses run on the Trilogy Business Platform. For three decades, Trilogy has been known for 3 things: Relentlessly seeking top talent, Innovating new technology, and incubating new businesses. Our technological innovation is spearheaded by a passion for simple customer-facing designs. Our incubation of new businesses ranges from entirely new moon-shot ideas to rearchitecting existing projects for today's modern cloud-based stack. Trilogy is a place where you can be surrounded with great people, be proud of doing great work, and grow your career by leaps and bounds.

There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!

What to expect next:

You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online ‚Äúscreening‚Äù assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.
You will be paired up with one of our recruiting specialists who can answer questions you might have about the process, role, or company, and help you get to the final interview step.

Important! If you do not receive an email from us:

First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as ‚ÄúNot Spam‚Äù since you will receive other emails as well.
Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/reset-password if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.

title: Manager Customer Success Team
description:
Microsoft is on a mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. Our culture is centered on embracing a growth mindset, a theme of inspiring excellence, and encouraging teams and leaders to bring their best each day. In doing so, we create life-changing innovations that impact billions of lives around the world. You can help us to achieve our mission.

Customer Success: Microsoft aspires to help our customers achieve their own digital transformation, leveraging the power of Microsoft Cloud solutions and support offerings. To this end, Microsoft invests in a dedicated Customer Success team that will help Microsoft customers successfully realize their business outcomes.

Responsibilities

As the Manager of a team of Customer Success Account Managers (CSAM) you lead a high-performing team of seasoned CSAM, who are well versed in cloud adoption, program delivery management practices, and technology trends. This is an exciting role that will help fuel customer success through your leadership with business, customer, and team growth! You are a thought leader with exceptional interpersonal skills, executive presence, including the ability to hold CxO / BDM level discussions, and presentations. You demonstrate competent ability to map the customer‚Äôs needs to solutions, understanding Enterprise cloud workloads

Key Responsibilities Include

The Manager CSAM is accountable for end-to-end service program delivery within an assigned portfolio of customers, representing Customer Success throughout all deal phases while demonstrating a critical partnership with internal and external stakeholders. The Manager CSAM serves as the primary leadership point for accountability and/or escalation for their portfolio of customers. This role has direct people management responsibility for Customer Success Account Managers and supervises the Customer Success and Support deliveries to customers by their team. They are responsible for nurturing customer satisfaction, customer effective use of Microsoft‚Äôs cloud platforms, consumption, growth with fulfilling Support contractual obligations, and the governance of delivery for their portfolio of accounts led by their CSAMs.

Responsibilities

Hire, on-board, develop, coach, mentor and evaluate Customer Success Account Managers.
Build a diverse and inclusive high performing team that whilst setting a clear bar for excellence.
Lead with exceptional cross-team collaboration and communication.
Lead with empathy, curiosity, and desire to constantly improve, acquire new skills and consistently provide results.
Partner with all required Microsoft stakeholders in the subsidiary to drive CSAM role clarity, account coverage, project assignment.
Coach and enable your team to accelerate cross cloud workload projects to production, including technical readiness, blocker escalations and technical resource orchestration.
Ensure your team delivers high quality production deployments that are resilient and successful.
Consistently deliver operational excellence, including timely consumption, opportunity management, high-quality reporting and insights, and delivery portfolio health.


Qualifications

To be effective as a Manager of the CSAM team, you have leadership experience in building, coaching, developing, and retaining high performing teams to achieve business results, customer success and value realization.

Required Qualifications

+10 years of people management experience
+7 years of experience driving change management or technical adoption
+10 years of experience in technical sales, consultative or program delivery over complex projects and support engagements


Preferred Qualifications

Bachelor's degree (or equivalent) in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering or related field
PMP or other project management certification
Certification in one or more of the following technologies preferred: Cloud, mobile, Database, Big Data, BI, Data Science, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence
Previous revenue management and forecasting experience


Other Skills We Assume You Already Have Are

Collaboration: Ability to generate trust, build alliances, and orchestrate interdisciplinary teams to the benefit of customers required
Communication: Thought leader with executive presence, including the ability to hold CxO and BDM level discussions, exceptional interpersonal, verbal, written and presentation skills required
Technical acumen to lead a team with:

Proven ability to map the customer‚Äôs needs to solutions

Understanding of Enterprise cloud workloads

Ability to stay up to date on new/improved cross cloud scenarios and workloads

Empathy, curiosity, and desire to constantly improve, acquire new skills and drive for results

Demonstrated leadership through prior technical, consultative or program delivery coaching/leadership roles

Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances.
