title: Senior FullStack Engineer (Remote from Italy)
description:
About PriceHubble

PriceHubble is a PropTech company, set to radically improve the understanding and transparency of real estate markets based on data-driven insights. We aggregate and analyse a wide variety of data, run big data analytics and use state-of-the art machine learning to generate stable and reliable valuations and predictive analytics for the real estate market. We are headquartered in Z√ºrich, with offices in Paris, Berlin and Tokyo. We work on international markets, are backed by world-class investors and treasure a startup environment with low bureaucracy, high autonomy and focus on getting things done.

Your role

As a Senior FullStack Engineer, your mission at PriceHubble is to develop the next-generation products that change how users interact with the real estate world. We're looking for engineers who love to work on up-to-date technology stack (Angular, Python, Datadog, Airflow, Kubernetes) running in Google Cloud, and that can bring competencies in designing, developing and running scalable web applications. You will focus a lot on data, usability, and on customer satisfaction. You will work in an agile team, following the Scrum process and you will collaborate with several other teams Data Teams, SRE, Other Application Teams, Architecture. You will be responsible for designing and implementing components, understanding the tradeoffs of different designs, taking care about aspects such as performances, scalability, monitoring, deployment, error management and testing.

Your daily bread

You work collaboratively with the rest of the team to develop outstanding products.
You develop great code with the latest web development standards and technologies, designing, developing, reviewing, testing, deploying, maintaining and improving software efficiently.
You mentor more junior developers.
You contribute to increase the scalability, performance, stability and security of our solutions
You contribute your ideas to our product development and system architecture
You manage tasks, priorities, deadlines and deliverables in accordance with the whole agile team with your passion to turn the user needs into a powerful digital (web and mobile) solution.
You solve obstacles with the team, identifying problems or improvement areas, investigating potential causes, and proposing solutions ensuring deadlines are met.
You ask about your tasks and your needs, and you are not too proud to do menial things at times if they serve the bigger whole. You are able to solve customers' problems as enrichment, not nuisance. If you don't know it, learn it. If it is boring, automate it.



Requirements

Strong experience with backend development, API design, scalability and databases is required. Experience with microservices is a plus.
Knowledge of Python and Django is a recognized plus.
Some experience with frontend development (JavaScript/CSS3/HTML5 stack) and strong motivation to improve your skills is required.
Knowledge of Angular and/or React is a recognized plus.
Experience with CI/CD is required.
Experience with Google Cloud or any other Cloud is a plus.
You can communicate future plans and directions to technical and non-technical people.
You love to be up to date and take initiative to change legacy processes or technology usage if there is something better out there.
You are able to produce, version, test, document and review great code.
You have a startup mindset, taking ownership and getting things done.
You are comfortable working and communicating in English



Benefits

üïì Flexible work hours

üè† Remote work (You can work remotely, as a contractor, from home in your Country, or apply for a full-time position as an employee in Paris, Berlin, Hamburg or Vienna (relocation provided). Occasional travels to PriceHubble offices could be required.

üí∞ Competitive salary

üëñ Casual dress code

üìò L&D program

title: Internship: IT Business Analyst/Software engineer/Data Analyst /IT Project manger
description:
Posizione


Business Analyst: Proactively propose innovative processes in order to enhance Bank‚Äôs core activities gathering and analyzing information, formulating and testing hypotheses, and developing and communicating effective solutions .
Software Engineer : Full stack development, distributed backend services and data pipelines at massive scale, algorithms and data structures, artificial intelligence and machine learning, security, software development, networking and storage;

title: System Architect
description:
TXT Group (www.txtgroup.com) is an international leader in consulting for the development of software solutions and IT services, supporting the digital transformation of customers' core products and processes. With a portfolio of proprietary software products and deep experience in vertical domains, TXT Group operates across different markets, with a growing footprint in Aerospace, Aeronautics, Automotive, Industrial, Government and Fintech. The holding company, TXT e-solutions S.p.A., has been listed on Italian Stock Exchange - Star Segment (TXT.MI) - since July 2000. TXT Group is headquartered in Milan and is present in 15 countries worldwide, having subsidiaries in Italy, Germany, France, Switzerland, the UK and the US.

TXT is a leader in research and development investments by consolidating its expertise in the most valuable sectors such as IOT, machine learning, artificial intelligence, cyber security, mission critical systems software engineering, IT governance & service management, process mining.

In the last 3 years TXT Group doubled its revenues and staff by exceeding the threshold of 1000 employees. We work in a young, dynamic and international environment with the opportunity to meet colleagues from 30 nationalities.

The candidate will be introduced to the Automotive division (with senior and junior professionals) and after an initial period of on-the-job training will have the opportunity to interact directly with the end client to share project updates and analyze new requests.

The resource will deal with System Architecture design and the definition of the System elements and their interactions through interfaces, guaranteeing traceability to the System Requirements.

Main Responsibilities

Ensure the definition and design of the System Architecture by identifying the System Elements and their interactions (explained in the Diagrams) in relation to determined inputs (System Requirements), following the ASPICE methodology;

Guarantee bidirectional traceability by means of links to each System Requirement starting from the System Elements and Diagrams that satisfy it;

Ensure the coordination of the system architecture review process, monitoring the results and evaluating the corrective actions for the resolution of the identified Findings;

Ensure the preparation of the System Architecture baseline and the sharing of the project with the other "internal direct customers" (the Owners of the SYS.4 and SWE.1 processes).

Required

Technical Skills

Knowledge of production processes;

Knowledge of the A-SPICE methodology;

Knowledge of mechanics;

Knowledge of HW and SW;

Tool for the creation of the architecture (e.g. EA);

Knowledge of DOORS;

Knowledge of PLM tools (GIT, SVN, Windchill).

Knowledge of MS Office and the capacity to manage and write documentation will be considered a plus.

Soft Skills

The profile is completed by a good knowledge of the English language, strong communication and presentation skills, result orientation, excellent interpersonal skills.

A degree in scientific disciplines and work experience of at least 1 year is required.

We Offer

Career opportunities in a rapidly growing and profoundly changing company with young and international staff.

Training in topics related to the activities carried out.

Reimbursement of travel expenses for trips to the client's site.

description:
Direct message the job poster from AGS S.p.A - Advanced Global Solution

Serena Larghi
Corporate Human Resources

AGS S.p.A. √® una societ√†¬†leader¬†nel settore della tecnologia in Italia da pi√π di 20 anni.

Ogni giorno in AGS Spa raccogliamo le sfide delle Digital Transformation. Guidiamo il cambiamento progettando soluzioni innovative ed erogando servizi tailor-made ad alto valore aggiunto. Formazione e ricerca sono i pillar del nostro approccio al lavoro.

Opportunit√†

Cosa richiediamo?

Siamo desiderosi di entrare in contatto con personalit√† brillanti residenti sul territorio italiano.




Cosa offriamo?

Possibilit√† di lavoro da remoto/smartworking;
Possibilit√† di crescita professionale;
Campagna incentivi e bonus in base alla qualit√† dell‚Äôattivit√† lavorativa svolta.

AGS Academy




In AGS consideriamo la formazione delle nostre risorse come motore di crescita e di nuove idee. Un investimento continuo per l‚Äôinnovazione e lo sviluppo. Chi entra a far parte di AGS entra in un network di crescita personale e professionale continua e in un ambiente di lavoro altamente stimolante ed innovativo composto da centinaia di talenti.

AGS ACADEMY realizza decine e decine di corsi per aggiornare e ampliare le competenze dei nostri specialisti; programmi strutturati di aggiornamento e specializzazione, che possono arrivare fino alla Certificazione presso enti terzi.

I corsi di AGS Academy vengono tenuti in due modalit√†: ‚Äúin aula‚Äù presso le nostre Sedi e ‚ÄúCorsi Smart‚Äù, che possono essere fruiti dove e quando si preferisce, in completa autonomia anche da Smartphone o Tablet.

¬†

ABOUT AGS

AGS S.p.A. oggi √® composta da Business Unit che lavorano in sinergia per offrire soluzioni all‚Äôavanguardia su varie aree di competenza:

Consulting: da anni collaboriamo con i Big Player del mercato di varie industry (Banking, Telco, IT, Automotive, Pharmaceutics ), confermando e rinnovando la nostra partnership ormai pluriennale.

¬†

Software Factory: all‚Äôinterno del nostro HQ realizziamo prodotti, soluzioni e servizi per grandi clienti. La nostra Factory √® composta da vari professionisti nel mondo dello sviluppo divisi per competenze verticali. Sempre all‚Äôavanguardia in ambito tecnologico, abbiamo integrato le aree di: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Artificial Intelligence e CP7.

¬†

Produzione: dopo anni di Ricerca e Sviluppo, abbiamo creato nuovi materiali (Polimetilmetacrilato, Acrilico, Azanite) ottenuti attraverso cicli produttivi ad energia pulita, innovativi ed ecofriendly, adoperati nella riqualificazione energetica e nella realizzazione delle facciate termoventilate.

¬†

Real Estate e Facility Management: nel 2020 abbiamo creato la divisione AGS Real Estate per andare incontro all‚Äôesigenze del mercato. Formata da pi√π di 50 architetti e ingegneri, uniamo le nostre varie anime per sviluppare soluzioni di efficientamento e riqualificazione di immobili.

¬†

Robotics & Automation: l‚Äôesperienza consolidata da AGS in oltre 20 anni ci ha portato a creare macchine all‚Äôavanguardia diverse dalle altre presenti sul mercato. L‚Äôutilizzo di materiali innovativi e le migliori competenze IT, ci hanno permesso di affermarci in contesti Business e Medicali grazie alla realizzazione di IdeaHub e UVC-O3 Sterilizer.

La nostra Vision

La voglia di osare e l‚Äôabilit√† di plasmarsi a un mercato in continua evoluzione hanno portato AGS ad effettuare continui e importanti investimenti in Ricerca & Sviluppo in nuove aree, fra cui Artificial Intelligence, Machine e Deep Learning, IIoT (Industrial Internet of Things), Monomer & Polymer Synthetic Surfaces e Building & Lighting Automation.




I nostri Valori

Soluzioni IT sempre un passo avanti. Offriamo Consulenza, Progetti, Servizi e Soluzioni IT mirati alla creazione di valore nei processi delle aziende.

title: Mikamai - Frontend Javascript Developer
description:
UNCONVENTIONAL EVERYTHING




‚ÄúMikamai‚Äù non √® solo un team di sviluppo software e "Unconventional Everything" non √® solo un claim accattivante. √à il modo in cui affrontiamo il nostro lavoro, guidati dalla passione per lo sviluppo e per il design, per le soluzioni meno ovvie, per il nuovo e per le tecnologie pi√π all'avanguardia. Mettiamo metodo, entusiasmo e creativit√† nei prodotti digitali che realizziamo.¬†




Facciamo parte di Neosperience (https://www.neosperience.com/it/) la capogruppo di un pool di aziende e start up con un focus specifico nel mondo digitale in tutte le sue sfaccettature: Customer Experience, Digital Marketing, Intelligenza Artificiale, Machine Learning, E-commerce, Blockchain e molto altro.




Grazie a un pizzico di fortuna e tanto impegno lavoriamo con clienti di prestigio in diversi settori: Fashion, Design, Esports and Gaming, Turismo, Food & Beverage, FinTech e altro ancora.

Siamo partner certificati di AWS e Shopify e lavoriamo con diverse tecnologie come Node, React, Angular, Vue, Ruby (e Ruby/Rails), Python, Elixir, Postgres, Docker, OAuth e GraphQL ma non solo. Per sviluppare spesso usiamo le nostre API backend.




Crediamo per√≤ che uno sviluppatore non possa essere descritto solo dal linguaggio o dal framework che ha scelto di usare e l‚Äôempowerment delle persone √® quasi una religione da noi.

Quindi, se pensi di avere quel che ci vuole per diventare un Mikamahyers, mandaci comunque la tua candidatura: considereremo le tue esperienze, la tua voglia di crescere e le tue potenzialit√†.




WE'RE ON AN EXCITING JOURNEY. NEW TRAVEL COMPANIONS ARE ALWAYS WELCOME.




Siamo alla ricerca di sviluppatori frontend che vogliano far parte di una cultura basata sul continuous learning, sulla trasparenza e sulla voglia di uscire dalla propria comfort zone, per realizzare nuovi progetti sfidanti.¬†

Saremo felici di condividere con te le nostre conoscenze e il nostro entusiasmo!




Con le persone che abitano a Milano e dintorni, abbiamo da sempre lavorato sia onsite che in smartworking: da un punto di vista operativo, sono i team che decidono come organizzarsi e la presenza in ufficio √® richiesta quando c'√® davvero bisogno (sul serio!). Ovviamente le porte dell'ufficio sono sempre aperte a tutti a prescindere!

Per chi non abita a Milano o vicino una delle nostre sedi (Milano, Bergamo, Brescia, Bologna, Torino, Verona, Bassano del Grappa, Rende), abbiamo il remote working con una saltuaria richiesta, quando davvero necessario, di una trasferta in una delle sedi. ¬†




WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR¬†




Buona attitudine al lavoro in team e orientamento al risultato.
Entusiasmo e un pizzico di audacia (noi ci mettiamo la caffeina!)
‚ÄúStay Hungry, Stay Humble!‚Äù (cit.)
Una certa familiarit√† con Git e con i principali workflow di sviluppo.
Conoscenza di almeno uno tra React, Angular o Vue.js.
Conoscenza di almeno un preprocessore CSS (es: Sass, Less).
Esperienza nel consumo di API REST.
Conoscenza base di tool come Npm, Yarn, e Webpack.
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese scritta e parlata.




IT'S OVER 9000!




Esperienza nello sviluppo di app mobile (utilizzo di React Native o altre soluzioni ibride basate su Javascript).
Esperienza nell'utilizzo di Javascript server side (utilizzo di Node.js e framework per sviluppo backend).
Esperienza nei test lato Frontend (utilizzo di tool come Jest, Cypress, etc...).
Conoscenza di Typescript.
Esperienza nel consumo di API GraphQL.
Passione per code coverage e test automatici.




WORK HARD (but)...




Gestisci in modo autonomo i tuoi orari: abbiamo orari flessibili e i team sono liberi di decidere come sfruttarli.
Potrai partecipare a conferenze, corsi, eventi, workshop.




... AND PLAY HARD!




Sala chill out con poltrone e divano per rilassarsi, fornita di Playstation, giochi da tavolo e, per i pi√π sportivi, calcetto!
Cucina sempre accessibile in cui preparare/riscaldare e consumare il tuo pranzo.
Il caff√® √® sempre gratis!
Organizziamo aperitivi, eventi, attivit√† di team building e feste aziendali.




We look forward to hearing from you!

title: PRODUCT MARKETING MANAGER
description:
The Client: our Client is Altilia.ai, a deep tech fast-growing ‚Äúscale-up‚Äù company, operating within the fastest-growing enterprise software field: the robotic process automation (RPA). The company ‚Äì in AI since 2012 ‚Äì is backed by CPD Venture Capital and is currently expanding its market presence in Italy, and progressively in Europe and North America. The customer platform is now focused on selected top clients in the Financial Services space and is progressively expanding across other industry sectors.

Altilia purpose is to ‚Äúto build robots that unlock the transformative power of automation to empower people and free their boundless potential‚Äù.

Their products, rooted on a challenging mix of cutting-edge competencies and proprietary sophisticated AI technologies, help organization to improve revenues and margin by enabling and streamline the business transformation from manual to automatic processes, significantly reducing costs for clients. Their platform allows knowledge workers 1) to transfer their expertise into machine learning models to automate manual repetitive tasks that need human understanding and contextualization abilities, and 2) to exploit documents understanding capabilities to extract valuable information and insights for automating operational and decisional processes.

Altilia has already established a solid cooperation with Gartner.¬†




The Role: within this challenging and fast-growing environment, we are looking for the Product Marketing Manager (PMM), a newly designed role, reporting to the CEO. The PMM will have the goal to:

Deliver impact in creating and taking ownership of the Product Marketing, playing the role of the products platform subject matter expert.
Take the leadership of the launch of new products, qualified marketing campaigns and go to market strategies, working closely with the Sales team and in the light of enabling the business.
Create the demand shaping product success and growth story, by enhancing a strong interaction with clients in the analysis of the customer experience and potential needs.




Position ‚Äì Specific Responsibilities:

End-to-end ownership of the product marketing activity, defining the product positioning and messaging, and driving the execution of product launches and partnerships; work cross-functionally to create and execute go to market programs and evangelize the offerings through both established and innovative digital marketing channels. Create and execute effective lead generation programs through new business and customer-focused field-marketing events, trade shows, PR, webcasts, and online advertising.
Work closely with the Product Management team and the newly appointed Chief Growth Officer in the product definitions, new features ideation, launches and go-to-market strategies campaigns.
Take ownership of the relationship with Gartner Analysts, synthesizing market intelligence & customer insights, in order to develop a deep understanding of the market and customer segments.
Generate market awareness and provide direct support for sales opportunities, conducting market analysis to identify key opportunities and threats.




Requirements:

University degree. Engineering background is preferred. An MBA will be considered a plus.
10+ years of tenure in marketing with solid experience of product marketing, from high-tech, high-growth, preferably Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) environments with demand generation experience.
Proven track record of Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) enterprise products and/or related professional services offerings with direct exposure to customers on a large scale (at international level represent a strong plus.)
Solid track of successful products launches, high-impact marketing content and personalized campaigns, across a variety of digital channels.
Experience with creation of marketing collateral and overall content for software product marketing.
Experience on ABM/Enterprise marketing and ability to work with marketing automation platforms (Hubspot a plus), and ABM tools and technologies (i.e. Demandbase, 6sense, Terminus, Engagio)




A result-driven professional, a knowledge seeker passionate of emerging technology.
Influencing skills - to enable positioning ideas, address agendas and concerns, generate logical proposals and sustain compelling arguments. Able to connect with and relate to both Customer Success and Sales to act as the bridge between the two.
Excellent team-worker - can build sense of collaboration with colleagues and stakeholders, and encourages open share of information
Outstanding Communication - can build on messaging that create distinctive perception of products and their value, can sustain ideas and convince. Proven track record of establishing credibility with key customers, prospects and business partners, sales, customer support and development.
Resilience - Ability to work well under pressure, meet changing deadlines & address unique challenges of hyper-growth. Autonomous and proactive self-starter able to manage multiple complex projects simultaneously.

¬†

Fluency in English is a must for the role.
The position is based in Milan.

VANTAGGI

CORSI DI AGGIORNAMENTO in CENTAURI, l'Academy aziendale, una vera e propria Business Unit, dove lavorano esperti che offrono gratuitamente corsi di aggiornamento:

La formazione ha un ruolo centrale in Proxima, in quanto abbiamo a cuore la crescita personale e professionale dei dipendenti.

title: (Senior) Consultant, Integrated Demand & Supply Planning
description:
Bright Minds. Better Methods. Best Outcomes. Chainalytics accelerates fact-based transformation for supply chain leaders around the globe, including 18 of Gartner‚Äôs Top 25 supply chains. We bring unparalleled passion to our core purpose: to help leaders realize maximum value from their supply chains. Our combination of top supply chain talent, proven methodologies and proprietary market intelligence delivers actionable insight and measurable outcomes. With locations across North America, Europe, and Asia, Chainalytics serves companies globally in a borderless fashion.

The Integrated Demand and Supply Planning (IDSP) practice of Chainalytics assists clients with creating more value out of their supply chain by improving their planning. For example, we support clients with implementing state-of-the art planning technologies (like e.g. BlueYonder and o9), and we improve their forecast accuracy by using Artificial Intelligent (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) technologies (like e.g. DataRobot, R and Python).

Beside technology implementations and data analytics our professionals work closely with clients on initiatives to balance demand and supply by helping them design their demand and supply planning processes, and ultimately, implement the executive S&OP process. For example, we make important trade-offs between inventories, costs and service transparent. This allows companies to determine their optimal in this so-called ‚ÄúBalancing Act‚Äù.

Key Responsibilities

Support or lead one stream (e.g. Demand Planning or Supply Planning) of a planning technology implementation (like e.g. o9 and BlueYonder). This covers support or lead the development, design and/or implementation.
Work closely with the project manager, solution architect and other team members to develop, design and/or implement a solution for the client needs
Interface with the client to acquire business data, information and insights
Work closely with the project manager to design, develop, and integrate material for client presentations
Support the project manager during presentations to the client
Identify and communicate ways to improve Chainalytics‚Äô solutions
Develop and maintain positive client relationships
Support creation of thought leadership materials (blogs, public speaking, etc.) that support Chainalytics‚Äô overall brand and positioning
Support the ongoing development of methodologies and new service offerings, including SaaS capabilities that generate recurring revenues where applicable.


Skills

Impeccable integrity, passion for supply chain consulting, creative, and energetic
Ability to work creatively and analytically, both independently and in a problem-solving team-oriented environment
Strong organizational, multi-tasking, and time-management skills


Qualifications

Masters degree in Logistics, Industrial Engineering, Information Systems, Supply Chain Management or Transportation and Logistics
Experience in planning (i.e. demand planning, supply planning, S&OP) is preferred, with minimum of 4 years experience for Sr. Consultant
Experience in implementing planning solutions (like e.g. BlueYonder, o9) is preferred
Experience in supply chain consulting, especially involving solution design and implementation, is preferred
Excellent client communication skills and experience
Have superior and creative problem-solving skills
Experience with AI/ML technology is preferred
Expertise for managing large-scale datasets in database, data mining and/or business intelligence tools is preferred


Additional Information

This position is based out of our Italian office in Milan, Italy.
Salary is commensurate with experience, with an attractive variable compensation package and benefits.
This position will report to our Principal based in Italy

title: Software Engineer, Sysdig Monitor (Italy - Remote)
description:
Sysdig is the secure DevOps company, and we're at the forefront of the container, Kubernetes, and cloud revolution. We are passionate, technical problem-solvers, continually innovating and delivering powerful solutions to confidently run cloud-native applications. Our consistent contributions to open source software projects reflect our commitment to the open cloud movement.

We value diversity and open dialog to spur ideas, working closely together to achieve goals. And we're a great place to work too -- we were awarded the 2021 Bay Area Best Places to Work Award from San Francisco Business Times and the Silicon Valley Business Journal. We are looking for team members who share our commitment to customers and are willing to dig deeper, understand problems and deliver innovative solutions. Does this sound like the right place for you?

If you are a software engineer with experience in building and operating large-scale data pipelines, we would like to connect. Ideally, you are passionate about and have experience in large-scale distributed systems.

Your Opportunity

We're looking for a Software Engineer who is passionate about building simple, scalable services to deal with complex data, to work in our Container Intelligence Platform that impacts Enterprise customers.

You will work alongside an established engineering team located throughout the US and Europe. Sysdig is a high growth startup, and there will be significant growth opportunities for this position. Our customer base is growing fast and so is the scale demanded of our backend. As a consequence, we're embarking on a major re-architecting of our platform.

Your Responsibilities

You'll lead projects as part of this scale-out effort that will allow us to handle the next orders of magnitude, such as writing Kafka-based streaming services
Distribute query engine targeting of our Cassandra and ElasticSearch data store
Optimize ingest pipeline
Put machine learning features into production
Handle both monitoring and security data on a daily basis across multiple platform tiers (Kubernetes, AWS, Mesos)


Your Background

Prior experience building and operating large-scale data pipelines
Production experience with at least one of Kafka, Cassandra, ElasticSearch
Strong computer science fundamentals in design, data structures and algorithms
Java experience highly preferred
Experience with AWS is a plus
Experience with Kubernetes is a plus
Startup / entrepreneurial experience is a plus
A positive "can do" attitude with the ability to articulate thoughts and ideas and see them to fruition
An appetite for varied data


Key Technologies

Java
Go
Cassandra
ElasticSearch
Kafka
Linux


Why work at Sysdig?

We're a well funded startup that already has a large enterprise customer base
We have a pragmatic, approachable culture, from the CEO down
We have an organizational focus on delivering value to customers
Our open source tools (https://sysdig.com/opensource/) are widely used and loved by technologists & developers


When you join Sysdig, you can expect:

Competitive compensation package
Top-notch health insurance coverage


Additionally, we offer a variety of benefits and perks, such as:

Monthly allowance that can be used for the following types of expenses (Employee wellness, Housecleaning services, Home internet, Phone expenses, Office supplies, Office furniture)


Some of our hiring managers are based internationally, an up to date CV in English would be appreciated.

title: Customer Support Manager
description:
DESCRIPTION




Myntelligence is an international group that operates across 25 countries in 4 continents from its 3 offices in Milan, London and S√£o Paulo.

Myntelligence's platform, Adding provides advertisers with a single interface to execute their entire media spend on all AdTech platforms across all channels (Search, Social, Display, Video, Native, Affiliation, Programmatic Radio, Addressable TV, etc.).¬†

Adding, uses machine learning algorithms to automate and optimize campaigns, enabling advertisers to effortlessly increase revenues and advertising ROI through enhanced efficiency.¬†

With a more holistic overview of consumers‚Äô behaviour built by putting together data signals coming from all different platforms orchestrated (a real journey-based view of all customer interactions), advertisers can stop making marketing decisions based on pure assumptions, and they can start communicating with their customers at relevant points in the buying process, improving engagement and conversion rates.¬†







COMPANY VIDEOÔªø




https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qPYuJZosMK4




JOB BRIEF




For our Milan headquarter we are currently seeking a Customer Support Manager who will report to the Product Support Manager.

The Customer Support Manager (CSM) will support pre and¬†post-sales customer lifecycle as it relates to customer adoption, on-going support, programme optimization and expansion. CSM is the main interface for all programme-related inquiries and build relationships with all relevant stakeholders as trusted advisor.




SOME OF YOUR ACTIVITIES

¬†

Act as an evangelist¬†and mentor to account management, services teams and other client-facing contacts to who must apply our value proposition to customer business challenges.
Serve as the primary point of contact, working with the Client team, and Sales Teams to facilitate a seamless Customer on-boarding process, ensuring a smooth ‚Äògo live‚Äô and introduction for the Customer from the outset.
Work collaboratively with the Marketing and Sales team to build Customer testimonials and referrals.
Anticipate Customers‚Äô requirements and possible challenges to make our customers successful. Promote the Company‚Äôs services (enhancements / updates / new initiatives / maintenance) through the relationships you have nurtured within the Accounts.
Identify potential issues within the Accounts and work with the wider business to take timely and effective action to resolve them.
Contribute to the development of company goals, growth and profitability targets by being an active member of the digital team and culture.
Contribute to track and close the help desk request into the SLA segment.

¬†

REQUIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE

¬†

Entry level- 1 year of Customer Success/Project Management/Marketing Position.
A passion for digital marketing, technology, advertising, communications.
A background quality assurance and communication skills.
Familiar with web technologies and basic tech competencies.
Ability to work in a fast-paced, results-oriented culture.

title: SENIOR DATA ENGINEER ‚Äì CLOUD
description:
Direct message the job poster from TMC

Giovanni Li Rosi
Looking for talented engineers

| Your challenges?

As a Senior Data Engineer, you will be faced with the challenges of creating data products using the services provided by Google Cloud. You will use your solid software engineering, architecture and leadership skills to contribute to a wide breed of data products, ranging from extremely scalable data¬†ingestion/processing systems, to data warehousing and machine learning projects. Not only you will contribute to design the system and craft the code: you will also be in charge of the technical process that will bring the artifacts towards the production environment. A community of friendly and much knowledgeable engineers will partner with you, in a context of growth mindset.




| What do we expect from you?

Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science related fields. A wide knowledge of operating systems, networking, programming and databases is the foundational skill set for this role
At least 4 years of experience in modern software development projects, with a robust understanding and practice in the following topics:
Write clean, robust and documented code, in one or more of the following languages: Python, Scala, Go
Awareness of the most common design patterns and principles
Be confident with software life-cycle practices and tools: automated testing, automated deployment, Git (GitHub preferred), Jenkins
Usage of prominent tools for issue tracking (e.g. Jira), and documentation (e.g. Confluence)
Solid understanding and practice of cloud computing; Google Cloud in particular. GCP Professional Data Engineer certification would be much appreciated
Architectural mindset and skills:
the attitude of considering the big picture while doing tasks
represent software and IT systems as pictures and diagrams
willingness to communicate and share ideas effectively through diagrams and presentations
knowledge of the most common diagram types: Flowcharts, UML, E/R and tools that allow the creation of such artifacts (e.g. draw.io)
Willingness to work in a dynamic and fast-paced environment, using always a constructive behavior and effective communication style
Full command of Italian and English language
Serious motivation for the Employeneurship model of TMC




| What can you expect from TMC?

TMC is an international high-tech consultancy company that brings expertise to their clients in order to support them with the realization of their technological challenges. As such, TMC is operating as an expert center at the disposition of its clients and we help them to be more competitive in an ever more global and faster changing technological world.

At TMC we believe that people are the driving force behind technological innovation. That is why we want to create the best possible conditions for tech talents to thrive in. We offer you a challenging and stimulating work environment in which you can be the director of your own career.

As an Employeneur you are part of our TMC family. Next to our outstanding technical expertise, fun and engagement are meaningful parts of our culture.




| Why choose for Employeneurship?

We are truly unique thanks to our Employeneurship model which is a true innovation for the High Technology consulting business. It is the business relationship of the 21th century for high skilled technical professionals. It is built around 5 main pillars:

You will have a permanent employment contract, offering you stability and security
You will get to know your market value and have a share in the profit your work generates thanks to the individual profit sharing
We will support you with a one-on-one coaching and trainings designed to help you develop your entrepreneurial skills
The competence cells structure, provides you with a strong meaningful and relevant network
The entrepreneurial lab: a playground for new ideas and a potential launching for start-ups




TMC is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

title: Senior Business Consultant
description:
Senior Business Consultant

BY Software offers the leading supply chain management (SCM) platform powered by artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML). BY‚Äôs leading cloud solutions manage supply chains from end-to-end, spanning supply chain and retail planning, execution and delivery. Using BY‚Äôs comprehensive SCM platform and its broad partner ecosystem, customers can better predict and shape demand, transform product delivery, fulfil more intelligently, grow revenue and profits, and deliver superior customer experiences. BY‚Äôs proven solutions power an Autonomous Supply Chain for 4,000 of the world‚Äôs leading companies including 75 of the top 100 retailers, 77 of the top 100 consumer goods companies, and 8 of the top 10 global 3PLs.

What You‚Äôll Do

Assists project Managers in planning efforts.
Ability to prepare and deliver presentations for users, management, and executive-level audiences. Provides advice to customers regarding industry best practices and process methodology.
Participate in business process/analysis, design, construction, validation, and deployment phases of the project.
Understands how the Blue Yonder solutions within the area of focus can be configured and delivered to better enable customer business processes.
Develops functional specifications of sound design for modifications, interfaces, reports, and screens that achieve customers‚Äô business objectives.
Creates and modifies procedural and system documentation throughout the project.
Develops and executes test scripts to ensure Blue Yonder software consistently meets the customer‚Äôs business objectives.
Provides non-technical support during the ‚Äúgo-live‚Äù period.
Provides primary user support and verifies that the system supports the required business functions and maintains data integrity.
Recognizes and highlights incremental revenue opportunities with existing customers/projects.
Serves in a supporting functional role while attending and contributing to key meetings between Blue Yonder project stakeholders, customer stakeholders, and corresponding leadership teams.
Ensures knowledge transfer is conducted with the customer project team.
Communicates business cases to PMG and PD regarding customer specific needs related to product functionality and enhancements.



Required Skills

Fluent in Italian and English.
BS/BA degree required.
5+ years Supply chain management experience, ideally in wholesale/distribution or retail.
Working knowledge of Blue Yonder Advanced Warehouse Replenishment, Advanced Store Replenishment, Network Optimization, and Multi-Tier.

title: Senior Backend Engineer
description:
TrueLayer‚Äôs Data Products team builds products that reduce the friction and cost involved in financial transactions, using data. Our data products power many of the most widely-used fintech apps in Europe today ‚Äî from personal budgeting tools to online lending to onboarding for all kinds of companies. We do this by allowing clients to retrieve financial data securely and quickly, with millions of API calls being made every day.

In 2020 we doubled the number of our connections to financial institutions across the UK and Europe. As we continue to grow, we're looking to find new ways to help our clients provide a first class experience for their users. To do this we‚Äôre continuing to optimise machine learning models models trained on millions of rows of transaction data, scale services that process millions of API calls every day and improve our frontend components so that hundreds of thousands of users can easily connect their accounts every day.

To achieve this we use best-in-class technologies including C#/.Net Core for development, Docker containers orchestrated with Kubernetes, AWS cloud infrastructure, ElasticSearch, Prometheus for observability, RabbitMQ, Redis, Postgres and more.

Who We Are

At TrueLayer, we build intelligent financial infrastructure that puts fintech at people's fingertips.

Businesses use our global network, built on open banking and PSD2, to securely access financial data and enable instant payments. Headquartered in London with offices in Milan, Dublin, Sydney, and Hong Kong, we‚Äôve raised $142M to date and we‚Äôre trusted by some of the biggest names in tech, including Revolut, Trading 212, and Zopa.

We are systems builders, design thinkers, product crafters and committed doers. We work in a collaborative, transparent environment where people can be their true selves, embrace ownership and accountability, and build something that will define an industry.

Our vision is to create a financial ecosystem that is open to everyone. We‚Äôve grown from a UK leader in 2020 to a global provider in 2021, operating in 12+ countries. The thing is, we're just getting started‚Ä¶

As a Senior Backend Engineer, you will

Own new product features, from breaking down requirements to planning tasks for you and your team, and shipping to production rapidly and regularly
Help make our platform globally scalable, reliable and available
Conduct code reviews and share knowledge with other engineers to maximise everyone‚Äôs potential and growth
Help shape the future of engineering at TrueLayer
Contribute to our culture and help make sure TrueLayer remains an exceptional place to work


Voluntary On-Call Duty

While being on call is a fantastic learning experience, we understand being on call out of hours is not for everyone, so at TrueLayer it‚Äôs voluntary. If interested, you can train with, and join, our on-call rota, which will involve compensated rotations of

Being On-Call to respond to critical incidents affecting the availability of our platform
Identifying, mitigating and resolving root causes of such incidents
Coordinating our response to potentially major incidents, and being an active voice in postmortem/root cause analysis discussions to prevent future problems.



Requirements

You'll need to demonstrate

Proven experience building distributed systems in C#
Understanding of SOLID and other common design patterns
Familiarity of API design and experience with at least one web framework
Understanding of Object‚Äìrelational mapping technologies
Appreciation of challenges surrounding microservices architecture
Familiarity with testing best practices - TDD, Unit Testing and Integration Testing, etc.
Experience with observability and alerting of mission-critical distributed systems


We‚Äôd be particularly excited if you have

A solid grasp of SQL and efficient use of caching
Understanding of Protocol Buffers, gRPC, and message queue systems



Benefits

What you can expect from us

Competitive salary and meaningful equity in the company üí∞
Flexible hours ‚åõ and remote work üè°
Choice of Linux or Mac technology üíª
A remote-working stipend to help set up your home office üí∫
Flexible holiday policy ‚úàÔ∏è
Generous parental leave üë©‚Äçüë©‚Äçüë¶
Private Health Insurance üßëüèΩ‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è
12 fully-paid Wellbeing Days a year (on top of the holiday allowance) üïäÔ∏è
Membership of mental wellbeing platform Spill üßòüèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
Learning & development allowance üìö


Inclusion & Diversity

At TrueLayer, we don‚Äôt just do inclusion and diversity. We embrace people that have different opinions, perspectives and personalities. Because we believe that by seeing the world from all sorts of angles, we can make life better for all the people who live in it. So we want you to know that the things that make you, you ‚Äî like your age, ability, background and identity ‚Äî are things that we celebrate and support. All we ask is that you believe in what you do (And know what an API is).

title: Junior Contract Manager - Italian and Spanish speaking
description:
Junior Contract Manager - Italian and Spanish speaking

At Dell Technologies, we work with customers and partners as extraordinary as our products and services. Our commercial relationships are underpinned by robust contracts ‚Äì our Contract Management team makes sure of it. They review, negotiate, structure and administer diverse contractual documents. Collaborating with cross-functional organizations to structure and manage the contracting process, they make sure that contracts are the foundation of strong business relationships. We also rely on their advice around contractual rights, obligations, terms and conditions.

Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Junior Contract Manager on our Legal Department team in Milan.

What You‚Äôll Achieve

As a Junior Contract Manager you will be part of an EMEA wide team and work in a truly global organization in a fast paced environment. In your daily activities you will be responsible for:


reviewing, negotiating and/or administrating contractual documents that enable business relationships with customers ‚Äì from RFI¬¥s over complex master agreements to amendments and dispute resolutions
ensuring compliance to company policy, legal and regulatory requirements and customer specifications
providing contractual and commercial expertise, support and guidance in the development and negotiation of contracts, including risk assessment and alternate positions to support the offer
working with internal stakeholders as well as with customers in an international challenging environment.


Take the first step towards your dream career

Essential Requirements

Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here‚Äôs what we are looking for with this role:

Law degree or equivalent strong contracts experience
Not less than 2 to 3 years‚Äô experience in a similar role
Language: Italian, Spanish, English at working level
Can do attitude and collaborative mindset
Technology passionate


Desirable Requirements

Experience from working in a matrix and/or multinational organization


Here‚Äôs our story; now tell us yours

Dell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We‚Äôre proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress.

What‚Äôs most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life ‚Äî while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more.

We started with computers, but we didn‚Äôt stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what‚Äôs next in technology, starting today.

You can also learn more about us by reading our latest Diversity and Inclusion Report and our plan to make the world a better place by 2030 here.

title: Head of ITS Traffic Management - Milan
description:
Posizione

Responsabile area Traffic Management

Area

Competence Center ITS

Dipendenza Funzionale

Responsabile Competence Center ITS

Posizioni subordinate

s√¨

Scopo della posizione, responsabilit√† e mansioni principali

La risorsa √® responsabile dell‚Äôarea Traffic Management all‚Äôinterno del centro di competenza ITS (Intelligent Transportation Systems), dove vengono realizzati i prodotti e le soluzioni per la gestione del traffico in autostrada con il nostro Advanced Traffic Management Systems (ATMS). I nostri prodotti e le nostre soluzioni supportano la gestione della viabilit√† di 14 societ√† concessionarie autostradali e si basano sulle pi√π avanzate tecnologie in ambito ITS per il tracciamento, la correlazione e la gestione di eventi su strada, videosorveglianza, pannelli a messaggio variabile, soccorso stradale, trasporti eccezionali, operazioni invernali, pianificazione cantieri, tracciamento merci pericolose e gestione scenari in galleria (Dlgs 264/06).

Stiamo pertanto investendo per rendere le nostra soluzioni ‚ÄúSMART-ROAD READY‚Äù, in grado di gestire e sfruttare al meglio la progressiva digitalizzazione delle reti autostradali abilitando l‚Äôintegrazione delle piattaforme per la gestione dei C-ITS e del V2X, introducendo sistemi di supporto decisionale adattivi bassati sull‚Äôanalisi in tempo reale delle condizioni del contesto (livelli di traffico, eventi, condizioni meteorologiche, lavori stradali) e adottando algoritmi di machine-learning per predire le condizioni del traffico combinando dati storici e analisi real-time del contesto.

Il candidato ideale sviluppa e gestisce il portafoglio prodotti in ambito Traffic Management, proponendo e realizzando il relativo posizionamento di mercato, identificando la value proposition e gli elementi di differenziazione competitiva.

Cura il mantenimento del presidio tecnico e dell‚Äôintelligence di settore, in termini di trend tecnologici, competitor, potenziali partner e fornitori, requisiti di business.

Propone il budget di area e definisce la roadmap degli sviluppi in base alle priorit√† del business.

Soddisfa le richieste di clienti interni, quali il Bid Management Office ‚Äì durante la preparazione di offerte tecniche alle gare, e la divisione Operations ‚Äì durante la fase di commissioning per clienti nazionali ed internazionali, prendendosi cura di: Accettazione, Configurazione, Start-up e attivit√† di supporto alla manutenzione.

Attivit√†

Gestisce il team Traffic in tutte le attivit√† e coordina la roadmap di sviluppo del prodotto, verificando che le scelte tecnologiche e gli sviluppi software vengano svolti adeguatamente alle richieste, sia per le operazioni quotidiane, che per la preparazione di nuovi progetti per raggiungere gli obiettivi dell‚Äôorganizzazione;

Garantisce la qualit√† della soluzione tecnica per l‚Äôambito di competenza, sia in fase di offerta che in fase di realizzazione;

Supporta Vendite & Business Development al fine di fornire le competenze e le risorse per implementare le soluzioni e i prodotti inseriti in RFP/RFI, scrivendo offerte tecniche in italiano e inglese;

Le attivit√† quotidiane includono incontri con i clienti per l‚Äôidentificazione e l‚Äôanalisi dei requisiti, definizione del design di sistema, pianificazione e controllo della roadmap degli sviluppi, stesura di report e documentazione tecnica, partecipazione agli scrum meeting, supporto tecnico e verifica dell‚Äôattivit√† di test e release management.

Lavora con il team di sviluppo interno, partner, consulenti e team di sviluppo esterni.

Coadiuva il Responsabile del Centro di Competenza ITS nella predisposizione del budget di area e ne verifica periodicamente eventuali scostamenti rispetto al pianificato.

Requisiti specifici per la posizione

Titoli, prerequisiti ed esperienza


Esperienza manageriale e tecnica pregressa come Product Owner o nella gestione di un team in contesto analogo;
Laurea in Ingegneria Informatica o simili;
Ottima conoscenza della Lingua Inglese (Livello minimo richiesto C1). Un‚Äôaltra lingua tra Spagnolo e Portoghese √® un plus.


Caratteristiche e competenze tecniche


Conoscenza del mercato ITS ed esperienza pregressa in soluzioni di Traffic Management and Operations;
Conoscenza del Product Line Management;
Esperienza nella gestione del flusso di sviluppo del software e nell‚Äôanalisi di requisiti in modalit√† Agile;
Eccellenti capacit√† comunicative sia scritte che orali;
Capacit√† di influenzare team cross-funzionali anche senza autorit√† formale;
Attitudini organizzative e relazionali, capacit√† di lavorare in team;
Ottime capacit√† logiche, di analisi e sintesi, capacit√† di problem solving, capacit√† relazionali e di leadership;
Buona conoscenza di architetture applicative, networking e sistemi operativi (Windows e Linux).
Conoscenza avanzata del pacchetto Office, in particolare Excel, Word, PowerPoint e Project.
Nice to have: Esperienza pregressa o certificazione in Project Management.

Costituisce requisito preferenziale l‚Äôaver maturato una significativa esperienza in analoga mansione anche in aziende estere o presso sedi estere.

La nostra offerta

Siamo l‚Äôazienda tecnologica di ASTM Group, 2¬∞ gestore al mondo di reti autostradali a pedaggio con circa 5.500 km di rete in concessione e player globale nella progettazione e nella realizzazione di grandi opere infrastrutturali.

Le nostre persone lavorano su soluzioni che migliorano il lavoro e la vita delle persone ogni giorno.

Offriamo lo spazio per creare soluzioni innovative all‚Äôinterno di un team professionale.

Data di inizio: prima possibile

Posizione a tempo pieno, contratto a tempo indeterminato

SINELEC, Creative Technology for the Mobility of Tomorrow

title: Architect
description:
Who We Are At Oracle, we see ourselves as changing the world through our own commitment to customer success, as well as by enabling our customers achieve their vision. This can range from supporting refugees and children in need, enabling companies deliver transportation and logistics services to the world, and tranform their data centers moving their workloads in cloud to enable new business models and scale. Our long established techonology as well as our research into new ones are helping solve real world problems, and we are looking for more colleagues to join us. We believe that different points of view are essential for innovation and we will offer you the chance to be part of an inclusive culture where individuality thrives. We also see sustainability as a core value of ours, as we run our business responsibly and continue to invest in environmentally friendly business practices, and also aim for building sustainable relationships both internally with our colleagues and externally with our customers and the communities we are part of. What Does Oracle‚Äôs Consulting Organisation Do? Our mission is to to be a catalyst for Oracle‚Äôs customer success. We want to help our clients realize the maximum value of their Oracle Cloud solutions. We help unlock the full potential of Oracle Cloud by focusing on business outcomes and by working as an end-to-end cloud partner. This approach not only increases the value we bring to our customers, but also makes Oracle a desirable partner. We deliver Oracle Cloud solutions with speed, efficiency and predictability based on our vast experience of more than 1,500 successful Cloud implementations in EMEA. Over 5,500 consultants across EMEA & JAPAC are passionately dedicated to ensuring Oracle Cloud success through our unparalleled experience and extensive global network. The One Oracle approach helps our clients in reducing risk and maximizing their return on investment. We look at our clients‚Äô business holistically to ensure business outcomes are met and empower continuous innovation. Context Digital Experience team (OCDX) from Oracle Consulting, specializes in providing digital innovation and digital delivery services in Italy, working closely with the EMEA region. Focused on achieving business outcomes, the organisation collaborates with customers to achieve success through digital innovation. In order to fuel our current and future growth within this area, we are currently planning to hire Digital Architect(s) for our team based in either Milan or Rome. We are looking for a positive and structured individual, with excellent customer facing skills strong technical background, who can discuss digital at both a business and technical level, who thrives on innovation, and is used to work in a dynamic environment for delivering strategic projects for our customers. This is an excellent opportunity, allowing you to work with rapidly evolving cloud technologies, where you will be constantly challenged. You will also have the opportunity to work with many of the world's leading organisations that use Oracle technology, and be part of a smart, digitally focussed team. YOUR FUTURE ROLE ‚Äì Architect - Digital Experience and Application Development We are looking for a new generation of Digital Architects who are pursuing innovative ways of building user-centric Digital Solutions that can scale over time. We are looking for creative, pioneering, ambitious software and technology professionals who live and breathe digital. Your life is social. You are mobile and have information available on your fingertips. You have a passion to solve challenging business problems and want to embrace new ideas to make the world a better place at home, for your community, at work and for society. You are a Digital evangelist and you love to be in rapid changing dynamic technology space of the Digital. As a key member of the Italy Oracle Digital eXperience organisation in Italy, you will work with the latest and rapidly evolving Digital technologies on Oracle Cloud. As a recognised authority and senior contributor within Oracle Consulting, you will provide market leading innovative solutions design and deployment leadership to regional project teams across EMEA. As a Senior Digital Architect, you will: Assess and fully understand the customers‚Äô desired business outcomes. Ensure that the proposed User Experience is technically viable. Provide ownership of the supporting digital solution architecture ensuring stability, extendibility and scalability. Provide technical input into the sales cycle, including estimations from simple to complex implementations Work as senior technical leader during projects delivery Act as solution and technical advisor both to the customer and project team. Communicate regularly with internal stakeholders, providing high level solution updates at both a business and technical level. Ensure that project approach and governance is adhered to within all internal and external projects. Be a digital trusted advisor for customers and will be responsible for maintaining long term relationships. Advise on candidate use cases for significant digital impact and suggest associated reusable solution assets. Collaborate with both consulting and licensing / cloud Oracle sales areas. What You‚Äôll Bring Your enthusiasm, love and passion for customer success will help us become the leading cloud service provider. Key Skills/Qualifications 5-7 years of experience in delivering innovative digital solutions and digital transformation programmes ideally using cloud technologies, with a proven record of full lifecycle implementations projects You have experience acting as a Digital Solution Architect or similar with cloud solution design, development and delivery, functional and/or technical consulting. Prior team leadership or management experience is preferred but not essential. You are an expert in industry standard architectural blueprints / design frameworks in the digital domain and have a practical experience of producing end-to-end technology architecture and reusable solution assets, which can be used across multiple industries and sectors. You provide functional and technology thought leadership in Cloud Middleware and/or Cloud Infrastructure, Information Security, system integration and solution development promoting best practice approaches to solution development. You have extensive knowledge in designing and developing innovative Web & Mobile solutions using cloud technology platforms such as Oracle, AWS, MSFT Azure, Google Cloud, etc. You have extensive knowledge of micro-services architecture, development patterns & languages for delivering cloud-native applications. You are proficient with DevOps, agile and lean development and Continuous Delivery methodologies and practices. You are proficient with Cloud Infrastructure design & configuration. You are familiar with design thinking, innovation methodologies, user experience and user interface (UX/UI) design principles. You are familiar with human-centric design principals. You can clearly articulate fundamental concepts and value of design, agile development and UX/UI methodologies to uninitiated audiences. You are familiar with tools such as Sketch and Adobe XD or similar tool You have extensive knowledge of Web Content Management solutions You have extensive knowledge Chatbot and Voice assistants You have extensive knowledge of JavaScript frameworks - NodeJS, and/or AngularJS, and/or React, etc. Knowledge of Oracle Visual Builder or Oracle JET is preferred but not essential. Extensive knowledge of one or more of the following topics would be a plus: Geofencing, Blockchain, IoT, AI/Machine Learning, TensorFlow, Augmented Reality. As a minimum, we require you to be able to articulate each of these as part of a digital solution. You are familiar with enterprise applications in CRM, ERP and HCM space and expertise on how Digital Solutions can be designed to deliver innovation and business value with those applications. You have strong verbal and written communications skills. Preferably experience writing and publishing research briefs, white papers and blogs. You are familiar with Agile and SCRUM delivery, preferably within large organizations. Depending on the seniority, proven experience in working with and influencing customer senior managers or executives You are experiernced in technical lead of remote and offshore teams Adaptability and ability to embrace and drive change. Ability to work in heterogeneous environments, with multiple actors / companies involved in the customers delivery context Graduate degree (Diploma/Master/Bachelor) or equivalent experience. Language: Italian as native language (or extremely fluent), fluency in English What We Offer A driver‚Äôs seat in leading your own career. We give you the freedom, skills, tools and techonologies to shape your future. Whatever avenue you go down, you‚Äôll gain access to immense learning experiences and you‚Äôll always be backed-up by Oracle‚Äôs impressive resources. We offer a good work / life balance to our colleagues, and an international culture that is vibrant, dynamic and inspiring, helping you reach your full potential. Apply Now Visit oracle.com/careers or contact our recruiter Felix Wehmeyer: ********** As a recognized authority and leading contributor within their practice, this senior-level consulting position provides consistent high quality and innovative solution leadership to a project team. Leads the solution design and implementation aspects of engagement(s) ensuring high quality, integrated software solutions within constraints of time and budget. Analyzes business needs to help ensure Oracle solution meets the customer‚Äôs objectives by combining industry best practices, product knowledge, and business acumen. Exercises judgment and business acumen in selecting methods and techniques to deliver functional and technical solutions on non-routine and v...

PERCORSI DI CARRIERA, all'interno dei quali puoi acquisire ruoli crescenti e incrementi salariali commisurati sia al potenziale che alle prestazioni:

FACTORY, un centro di competenze dove sviluppiamo progetti, principalmente Web application in ambito Risk Management e Cripto Currency, Big data e Sentiment Analysis, Quality Assurance, Application Management, Custom Projects
TAUROLAB, un progetto innovativo in cui premiamo le migliori idee, trasformandole in progetti concreti, offrendo incentivi economici e garantendo la possibilit√† di gestire persone in qualit√† di Project Manager.

title: Front-End Engineer
description:
Direct message the job poster from Cloud Academy, Inc.

Valentina Zaccolo
HR&Talent Acquisition

PLEASE NOTE: This position is based in our Swiss HQ in Mendrisio, Switzerland, just 7km over the border from Como, Italy. Mendrisio is easily commutable from Milan, Como, Varese or Lugano and Cloud Academy provides the train ticket for you and we‚Äôre happy to facilitate your relocation to this area if needed!¬†




Cloud Academy is the leading digital skills development platform that enables every enterprise to become a tech company through guided¬†Learning Paths,¬†Hands-on Labs, and¬†Skill Assessment. Cloud Academy delivers role-specific training on leading clouds (AWS,¬†Azure,¬†Google Cloud Platform), essential methodologies needed to operate on and between clouds (DevOps,¬†security,¬†containers), and capabilities that are unlocked by the cloud (big data,¬†machine learning).

Companies like Turner, Cognizant, SAS, and ThermoFisher¬†customize Cloud Academy¬†to contextualize learning and leverage the platform to¬†assign, manage, and measure¬†cloud enablement at scale.¬†




We‚Äôre looking for a¬†Front-end Developer¬†to help us take our product to the next level. We move seamlessly from full-stack web development, to mobile, to deployment/scaling. In this position you will work mainly on our front-end for our individual and enterprise-oriented product.

You will work alongside a¬†cross-functional team¬†of Back-End Engineers, Product Managers, marketing team members and Product Designers, to create a unified end-to-end customer experience. Our ideal candidate is humble, equally capable of teaching and learning.¬†




You‚Äôll have an opportunity to make a large impact on the culture of our development team. Our ideal candidate is a humble leader, equally capable of teaching and learning. You will work in our Switzerland office (Mendrisio, CH), together with our international engineering and design team and we‚Äôre happy to facilitate your relocation to this area if needed.




Responsabilities

Write well-structured, maintainable, idiomatic code with good documentation; unit tests for every feature, bug fixing and code¬†reviews.
Communicate with the rest of the company (e.g. sales, marketing, UX, etc) to ensure the functionality you're implementing is what was¬†intended.
Collaborate on a cross-functional team, including mobile developers, designers and product managers, in order to quickly deliver new¬†features.
Work side by side with DevOps, ensuring every piece of software provides useful error messages and logging capabilities.




Job requirements

Basic CSS3 knowledgeVery proficient in Javascript: ES6, Webpack, React or¬†Vue.js.
Experience with React is preferred¬†Experience with SPA (single page applications) and SSR (server side rendering) with React (or any other modern JS framework)
Experience with atomic design strongly preferred
Experience with distributed version control systems: mostly Git (Github and/or Bitbucket).
Familiar with cloud-oriented technologies: AWS, Google Cloud, Heroku, Docker
Good English level

Bonus points

Passion for and experience in e-learning projects is a strong bonus
Ability to find creative solutions to interesting problems




Benefits

Competitive compensation with an annual bonus potential. The salary range is determined by the level of engineer a candidate is assessed at, and we have a range for each level of engineer at the company.¬†The salary for this position (Software Engineer II) is a minimum of 50,000 CHF, plus an annual bonus of up to a 10% of the¬†salary.
Train ticket paid for by the companyBudget for professional development
4 weeks paid vacation per year plus 17 paid holidays per year
Remote working policy including 1 month per year of remote working from anywhere!
Great company culture and work environment!
Highly-skilled teammates and lots of opportunities for growth and development!

title: Regional Sales Manager - ITALY
description:
Join a team of record breakers and progress more than you‚Äôve ever done before - helping customers transform themselves into digital first companies.

At AppDynamics, our sales team is the heartbeat of the EMEA business. We‚Äôve grown from 6 people to 350 people in 5 years, and we are not slowing down.

With our aggressive growth plans, we are always seeking the top enterprise sales talent to drive our continued growth within the emerging region. We hire only the best - those who strive to push boundaries, to think bigger and act smarter, to face challenges without fear and take every opportunity to hone their craft.

Some Of What‚Äôs On Offer

A sales career at AppDynamics is not for everyone. We hire less than 1% of the people who walk through our door. If that doesn‚Äôt put you off - you might just have what it takes.

Access to our scientific, leading indicator and metric driven sales methodology which guarantees quota retirement.
World class education and mentoring from the best in the business. Just to get you started, we budget $37,000 for your first round of new hire onboarding.
Massive earning potential with uncapped plans and generous kickers for new logos and over achievement.
Endless career opportunities. We have a culture of promoting from within.

Apply If

You have a great degree from a great university.
You have a proven track record in enterprise software sales selling a disruptive technology smashing your field sales quota, quarter on quarter.
You‚Äôre ready to think differently, learn, and embrace new methodologies
You understand and work to MEDDICC
You pipeline generate to break into new tier 1 logos
You've great experience selling directly to C level.
You've experience in running complex sales campaigns from cradle to grave
You've had to establish pain and need within customers to find budget for the solutions you've sold.
You constantly look for solutions to problems, and how to solve business pains
You‚Äôre a natural champion builder and go the extra mile to add real value.
You‚Äôre an entrepreneur - you run your patch like a business and know that owning your own
pipeline generation is fundamental to your success.
You don‚Äôt cut corners, even with SFDC hygiene.

About Us

AppDynamics is an application performance monitoring solution that uses machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI) to provide real-time visibility and insight into IT environments. title: Technical Support Engineer - Milan
description:
Technical Support Engineer - Milan

At Dell Technologies, world-class service doesn‚Äôt end when a customer purchases our innovative products. Our Technical Support team is there for them whenever they need help ‚Äì by phone or email, online and on social media. No matter how complex the challenge, we rise to it. We answer questions about the installation, operation, configuration, customization and use of Dell Technologies products. For critical matters, we use our systems to provide remote diagnostic technical support. If there‚Äôs an issue with a customer‚Äôs product, we‚Äôll analyze it, identify the cause, recommend a solution and document the problem.

Join us as a Technical Support Engineer on our Product Services team in Milan to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.

What You‚Äôll Achieve

As a Technical Support Engineer, you will resolve complex technical issues in a fast-paced, customer critical environment, working on improving processes, standards and strategies to perfect our Support Services.

You Will

Interface directly with customers. May need to engage or escalate to more senior resources to resolve more complex issues. After training/learning period, manages own schedule of cases, which includes determining priority levels and sometimes will include negotiating and setting expectations with customers.
Apply technical knowledge to analyze and use highly technical troubleshooting tools, content and analytical practices; use operational and diagnostic procedures to resolve issues in unique and sometimes complex customer environments.
Effectively communicate procedural and technical issues to internal and external customers in a fast paced and customer critical environment. Maintain a "closed-loop" communication style that ensures proper and consistent documentation in service request case notes and assure all appropriate individuals are notified of ongoing issues and problem resolution status.
Participate in eService content creation (self-service) such as Chat, and Support forums.


Take the first step towards your dream career

Essential Requirements

Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here‚Äôs what we are looking for with this role:

Minimum 3-5 years relevant experience
Good customer handling skills in English and Italian
DELL-EMC Proven Professional Certification
Knowledge in Storages products
VMware Install Configure & Manage


Here‚Äôs our story; now tell us yours

Dell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We‚Äôre proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress.

What‚Äôs most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life -- while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more.

We started with computers, but we didn‚Äôt stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what‚Äôs next in technology, starting today.

You can also learn more about us by reading our latest Diversity and Inclusion Report and our plan to make the world a better place by 2030 here.

Application closing date: 15 May 2021

description:

At AppDynamics, our sales team is the heartbeat of the EMEA business. We‚Äôve grown from 6 people to 350 people in 5 years, and we are not slowing down.

With our aggressive growth plans, we are always seeking the top enterprise sales talent to drive our continued growth within the emerging region. We hire only the best - those who strive to push boundaries, to think bigger and act smarter, to face challenges without fear and take every opportunity to hone their craft.

A sales career at AppDynamics is not for everyone. We hire less than 1% of the people who walk through our door. If that doesn‚Äôt put you off - you might just have what it takes. Some of what‚Äôs on offer

Access to our scientific, leading indicator and metric driven sales methodology which guarantees quota retirement.
World class education and mentoring from the best in the business. Just to get you started, we budget $37,000 for your first round of new hire onboarding.
Massive earning potential with uncapped plans and generous kickers for new logos and over achievement.
Endless career opportunities. We have a culture of promoting from within.

Apply if

You have a great degree from a great university.
You have a proven track record in enterprise software sales selling a disruptive technology smashing your field sales quota, quarter on quarter.
You‚Äôre ready to think differently, learn, and embrace new methodologies
You understand and work to MEDDICC
You pipeline generate to break into new tier 1 logos
You've great experience selling directly to C level.
You've experience in running complex sales campaigns from cradle to grave
You've had to establish pain and need within customers to find budget for the solutions you've sold.

You‚Äôre a natural champion builder and go the extra mile to add real value.
You‚Äôre an entrepreneur - you run your patch like a business and know that owning your own
pipeline generation is fundamental to your success.
You don‚Äôt cut corners, even with SFDC hygiene.

About Us

AppDynamics is an application performance monitoring solution that uses machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI) to provide real-time visibility and insight into IT environments. With our unique AIOps solution, you can take the right action at exactly the right time with automated anomaly detection, rapid root-cause analysis, and a unified view of your entire application ecosystem, including private and public clouds. Using AppDynamics, you‚Äôll finally align IT, DevOps, and the business around the information that helps you protect your bottom line and deliver flawless customer experiences at scale.

title: Inside Sales Account Manager ‚Äì EMEA Sales Graduate Program
description:
Inside Sales Account Manager ‚Äì EMEA Sales Graduate Program

Milan

The EMEA Sales Graduate Program is a top graduate program including certifications, mentorship, an individual development plan and fast track career progression. You will join an international team that meets several times a year for training and development. The program offers additionally individual career mapping, excellent remuneration and commission structure and work-life balance.

Join us as an Inside Sales Account Manager on our EMEA Sales Graduate Program in Milan to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.

What You‚Äôll Achieve

As a Graduate Inside Sales Account Manager, you will be responsible for providing world-class IT solutions to a customer base in Italy. You will work with work closely with different teams locally and internationally to build your network and will work on challenging projects to gain commercial and business acumen.

You Will

Demonstrate sales ability and achieve targets, works within a team to support achievement of sales goals, and deliver on customer service levels
Effectively articulate the value proposition associated with Dell Technologies‚Äô products and services
Recommend business solutions considering customer needs and Dell Technologies‚Äô interests, builds relationships with customers based on knowledge of Dell Technologies‚Äô technology, products and services
Leverage cross-functional resources to achieve results and meet customer needs, independently gathers information, and works on own initiative, makes decision based on an appropriate amount of information and data analysis.


Take the first step towards your dream career

Essential Requirements

Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here‚Äôs what we are looking for with this role:

Business / IT related degree and graduated 2020-2021
Full working proficiency in English
Passion for technology and sales and ambition to succeed within a sales role
Ability to learn Dell‚Äôs technologies, products, and service and to align the portfolio to customer needs
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills


Here‚Äôs our story; now tell us yours

Dell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We‚Äôre proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress.

What‚Äôs most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life -- while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more.
We started with computers, but we didn‚Äôt stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what‚Äôs next in technology, starting today.
You can also learn more about us by reading our latest Diversity and Inclusion Report and our plan to make the world a better place by 2030 here.

Application closing date: June 5th, 2021

Dell is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment.
