Soluzioni Software Defined Network, Storage e Computing (VMWare e/o KVM)

Piattaforme Hardware Server e Storage

Certificazioni Nice To Have

Red Hat Certified Engineer (RHCE)

Linux Professional Institute Certification ‚Äì LPIC1

Microsoft Certified Solutions Associate ‚Äì Windows Server 20xx

Vmware VCP 6.x

AWS Certified Solution Architect ‚Äì Associate

Microsoft Azure Administrator

Oracle Database Cloud Administrator Certified Associate

Requisiti

Esperienza nella definizione della struttura della soluzione in risposta ai requisiti funzionali analizzati, e inoltre di specificare l‚Äôinfrastruttura e la piattaforma pi√π adatte per soddisfare i requisiti di progetto analizzati con il cliente maturata in contesti enterprise

Autonomia nel design e nella progettazione di architetture

Autonomia nell‚Äôelaborazione di offerte tecniche/sow, documentazione tecnica a supporto delle presentazione di una gara

Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese parlata e scritta

Cosa Offriamo

Inserimento in un team di professionisti e internazionale

Ingaggio su progetti stimolanti ad alto contenuto innovativo per primarie aziende

Crescita professionale ed economica commisurata alle competenze acquisite

Welfare aziendale (Smart Working, assistenza sanitaria, orari flessibili, mensa aziendale, convenzioni‚Ä¶)

Corsi di formazione in aula/online all‚Äôinterno del programma AGS Academy e percorsi di certificazione e di sviluppo professionale

Tiplogia contrattuale: assunzione con contratto a tempo indeterminato

In AGS consideriamo la formazione delle nostre risorse come motore di crescita e di nuove idee. Un investimento continuo per l‚Äôinnovazione e lo sviluppo. Chi entra a far parte di AGS entra in un network di crescita personale e professionale continua e in un ambiente di lavoro altamente stimolante ed innovativo composto da centinaia di talenti.

AGS ACADEMY realizza decine e decine di corsi per aggiornare e ampliare le competenze dei nostri specialisti; programmi strutturati di aggiornamento e specializzazione, che possono arrivare fino alla Certificazione presso enti terzi.

I corsi di AGS Academy vengono tenuti in due modalit√†: ‚Äúin aula‚Äù presso le nostre Sedi e ‚ÄúCorsi Smart‚Äù, che possono essere fruiti dove e quando si preferisce, in completa autonomia anche da Smartphone o Tablet.

About Ags

AGS S.p.A. oggi √® composta da Business Unit che lavorano in sinergia per offrire soluzioni all‚Äôavanguardia su varie aree di competenza:

Consulting: da anni collaboriamo con i Big Player del mercato di varie industry (Banking, Telco, IT, Automotive, Pharmaceutics ), confermando e rinnovando la nostra partnership ormai pluriennale.

Software Factory: all‚Äôinterno del nostro HQ realizziamo prodotti, soluzioni e servizi per grandi clienti. La nostra Factory √® composta da vari professionisti nel mondo dello sviluppo divisi per competenze verticali. Sempre all‚Äôavanguardia in ambito tecnologico, abbiamo integrato le aree di: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Artificial Intelligence e CP7.

Produzione: dopo anni di Ricerca e Sviluppo, abbiamo creato nuovi materiali (Polimetilmetacrilato, Acrilico, Azanite) ottenuti attraverso cicli produttivi ad energia pulita, innovativi ed ecofriendly, adoperati nella riqualificazione energetica e nella realizzazione delle facciate termoventilate.

Real Estate e Facility Management: nel 2020 abbiamo creato la divisione AGS Real Estate per andare incontro all‚Äôesigenze del mercato. Formata da pi√π di 50 architetti e ingegneri, uniamo le nostre varie anime per sviluppare soluzioni di efficientamento e riqualificazione di immobili.

Robotics & Automation: l‚Äôesperienza consolidata da AGS in oltre 20 anni ci ha portato a creare macchine all‚Äôavanguardia diverse dalle altre presenti sul mercato. L‚Äôutilizzo di materiali innovativi e le migliori competenze IT, ci hanno permesso di affermarci in contesti Business e Medicali grazie alla realizzazione di IdeaHub e UVC-O3 Sterilizer.

La nostra Vision

Aumentare la leadership tecnologica, investendo nelle competenze nei settori pi√π all‚Äôavanguardia dell‚ÄôIT, anticipando l‚Äôevoluzione dei mercati e rispondendo alle richieste dei clienti.

La voglia di osare e l‚Äôabilit√† di plasmarsi a un mercato in continua evoluzione hanno portato AGS ad effettuare continui e importanti investimenti in Ricerca & Sviluppo in nuove aree, fra cui Artificial Intelligence, Machine e Deep Learning, IIoT (Industrial Internet of Things), Monomer & Polymer Synthetic Surfaces e Building & Lighting Automation.

I nostri Valori

Progettiamo innovazione. Creiamo prodotti originali, nati dalla ricerca e dalle tecnologie di ultima generazione, che si distinguono per funzionalit√†, usabilit√† e innovazione.

Soluzioni IT sempre un passo avanti. Offriamo Consulenza, Progetti, Servizi e Soluzioni IT mirati alla creazione di valore nei processi delle aziende.

Innovazione, Tecnologia, Ricerca & Sviluppo sono i nostri valori distintivi. Con spirito innovatore abbiamo diversificato le attivit√† aziendali, raggiungendo livelli di eccellenza nei settori dove operiamo.

title: Customer Success Specialist
description:
More about the role

Join a team that is transforming smiles, changing lives.

At‚ÄØAlign Technology, we believe a great smile can truly transform a person‚Äôs life, so we create technology that gives people the confidence to take on whatever‚Äôs next. We revolutionized the orthodontic industry with the introduction of the Invisalign system, and we have never lost sight of that spirit of innovation. Our teams are constantly pushing the boundaries of what‚Äôs possible.

‚ÄØ

Ready to join us?‚ÄØ

About This Opportunity

As a Customer Success Specialist you will:

Focus on building long-term relationships with doctors and dental practices
Contributing constantly towards providing world-class customer experience
Effectively educate customers in each interaction acting on the root of the problem
Providing effective and efficient support to customer‚Äôs queries
Contribute to the business growth consistenly with creativity and collaboration


In this role, you will‚Ä¶

Respond to customer inquiries, requests and complaints received via phone, e-mail, or any other communication channel.
Initiate contact with customers; provide doctors and dental practices with proactive service, aiming at prevalence of outbound interactions
Ensure timely resolution to customer inquiries, issues and complaints.
Be alert to trends in requests and issues reported by customers. Research information to answer inquiries from customers and share learning‚Äôs with departmental peers and management.
Provide input regarding training needs to customer success manager of training and quality development; assist with development and presentation of information and training when requested.
Interact with customers and fellow employees in a timely, patient, tactful and professional manner. Handle difficult or sensitive issues following department guidelines.
Meet departmental standards for personal and team performance metrics.
Accurately and thoroughly document information in the company‚Äôs database(s) about each contact they handle following defined parameters.
Maintain a basic knowledge in orthodontic/dental concepts and topics.
Participate in special projects and/or training when requested.
Contribute ideas on ways to resolve problems to better serve the customer, improve productivity and customer experience; participate in activities and projects designed to improve customer satisfaction and business performance
Offer solutions to issues that are often non-standard/non-routine and require some clarification.
Possess comprehensive knowledge of company processes, procedures and product information/materials.
Support Sales and other departments.


In this role, you‚Äôll need‚Ä¶

BA degree.
1-3 years work experience in a customer based environment, benefit if medical device related.
Strong interpersonal, listening and persuasive communication skills.
To be willing to learn.
To be a good team player
To be a good problem solver
The ability to work autonomously
Excellent Italian and English written and verbal communication skills

Why working for Align Technology?

Great People, Innovative Technologies, And Meaningful Work‚Äîthese Are Just Some Of The Things Employees Say Make Align Technology a Great Place To Work

Make Your Mark: We are a global business, but not so big that you cannot make a huge impact on our continued business improvement. Bring your A game!
Innovation: Influence the game-changing technologies that are revolutionizing the dental orthodontics industry.
Work in a Dynamic and Growing Industry: Ask anyone for a list of the hottest and fastest growing industries and you will see medical and dental at the top!

Besides a challenging working environment, we offer you a good compensation and benefits package. This includes a good salary and the opportunity to participate in special projects and/or training when requested.

Sound like a good fit?‚ÄØ‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

‚ÄØ

Great! Click the "Apply" link to let us know you are interested. Not the right fit? Don‚Äôt worry,‚ÄØAlign‚ÄØis quickly growing so we are creating more opportunities to expand our Align family. Please consider joining our Talent Network to receive notifications about future jobs or sharing this opportunity with others in your network.‚ÄØ‚ÄØ‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

‚ÄØ

About Align‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

Align Technology is a publicly traded medical device company that is‚ÄØtransforming smiles and changing lives. Our global team of talented employees develop innovative technology, tools and treatment options to help dental professionals worldwide achieve the clinical results they expect. Our digital ecosystem combines the power of technology to create beautiful smiles through the integration of AI and machine learning, digital imaging and visualization, biomechanics and material science to develop the Invisalign system, the most advanced clear aligner system in the world; iTero Intraoral Scanners and‚ÄØOrthoCAD‚ÄØdigital services. Did you know? Align is the world‚Äôs largest manufacturer of custom 3D-printed materials.‚ÄØ‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

By joining Align, you will be part of a global, fast-growing company in one of the most dynamic industries. Great people, innovative technologies, and meaningful work - these are just some of the‚ÄØthings‚ÄØemployees say make Align Technology a great place to work.‚ÄØ‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

We respect your privacy. Please review‚ÄØour Applicant Privacy Policies for additional information.‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

‚ÄØ

Global Diversity Statement

At Align, we believe in the power of a smile, and we know that every smile is as unique as our employees. As we grow, we will continue building a workforce of diverse cultural backgrounds and life experiences and fostering a culture of open-mindedness and compassion for all our employees. We live our company values by promoting healthy people and healthy communities. All with the intent of changing millions of lives, one unique smile at a time.

Equal Opportunity Statement

It is our policy to provide equal employment opportunity in all of our employment practices without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, marital status, protected veteran status, age, individuals with disabilities, sexual orientation or gender identity or expression or any other legally protected category. Applicants for positions with Align must be legally authorized to work in the country which they are applying for and verification of employment eligibility will be required as a condition of hire.

title: Mikamai - Backend Node Developer
description:
UNCONVENTIONAL EVERYTHING




‚ÄúMikamai‚Äù non √® solo un team di sviluppo software e "Unconventional Everything" non √® solo un claim accattivante. √à il modo in cui affrontiamo il nostro lavoro, guidati dalla passione per lo sviluppo e per il design, per le soluzioni meno ovvie, per il nuovo e per le tecnologie pi√π all'avanguardia. Facciamo parte di Neosperience (https://www.neosperience.com/it/) la capogruppo di un pool di aziende e start up con un focus specifico nel mondo digitale in tutte le sue sfaccettature: Customer Experience, Digital Marketing, Intelligenza Artificiale, Machine Learning, E-commerce, Blockchain e molto altro.




Grazie a un pizzico di fortuna e tanto impegno lavoriamo con clienti di prestigio in diversi settori: Fashion, Design, Esports and Gaming, Turismo, Food & Beverage, FinTech e altro ancora.

Siamo partner certificati di AWS e Shopify e lavoriamo con diverse tecnologie come Node, React, Angular, Vue, Ruby (e Ruby/Rails), Python, Elixir, Postgres, Docker, OAuth e GraphQL ma non solo. Per sviluppare spesso usiamo le nostre API backend.




Crediamo per√≤ che uno sviluppatore non possa essere descritto solo dal linguaggio o dal framework che ha scelto di usare e l‚Äôempowerment delle persone √® quasi una religione da noi.

Quindi, se pensi di avere quel che ci vuole per diventare un Mikamahyers, mandaci comunque la tua candidatura: considereremo le tue esperienze, la tua voglia di crescere e le tue potenzialit√†.




WE'RE ON AN EXCITING JOURNEY. NEW TRAVEL COMPANIONS ARE ALWAYS WELCOME.




Siamo alla ricerca di sviluppatori backend che vogliano far parte di una cultura basata sul continuous learning, sulla trasparenza e sulla voglia di uscire dalla propria comfort zone, per realizzare nuovi progetti sfidanti.¬†

Saremo felici di condividere con te le nostre conoscenze e il nostro entusiasmo!




Con le persone che abitano a Milano e dintorni, abbiamo da sempre lavorato sia onsite che in smartworking: da un punto di vista operativo, sono i team che decidono come organizzarsi e la presenza in ufficio √® richiesta quando c'√® davvero bisogno (sul serio!). Ovviamente le porte dell'ufficio sono sempre aperte a tutti a prescindere!

Per chi non abita a Milano o vicino una delle nostre sedi (Milano, Bergamo, Brescia, Bologna, Torino, Verona, Bassano del Grappa, Rende), abbiamo il remote working con una saltuaria richiesta, quando davvero necessario, di una trasferta in una delle sedi.




WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR¬†




Buona attitudine al lavoro in team e orientamento al risultato.
Entusiasmo e un pizzico di audacia (noi ci mettiamo la caffeina!).
‚ÄúStay Hungry, Stay Humble!‚Äù (cit.)
Una certa familiarit√† con Git e con i principali workflow di sviluppo.

Esperienza nell‚Äôimplementazione di API REST.

Esperienza nell‚Äôuso di tool per il testing (per esempio Jest, Mocha, Jasmine, ..) e analisi statica (per esempio TSLint, ESLint,...).
Conoscenza di Npm / Yarn.
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese scritta e parlata.




IT'S OVER 9000!




Esperienza nell‚Äôuso di AWS.
Conoscenza di Typescript.
Conoscenza di Elasticsearch.
Familiarit√† con best practice riguardanti la sicurezza.
Esperienza nell‚Äôimplementazione di API GraphQL.
Esperienza con architetture a microservizi.
Esperienza con architetture/tecnologie serverless.




WORK HARD (but)...




Gestisci in modo autonomo i tuoi orari: abbiamo orari flessibili e i team sono liberi di decidere come sfruttarli.
Potrai partecipare a conferenze, corsi, eventi, workshop.




... AND PLAY HARD!




Sala chill out con poltrone e divano per rilassarsi, fornita di Playstation, giochi da tavolo e, per i pi√π sportivi, calcetto!
Cucina sempre accessibile in cui preparare/riscaldare e consumare il tuo pranzo.
Il caff√® √® sempre gratis!

We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Middle C++ Unreal Engine4 Developer
company_name: ZURU TECH ITALY - Creative Impact (Hong Kong) Limited
description:
We want to make the design of houses and their direct manufacturing accessible to everyone through an architectural design software, with an astonishing graphical visualization and very simple to use.

What we‚Äôre developing is the first BIM software able to realize real buildings! Brilliant inventions take shape from brilliant minds. We all believe our product is extraordinary so we‚Äôre looking for extraordinary people too.

What are you going to do?

First of all you‚Äôll be part of a team of brilliant engineers, with many different specialties: coding, graphics, artist, ui/ux design and machine learning. You‚Äôll work in a funny and modern environment with outdoor team building activities like trekking and paintball, game sessions with PS4 and NES Classic, air-hockey and table tennis tournament. Starting from day one, you‚Äôll be assigned to a team of our R&D department and you‚Äôll be responsible of implementing graphic algorithms in C ++ and building software solutions for the automatic design of buildings and interior design. You‚Äôll research current trends in emerging technologies and implement them. Interacting with the UI / UX team and collaborating with other offices (primarily India and China) to create our multiplatform software (Windows, iOS, MacOs, Android, VR).

Requisiti di lavoro

If you feel different from many other software developers, let‚Äôs consider what we‚Äôre looking for.

Of course, you must be a C++ lover, because we need a proven experience in C ++ programming and analysis (2+ years). You like to solve complex problems through software engineering in general, but what really makes the difference from many others is a passion for geometry and mathematics and 3D graphics algorithms. If you consider yourself a fan of computer graphics, of course you know Unreal Engine4 is and its extraordinary functions and possibilities. So we expect you have a good knowledge about its using or the use of an equivalent graphics engine. Many of our best programmers started learning graphics engine by their own passion and amusement, so we'd be glad to see any of yours experiments or personal projects, especially if developed for Windows and mobile devices. So send us a portfolio, we'd be keen to examine it. In our workplace the level of interaction and teamworking is very high, so we seek a lively and positive person, with excellent interpersonal skills, able to work with many young people. At last we value a degree in Computer Engineering or Computer science and you speak and write english quite well.

Altre informazioni sul lavoro

WE OFFER: level and contract period commensurate with the matured experience, combined with an individual career plan. We expect you‚Äôll be a Senior dev in 2 years of work with us.

Our Compensation Plan Includes

extra salary bonus;
time flexibility;
meal vouchers;
free espresso coffee and water;
participation in international congresses and conferences in the CG field.

WORKING CENTER: MILAN TOWN CENTER

Candidates interested and in possession of the requirements are invited to send their curriculum vitae, including the authorization to process personal data, pursuant to Legislative Decree 196/03 and to the art. 13 GDPR 679/16. title: Business Development Representative
description:
Why SoftwareONE?

Today SoftwareONE is a global leader in software and cloud portfolio management and is modernizing the way organizations budget and optimize their global IT spend from on-premises to the cloud.
Our 5,000 technology experts located across 80+ countries work on over a 1,000 Technology Projects globally. We provide customers with the right advice on their Technology Roadmap towards the cloud or optimizing the Business-outcome of a cloud-based landscape. With our PyraCloud platform, applying machine learning, delivering the visibility, insight, automation and control customers demand to maximize their software investments.
In tandem, our Software Lifecycle Management (SLM) services provide the methodology and framework to optimize the underlying IT infrastructure, accelerate cloud adoption and minimize compliance risk.
With our dynamic leadership and driven business strategy SoftwareONE is one of the fastest growing technology solution providers in the world with elite partnerships with Microsoft, AWS, Adobe, IBM, VMware, Oracle, Citrix, Red Hat, Trend Micro and many more.

Do you want to know what makes SoftwareONE Italy a great place to work? Watch this video in which Marco Lorenzi talks about the exceptional talent and the amazing culture of Team Italy.

The role

Manage quote creation, order processing, and day-to-day customer requests.
Develop strong knowledge through ongoing training with software publishers.
Act as key resource for volume license offerings.
Contact with current customers on a daily basis.
Develop and maintain consultative relationships with existing customers.
Work collaboratively with assigned Business Development Managers
Grow and maintain existing customer and partner relationships.
Establish and expand relationships with key executives and decision makers within each customer


What We Need To See From You

1-3 years professional sales experience preferred but not required.
Customer service experience preferred.
Highly motivated and results oriented; entrepreneurial spirit.
Detail oriented with ability to break down projects into smaller tasks.


What You Should Really Know About Us.

Strip away everything. Strip away our brand, strip away our buildings, strip away our offices. What are we left with? Our people. This is what makes SoftwareONE successful.
Passionate people who live and breathe our values every day, who delight our customers, every day, and who go above and beyond, every day. Our culture is unique, and I believe that having the right people, and empowering them to succeed, is the absolute key to our success.
Patrick Winter, Founder.

What We Expect From Our Employees

Success at SoftwareONE is not defined by what you do for yourself, but by what you deliver for our customers, the business and for the employees around you. SoftwareONE employees are energized, agile and are laser focused on delivering world class Customer Satisfaction and results. Our leaders motivate and inspire their teams and provide a working environment that delivers incredible levels of Employee Satisfaction. We are Humble, have a very high degree of Integrity and are simply not interested in politics.
Our leaders operate with a high levels of Discipline but are able to work at Speed manage change in a global economy.

‚ÄúSoftwareONE is an equal opportunity employer. With employee satisfaction as one of our core values, we are passionate about diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all of our employees. We want every employee to have the greatest experience of their career.‚Äù

title: Front-end Engineer
description:
PLEASE NOTE: This position is based in our Swiss HQ in Mendrisio, Switzerland, just 7km over the border from Como, Italy. Mendrisio is easily commutable from Milan, Como, Varese or Lugano and Cloud Academy provides the train ticket for you and we‚Äôre happy to facilitate your relocation to this area if needed!

Cloud Academy is the leading digital skills development platform that enables every enterprise to become a tech company through guided Learning Paths, Hands-on Labs, and Skill Assessment. Cloud Academy delivers role-specific training on leading clouds (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform), essential methodologies needed to operate on and between clouds (DevOps, security, containers), and capabilities that are unlocked by the cloud (big data, machine learning).

Companies like Turner, Cognizant, SAS, and ThermoFisher customize Cloud Academy to contextualize learning and leverage the platform to assign, manage, and measure cloud enablement at scale.

We‚Äôre looking for a Front-end Developer to help us take our product to the next level. We move seamlessly from full-stack web development, to mobile, to deployment/scaling. In this position you will work mainly on our front-end for our individual and enterprise-oriented product.

You will work alongside a cross-functional team of Back-End Engineers, Product Managers, marketing team members and Product Designers, to create a unified end-to-end customer experience. Our ideal candidate is humble, equally capable of teaching and learning.

You‚Äôll have an opportunity to make a large impact on the culture of our development team. Our ideal candidate is a humble leader, equally capable of teaching and learning. You will work in our Switzerland office (Mendrisio, CH), together with our international engineering and design team and we‚Äôre happy to facilitate your relocation to this area if needed.

Responsabilities

Write well-structured, maintainable, idiomatic code with good documentation; unit tests for every feature, bug fixing and code reviews.
Communicate with the rest of the company (e.g. sales, marketing, UX, etc) to ensure the functionality you're implementing is what was intended.
Collaborate on a cross-functional team, including mobile developers, designers and product managers, in order to quickly deliver new features.
Work side by side with DevOps, ensuring every piece of software provides useful error messages and logging capabilities.
Job requirements

Basic CSS3 knowledgeVery proficient in Javascript: ES6, Webpack, React or Vue.js.
Experience with React is preferred Experience with SPA (single page applications) and SSR (server side rendering) with React (or any other modern JS framework)
Experience with atomic design strongly preferred
Experience with distributed version control systems: mostly Git (Github and/or Bitbucket).
Familiar with cloud-oriented technologies: AWS, Google Cloud, Heroku, Docker
Good English level
Bonus points

Passion for and experience in e-learning projects is a strong bonus
Ability to find creative solutions to interesting problems
Benefits

Competitive compensation with an annual bonus potential. The salary range is determined by the level of engineer a candidate is assessed at, and we have a range for each level of engineer at the company. The salary for this position (Software Engineer II) is a minimum of 50,000 CHF, plus an annual bonus of up to a 10% of the salary.
Train ticket paid for by the companyBudget for professional development
4 weeks paid vacation per year
17 paid holidays per year
Remote working policy including 1 month a year of remote working from anywhere
Great company culture and work environment!
Highly-skilled teammates and lots of opportunities for growth and development!
Relocation bonus

title: Marketing Manager - Milan and North Italy
description:
We believe in a future where inner cities are free of cars, congestion and pollution. By offering our dockless electrical scooters and bikes as convenient alternatives for short-distance travel, we believe we can make that future possible. Our mission is to free our cities with clean rides for everyone in Europe and beyond.

Founded in Europe, Dott is comprised of a highly experienced team of inquisitive minds in mobility and tech. What we do today has a tangible impact on tomorrow. We reached our in-house sustainability target of 100% renewable energy, and ensure equitability in our communities through collaborating with city charities, officials and safety boards.

We‚Äôre looking for an entrepreneurial Marketing Manager to join the Italian team. The Marketing Manager will be responsible for all marketing activities in the North of Italy, with focus on branding and demand generation. They will work hand in hand with the Central Marketing team and local operations. You will report to the Senior Central Marketing Manager.

Demand and acquisition (80%)

Responsible for acquisition and growth of riders in Milan & North Italy markets
Responsible for ensuring marketing plans are effective and provide a good return on investment (business, marketing & comms - offline & online)
Responsible for sourcing and managing local acquisition partnerships
Promo codes partnerships
Ambassador programs
Co-marketing/BD partnerships
Responsible for local street marketing activities
Responsible for the execution of local marketing and comms strategy
Performance marketing support (translations, definition of content)
CRM support


Brand preference (20%)

Be the Brand guardian in your market and ensure consistency with global brand image.
Manage local Social Media accounts (community management, local contents sourcing, production and publishing).
Develop and implement local partnerships (owned and non-owned) in your city (with key events, key influencers or key places).
Coordinate local PR (monitoring, sourcing, day-to-day follow-up).
Get local insights & data re- the market, brand, competition and ridership.
Responsible for planning and defining local marketing and comms strategy
Responsible for brand partnerships & brand ambassadors campaign


What You'll Need

A minimum of 4-5 years in marketing / brand management, with a recognized post graduate / graduate degree in marketing / brand / communications
Excellent oral and written communication skills in English and Italian
Data-driven & Marketing ROI
Strong networker: local relationships with local business, the local marketing ecosystem, local influencers and opinion leaders
Hands-on and city / partnerships lover
Actively involved in in on-the-ground, street and event marketing
Multi-task and prioritize workload with quick turnarounds
Excellent problem-solving skills
Energetic and collaborative with a great work ethic
Past experience as a promoter would be a plus
Based in Milan, with flexibility to travel (Covid-19 permitting)


What‚Äôs in it for me?

Alongside a competitive compensation plan, we invite our employees to participate in our stock option plan. You‚Äôll be part of a collaborative, energetic and international team who enjoy the perks of flexible working hours, medical insurance contribution and fun company events.

At Dott, we are passionate and challenge each other to deliver on our dreams. We constantly perfect our craft. We own our mission and keep pushing for the company, cities and planet. On that note, be prepared to take on exciting challenges. We operate a consumer service that sees millions of transactions every week. Our operations services are backed by deep machine learning, and our large fleet of vehicles features its own hardware and embedded software challenges. You‚Äôll get to see it all, so come along for the ride.

Closing & equal opportunities employer statement

Come as you are

Dott is an equal opportunities employer. We invest in diversity, ensure equality and encourage expression. We have a zero-tolerance policy for harassment, bias or discrimination towards applicants and employees.

Want to join us for the ride? Let‚Äôs do this right ‚Äì together.

Milan /

Marketing & Communications ‚Äì City Marketing /

Permanent

title: Senior Cloud DevOps Engineer
description:
Introduction

Cloud Engineers in IBM‚Äôs Garage are part of a cross-functional team delivering a unique client co-creation experience to accelerate client transformation. As part of an entrepreneurial team, you will use contemporary technologies and approaches to design, develop, test, and deliver solutions. You will apply a user-centric approach to ensure all features add value for the user and achieve the desired client impact. You understand the nuances of different cloud solutions (hybrid, public, private, multi-cloud, on-prem) and implications for solution design. You understand the relationship among various technologies and architectures and how they contribute to the overall solution. You will develop a deep understanding of complex, large scale multi-region solutions which utilize multiple independent life cycle microservices. An ideal candidate will be familiar with Design Thinking, Behavior and Test-Driven Development, and application of Agile methodologies.

Your Role and Responsibilities

Have you heard about the IBM Garage? It's a cross-functional team that delivers a unique client co-creation experience to accelerate client transformation. We use Enterprise Design Thinking, our industry-leading IBM Garage Methodology and IBM's multidisciplinary experts in full speed from the start. We design, develop, test, and deliver solutions. Startup speed. Enterprise scale. We apply user-centric approaches to ensure all features add value for the user and achieve desired client impact.

Your Role And Responsibilities

To be successful in this role you will need to:

Demonstrate a growth mindset and continuous learning; stay current on IBM strategies and offerings with understanding of technical principles of Docker and Kubernetes
Use DevOps engineering practices and methods to plan and create software applications
Employs IBM's Design Thinking to create products and services that provide a great user experience along with high performance, security, quality, and stability; ensure that the implemented solutions are unit tested and ready to integrate in products
Demonstrate strong analytical, problem solving and troubleshooting skills combined in an Agile process
Engineer solutions in areas such as cloud foundation, cloud services, cloud management applications, machine learning, computational linguistics, natural language processing and security applications

IBMReferred_Europe

Required

Technical and Professional Expertise

At least 2 years hands-on software engineering
At least 1 year of client facing experience - strong, collaborative client relationships
Basic knowledge of various cloud solutions (hybrid, public, private, multi-cloud, on-prem)
Experience APIs (RESTful, etc.)
Design and implement automated cloud solutions that implement CI/CD best practices
Basic knowledge of Java or middleware technology (WebSphere, etc.)
Professional experience; IT Specialist; pre-sales, proof of concept, integration, data lake, business process design

Preferred Technical And Professional Expertise

At least 3 years hands-on software engineering
At least 2 years experience in building cloud applications
At least 2 years experience in software development using Java and other languages
At least 2 years in a client facing role building strong, collaborative relationships
At least 2 years with various cloud solutions (hybrid, public, private, multi-cloud, on-prem)
Networking DevOps/Development background
Experience in LeanUX and working with multi-disciplinary teams of design, development, and product management

Preferred Expertise

IBM Cloud Platform
Multi-cloud environments including: AWZ, Azure, IBM Cloud, or Google Cloud
Test Driven Development
Mac/Linux
Watson, Analytics, Mobile, Node.js or React (may be a plus)
IBM Cloud Pak Knowledge will be appreciated

About Business Unit

IBM has a global presence, operating in more than 175 countries with a broad-based geographic distribution of revenue. The company‚Äôs Global Markets organization is a strategic sales business unit that manages IBM‚Äôs global footprint, working closely with dedicated country-based operating units to serve clients locally. These country teams have client relationship managers who lead integrated teams of consultants, solution specialists and delivery professionals to enable clients‚Äô growth and innovation. By complementing local expertise with global experience and digital capabilities, IBM builds deep and broad-based client relationships. This local management focus fosters speed in supporting clients, addressing new markets and making investments in emerging opportunities. Additionally, the Global Markets organization serves clients with expertise in their industry as well as through the products and services that IBM and partners supply. IBM is also expanding its reach to new and existing clients through digital marketplaces.

Your Life @ IBM

About IBM

Location Statement

IBM wants you to bring your whole self to work and for you, this might

mean the ability to work flexibly. If you are interested in a flexible working pattern,

please talk to our recruitment team to find out if this is possible in the current working environment.

Being You @ IBM

IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. title: Distribution Field Marketing Senior Advisor - Milan
description:
Distribution Field Marketing Senior Advisor

Milan

Assessing market trends, quantifying opportunities and developing marketing programs, Field Marketing at Dell Technologies is at the forefront of customer engagement. Responsible for a specific location, department or product, our teams drive marcom strategy ‚Äì from making budget recommendations to defining roadmaps and informing content themes. Interacting directly with customers and utilizing third-party customer data, they provide Dell‚Äôs product marketing and messaging team with game-changing feedback. At the highest level, they develop and drive marketing policies and activities, from market research through brand management and product development to pricing.

Join us as a DistributionField Marketing Senior Advisor on our Marketing Team in Milan to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.

What You‚Äôll Achieve

As a Distribution Field Marketing Snr Advisor, you will work on the development and execution of the go-to-market field marketing plans to support specific growth initiatives, localizing and adapting global content and programs that achieve sales demand.

You will make a significant contribution to achieving our Italian business goals through:

Understanding go-to-market and distribution marketing & sales strategies for the country and then developing, implementing and executing marketing programs and projects that align with those strategies and broader business priorities.
Interacting, meeting and influencing with Dell Authorized Distributors to enhance, create and implement marketing strategies, plans and activities that drive Distribution Sell thu, increase pipeline and meet our revenue goals
Managing properly MDF budget in order to maximize Sell Thru and Pipeline return.
Managing outsourced agencies to deliver key local distribution activities (events, incentives, webinars), leveraging the regional and central marketing resources and programs, and providing proactive feedback to the EMEA central marketing team
Driving collaboration across multiple functions including distributors, Italian country marketing team, distribution account managers and inside partner account managers to operate as one team and contribute to regular distribution and Marketing QBR and readiness reviews.


Take the first step towards your dream career

Essential Requirements

Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here‚Äôs what we are looking for with this role:

Experience: 8-10 years relevant distribution marketing experience
Strong knowledge of business and marketing strategy thru distributors, concepts tools and techniques, including online marketing, direct marketing, promotions, customer relations and advertising in the technological sector and with channel
Very good presentation and executive communication skills, Italian mother tongue and fluent in English.
Strong ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams/work groups.
Good analytical ability and financial understanding


Here‚Äôs our story; now tell us yours

Dell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We‚Äôre proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress.

What‚Äôs most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life ‚Äî while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more.

We started with computers, but we didn‚Äôt stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what‚Äôs next in technology, starting today.

You can also learn more about us by reading our latest Diversity and Inclusion Report and our plan to make the world a better place by 2030 here.

Application closing date: 5 July 2021

Dell is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. All employment decisions at Dell are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to race, color, religion or belief, national, social or ethnic origin, sex (including pregnancy), age, physical, mental or sensory disability, HIV Status, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, marital, civil union or domestic partnership status, past or present military service, family medical history or genetic information, family or parental status, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate. Dell will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics. Dell encourages applicants of all ages. Read the full Employment Opportunity Policy here.

title: Product Marketing Manager
description:
DESCRIPTION




Myntelligence is an international group that operates across 25 countries in 4 continents from its 3 offices in Milan, London and S√£o Paulo.

Myntelligence's platform, Adding provides advertisers with a single interface to execute their entire media spend on all AdTech platforms across all channels (Search, Social, Display, Video, Native, Affiliation, Programmatic Radio, Addressable TV, etc.).¬†

Adding, uses machine learning algorithms to automate and optimize campaigns, enabling advertisers to effortlessly increase revenues and advertising ROI through enhanced efficiency.¬†

With a more holistic overview of consumers‚Äô behaviour built by putting together data signals coming from all different platforms orchestrated (a real journey-based view of all customer interactions), advertisers can stop making marketing decisions based on pure assumptions, and they can start communicating with their customers at relevant points in the buying process, improving engagement and conversion rates.¬†




Role:




We are looking for an ambitious Product Marketing Manager (PMM) to join our growing product team in Milan. As PMM you are our marketing ninja, you know what to tell the world about our software products and solutions to have the maximum impact. You work closely with our Founders and our engineering & product teams to translate complex technical concepts and features of our software products into inspiring product positioning, messaging, and value proposition.

In detail you will:

Be responsible for creation and execution of end-to-end marketing campaigns to position our products as solutions for our customers and partners worldwide.√¨
Put together and deliver our technical and business-level messaging, you help
Implement our go-to-market strategy, and you craft sales enablement plans for our product offerings.
partner with product development and engineering teams through the complete product development cycle to help create our communication strategies for our platform.
increase our solutions‚Äô social, digital and events presence and visibility.
Work closely with our marketing and business development team to craft and review marketing content and run dedicated marketing campaigns.
Take care of the creative development and publication of a wide range of product related marketing material from writing blog posts, thought leadership pieces, case studies, conducting webinars to conveying our products specs to our customers and partners.
Support our sales efforts by developing enabling collateral for all stages of the sales cycle, like slide decks, white papers, videos etc.
Be responsible for our brand management and identity: you communicate and successfully position our efforts in the advertising¬†ecosystem.¬†
Contribute towards building a strong Myntelligence brand with deep reach into our global community.
Analyze and report marketing KPIs to track impact, optimize and improve our positioning in the open source ecosystem and with B2B customers.




What skills you should have:

Ôªø

at least 5 years experience in product marketing roles in the enterprise software (SaaS) space.¬†
a solid understanding of product marketing, inbound marketing, and content marketing.¬†
a good familiarity with the process of product management and how product marketing fits into it.¬†
a solid knowledge of marketing analytics, automation, and content creation tools; up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in digital marketing.
a gained experience working with B2B software companies and familiarity with the dynamics and customer journey in enterprise B2B companies.¬†
a fluency to deal with technical information and translate technical knowledge into customer benefits.¬†
a proven ability to craft engaging content in excellent English, including blog posts, white-papers, slide decks, videos, etc.
hands on with the attitude to get things done. We will challenge you on this!
a Bachelor‚Äôs Degree (B.S./B.A.), a Master‚Äôs/MBA is a plus. Relevant fields of study include Business Administration, Computer Science, Marketing.

title: Software Engineer - Sysdig Secure (Milan)
description:
Sysdig is the secure DevOps company, and we're at the forefront of the container, Kubernetes, and cloud revolution. We are passionate, technical problem-solvers, continually innovating and delivering powerful solutions to confidently run cloud-native applications. Our consistent contributions to open source software projects reflect our commitment to the open cloud movement.

We value diversity and open dialog to spur ideas, working closely together to achieve goals. And we're a great place to work too -- we were awarded the 2021 Bay Area Best Places to Work Award from San Francisco Business Times and the Silicon Valley Business Journal. We are looking for team members who share our commitment to customers and are willing to dig deeper, understand problems and deliver innovative solutions. Does this sound like the right place for you?

Your Opportunity

As a Software Engineer, you will work end to end on our security side of the product, from architecting to delivery, creating new features and functionalities. You will work closely with our established engineering team located throughout the US and Europe, product team and customers. Sysdig is a high growth startup, and there will be significant expansion opportunities for this position. Our customer base is enlarging fast and so is the scale demanded of our backend. As a consequence, we are adding new features to our secure product line and enhancing existing capabilities.

Your Responsibilities

You'll lead projects as part of this effort that will allow us to build services to help customers manage their infrastructure in a secure manner.
Work as a main point of contact and interface with various teams including Product, Frontend, Design, Customers and other stakeholders
Build distributed services which can consume and process billions of customer's system events and network activity.
Put machine learning features into production
Handle security data on a daily basis across multiple platform tiers (Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, GCP)


Your Background

Prior experience building distributed services
Systems software experience including good understanding of system calls
Strong computer science fundamentals in design, data structures, and algorithms
Experience in Go is highly preferred
Experience in Java is a plus
Prior experience with AWS/GCP and building security products is a plus
Experience with Kubernetes is a plus
Startup / entrepreneurial experience is a plus
A positive "can do" attitude with the ability to articulate thoughts and ideas and see them to fruition
An appetite for varied data


Key Technologies

Go
Java
ElasticSearch
Redis
Postgres
Kafka/NATS
Linux


When you join Sysdig, you can expect:

Competitive salary
Flexible working hours


Additionally, we offer a variety of benefits and perks, such as:

Generous monthly allowance that can be used for the following types of expenses: employee wellness, house cleaning services, home internet, phone expenses, office supplies, office furniture and more
Ticket restaurants
Fantastic office location in the heart of Brera district!


Some of our hiring managers are based internationally, an up to date CV in English would be appreciated.

description:

Assunzione con contratto a tempo indeterminato

In AGS consideriamo la formazione delle nostre risorse come motore di crescita e di nuove idee. Un investimento continuo per l‚Äôinnovazione e lo sviluppo. Chi entra a far parte di AGS entra in un network di crescita personale e professionale continua e in un ambiente di lavoro altamente stimolante ed innovativo composto da centinaia di talenti.

AGS ACADEMY realizza decine e decine di corsi per aggiornare e ampliare le competenze dei nostri specialisti; programmi strutturati di aggiornamento e specializzazione, che possono arrivare fino alla Certificazione presso enti terzi.

I corsi di AGS Academy vengono tenuti in due modalit√†: ‚Äúin aula‚Äù presso le nostre Sedi e ‚ÄúCorsi Smart‚Äù, che possono essere fruiti dove e quando si preferisce, in completa autonomia anche da Smartphone o Tablet.ABOUT AGS

Oggi √® Composta Da Business Unit Che Lavorano In Sinergia Per Offrire Soluzioni All‚Äôavanguardia Su Varie Aree Di Competenza

AGS S.p.A.

Consulting: da anni collaboriamo con i Big Player del mercato di varie industry (Banking, Telco, IT, Automotive, Pharmaceutics ), confermando e rinnovando la nostra partnership ormai pluriennale.
Software Factory: all‚Äôinterno del nostro HQ realizziamo prodotti, soluzioni e servizi per grandi clienti. La nostra Factory √® composta da vari professionisti nel mondo dello sviluppo divisi per competenze verticali. Sempre all‚Äôavanguardia in ambito tecnologico, abbiamo integrato le aree di: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Artificial Intelligence e CP7.
Produzione: dopo anni di Ricerca e Sviluppo, abbiamo creato nuovi materiali (Polimetilmetacrilato, Acrilico, Azanite) ottenuti attraverso cicli produttivi ad energia pulita, innovativi ed ecofriendly, adoperati nella riqualificazione energetica e nella realizzazione delle facciate termoventilate.
Real Estate e Facility Management: nel 2020 abbiamo creato la divisione AGS Real Estate per andare incontro all‚Äôesigenze del mercato. Formata da pi√π di 50 architetti e ingegneri, uniamo le nostre varie anime per sviluppare soluzioni di efficientamento e riqualificazione di immobili.
Robotics & Automation: l‚Äôesperienza consolidata da AGS in oltre 20 anni ci ha portato a creare macchine all‚Äôavanguardia diverse dalle altre presenti sul mercato. Aumentare la leadership tecnologica, investendo nelle competenze nei settori pi√π all‚Äôavanguardia dell‚ÄôIT, anticipando l‚Äôevoluzione dei mercati e rispondendo alle richieste dei clienti.

I nostri Valori

Progettiamo innovazione. Creiamo prodotti originali, nati dalla ricerca e dalle tecnologie di ultima generazione, che si distinguono per funzionalit√†, usabilit√† e innovazione.

Soluzioni IT sempre un passo avanti. Offriamo Consulenza, Progetti, Servizi e Soluzioni IT mirati alla creazione di valore nei processi delle aziende.

title: Solution Architect - PS Retail Transformation
description:
About NCR

NCR Corporation (NYSE: NCR) is a leading software- and services-led enterprise provider in the financial, retail and hospitality industries. NCR is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, with 36,000 employees globally. NCR is a trademark of NCR Corporation in the United States and other countries.

How would you like to work with a company that is revolutionizing the business and digital transformation of the Retail Industry?

Retail is changing in a big way. And NCR‚Äôs Retail Transformation Consulting is at the forefront of delivering world-class Retail Services. As a services-led company, NCR is looking for Solution Architects with deep technical background and client-facing consulting experience. At NCR, you will not only be a valued consultant, but you will become a ‚Äútrusted advisor‚Äù to our clients and partners. Through strategic planning, business process improvement, and rapid design and delivery of technology solutions, you‚Äôll be instrumental in driving technology adoption and value realization. This is an exciting opportunity to develop and scale our next generation of innovative retail transformation offerings, and it starts with you.

Solution Architects work as a part of an integrated consulting team to design, develop and deliver NCR solutions to Retail clients around the world. Your role will be to help audit clients‚Äô current state, identify needs in their Retail Technology Architecture, and recommend the appropriate solutions.

Position Summary And Key Areas Of Responsibilities

This is a client facing business development role, ultimately responsible for the successful delivery of architectural and technical aspects of client transformation engagements.

In This Exciting Role, You Will

This role is one of the highest technical roles within NCR Professional Services, and it requires a combination of qualities that will enable a successful candidate to lead business and technical initiatives within NCR and with our clients.

Become an expert in NCR‚Äôs Business Services Platform (BSP) (learn more at https://developer.ncr.com ) which powers NCR‚Äôs next generation retail store architecture
Apply NCR‚Äôs suite of integrated solutions to help Retailers Run their Stores and connect better with their customers.
Work in a team of Enterprise/Cloud Solution architects.
Support Customer Experience and Business Process Consulting activities by identifying enabling technologies.
Drive Business Development encompassing understanding client needs, developing services offers and solutions leveraging the NCR products and platforms.
Support the Strategic consultants and Client Partners in transformation initiatives.
Lead client facing conversations on migrating to Cloud-based solutions.
Contribute to technical and retail transformation thought leadership.
Understand Retail client‚Äôs business challenges and translate into solutions.
Write technology consulting briefs and related presentations that meet client needs.
Provide end to end 'holistic' client engagement leadership and support.

Specific Duties

Collaborating with broad range of business and technical teams in Sales, Pre-sales, Product, Engineering, Professional Services both internally as well as externally. .
Demonstrating technical credibility and a consultative approach with existing and prospective clients.
Understanding and presenting best practices from a technology perspective and in the context of NCR‚Äôs product, solution and service portfolio.
Working with data architecture, such as transactional and analytical processing, real-time analytics, etc.
Design and guidance on implementing multi-tenant SaaS systems.


Basic Qualifications

Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in a Technical Discipline or equivalent work experience.
5+ years of experience in Solution Architecture including software and infrastructure.
3+ years of Consulting experience working with and presenting to end-user senior managers and ‚ÄúC‚Äù level executives.
Strong business and client acumen.
Experience in technical leadership of a team in a matrix environment.
Experience with hands-on software development.


Preferred Qualifications

Experience in the Retail Industry supporting Retail clients is highly preferred.
Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in Software Engineering or related field.
Experience with cloud-based technologies and cloud adoption at the enterprise scale (e.g. leading enterprise-wide adoption of PaaS, Big Data platforms).
Experience articulating non-functional requirements and working with product/engineering teams to create seamless solution architectures.
Experience with Docker and orchestration/deployment models in Kubernetes.
Ability to articulate and explain the latest technologies (PaaS, Big Data Analytics, API platforms), continuous improvement of scaled processes and best practices.
Experience with public Cloud offerings such as Google Cloud Platform, Azure, or Amazon.
Experience programming in multiple languages such as Java, C#, C, Python, and others.
Experience installing, configuring, or managing package software (such as Point-of-Sale, Loyalty, Labor Management, Accounting, etc.).
Familiar with today‚Äôs Machine Learning approaches.
Comfortable visually translating business needs into related diagrams and explaining technical underpinnings for solution stacks.
Experience designing solutions using accepted microservice architectures (such as the Strangler Fig pattern).
Experience with cloud native microservices architecture, data architecture, analytics, software/application architecture.

Professional

Passionate: enjoys design and collaboration.
Pragmatic and result oriented
Articulate: able to produce and communicate complex solutions to a wide variety of audiences.
Self Sufficient and Life-long learner: continual learner who stays current on the latest technologies (attends and ideally presents at technical conferences).
Curious: always looking for ways to improve.

Offers of employment are conditional upon passage of screening criteria applicable to the job.

EEO Statement

Integrated into our shared values is NCR‚Äôs commitment to diversity. NCR is committed to being a globally inclusive company where all people are treated fairly, recognized for their individuality, promoted based on performance and encouraged to strive to reach their full potential. We believe in understanding and respecting differences among all people. NCR does not discriminate in employment based on sex, age, race, color, creed, religion, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, veteran status, military service, genetic information, or any other characteristic or conduct protected by law. Every individual at NCR has an ongoing responsibility to respect and support a globally diverse environment.

Statement to Third Party Agencies

To ALL recruitment agencies: NCR only accepts resumes from agencies on the NCR preferred supplier list. Please do not forward resumes to our applicant tracking system, NCR employees, or any NCR facility. NCR is not responsible for any fees or charges associated with unsolicited resumes

title: Senior Backend Engineer
description:
Description

TrueLayer‚Äôs Data Products team builds products that reduce the friction and cost involved in financial transactions, using data. Our data products power many of the most widely-used fintech apps in Europe today ‚Äî from personal budgeting tools to online lending to onboarding for all kinds of companies. We do this by allowing clients to retrieve financial data securely and quickly, with millions of API calls being made every day.

In 2020 we doubled the number of our connections to financial institutions across the UK and Europe. As we continue to grow, we're looking to find new ways to help our clients provide a first class experience for their users. To do this we‚Äôre continuing to optimise machine learning models models trained on millions of rows of transaction data, scale services that process millions of API calls every day and improve our frontend components so that hundreds of thousands of users can easily connect their accounts every day.

To achieve this we use best-in-class technologies including C#/.Net Core for development, Docker containers orchestrated with Kubernetes, AWS cloud infrastructure, ElasticSearch, Prometheus for observability, RabbitMQ, Redis, Postgres and more.

Who We Are

At TrueLayer, we build intelligent financial infrastructure that puts fintech at people's fingertips.

Businesses use our global network, built on open banking and PSD2, to securely access financial data and enable instant payments. Headquartered in London with offices in Milan, Dublin, Sydney, and Hong Kong, we‚Äôve raised $ 142M to date and we‚Äôre trusted by some of the biggest names in tech, including Revolut, Trading 212, and Zopa.

We are systems builders, design thinkers, product crafters and committed doers. We work in a collaborative, transparent environment where people can be their true selves, embrace ownership and accountability, and build something that will define an industry.

Our vision is to create a financial ecosystem that is open to everyone. We‚Äôve grown from a UK leader in 2020 to a global provider in 2021, operating in 12+ countries. The thing is, we're just getting started‚Ä¶

As a Senior Backend Engineer, You Will

Own new product features, from breaking down requirements to planning tasks for you and your team, and shipping to production rapidly and regularly
Help make our platform globally scalable, reliable and available
Conduct code reviews and share knowledge with other engineers to maximise everyone‚Äôs potential and growth
Help shape the future of engineering at TrueLayer
Contribute to our culture and help make sure TrueLayer remains an exceptional place to work

Voluntary On-Call Duty

If Interested, You Can Train With, And Join, Our On-call Rota, Which Will Involve Compensated Rotations Of

While being on call is a fantastic learning experience, we understand being on call out of hours is not for everyone, so at TrueLayer it‚Äôs voluntary.

Being On-Call to respond to critical incidents affecting the availability of our platform
Identifying, mitigating and resolving root causes of such incidents
Coordinating our response to potentially major incidents, and being an active voice in postmortem/root cause analysis discussions to prevent future problems.


Requirements

You'll need to demonstrate:

Proven experience building distributed systems in C#
Understanding of SOLID and other common design patterns
Familiarity of API design and experience with at least one web framework
Understanding of Object‚Äìrelational mapping technologies
Appreciation of challenges surrounding microservices architecture
Familiarity with testing best practices - TDD, Unit Testing and Integration Testing, etc.
Experience with observability and alerting of mission-critical distributed systems


We‚Äôd Be Particularly Excited If You Have

A solid grasp of SQL and efficient use of caching
Understanding of Protocol Buffers, gRPC, and message queue systems


Benefits

What you can expect from us:

Competitive salary and meaningful equity in the company √∞¬∞
Flexible hours ‚åõ and remote work √∞¬°
Choice of Linux or Mac technology √∞¬ª
A remote-working stipend to help set up your home office √∞¬∫
Flexible holiday policy ‚úàÔ∏è
Generous parental leave √∞¬©‚Äç√∞¬©‚Äç√∞¬¶
Private Health Insurance √∞
√∞¬Ω‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è
12 fully-paid Wellbeing Days a year (on top of the holiday allowance) √∞Ô∏è
Membership of mental wellbeing platform Spill √∞
√∞¬Ω‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
Learning & development allowance √∞

Inclusion & Diversity

At TrueLayer, we don‚Äôt just do inclusion and diversity. We embrace people that have different opinions, perspectives and personalities. Because we believe that by seeing the world from all sorts of angles, we can make life better for all the people who live in it. So we want you to know that the things that make you, you ‚Äî like your age, ability, background and identity ‚Äî are things that we celebrate and support. All we ask is that you believe in what you do (And know what an API is).

title: Marketing Manager - Milan and North Italy
description:
We believe in a future where inner cities are free of cars, congestion and pollution. By offering our dockless electrical scooters and bikes as convenient alternatives for short-distance travel, we believe we can make that future possible. Our mission is to free our cities with clean rides for everyone in Europe and beyond.

Founded in Europe, Dott is comprised of a highly experienced team of inquisitive minds in mobility and tech. What we do today has a tangible impact on tomorrow. We reached our in-house sustainability target of 100% renewable energy, and ensure equitability in our communities through collaborating with city charities, officials and safety boards.

We‚Äôre looking for an entrepreneurial Marketing Manager to join the Italian team. The Marketing Manager will be responsible for all marketing activities in the North of Italy, with focus on branding and demand generation. They will work hand in hand with the Central Marketing team and local operations. You will report to the Senior Central Marketing Manager.

Demand and acquisition (80%)

Responsible for acquisition and growth of riders in Milan & North Italy markets
Responsible for ensuring marketing plans are effective and provide a good return on investment (business, marketing & comms - offline & online)
Responsible for sourcing and managing local acquisition partnerships
Promo codes partnerships
Ambassador programs
Co-marketing/BD partnerships
Responsible for local street marketing activities
Responsible for the execution of local marketing and comms strategy
Performance marketing support (translations, definition of content)
CRM support


Brand preference (20%)

Be the Brand guardian in your market and ensure consistency with global brand image.
Manage local Social Media accounts (community management, local contents sourcing, production and publishing).
Develop and implement local partnerships (owned and non-owned) in your city (with key events, key influencers or key places).
Coordinate local PR (monitoring, sourcing, day-to-day follow-up).
Get local insights & data re- the market, brand, competition and ridership.
Responsible for planning and defining local marketing and comms strategy
Responsible for brand partnerships & brand ambassadors campaign


What You'll Need

A minimum of 4-5 years in marketing / brand management, with a recognized post graduate / graduate degree in marketing / brand / communications
Excellent oral and written communication skills in English and Italian
Data-driven & Marketing ROI
Strong networker: local relationships with local business, the local marketing ecosystem, local influencers and opinion leaders
Hands-on and city / partnerships lover
Actively involved in in on-the-ground, street and event marketing
Multi-task and prioritize workload with quick turnarounds
Excellent problem-solving skills
Energetic and collaborative with a great work ethic
Past experience as a promoter would be a plus
Based in Milan, with flexibility to travel (Covid-19 permitting)


What‚Äôs in it for me?

Alongside a competitive compensation plan, we invite our employees to participate in our stock option plan. You‚Äôll be part of a collaborative, energetic and international team who enjoy the perks of flexible working hours, medical insurance contribution and fun company events.

At Dott, we are passionate and challenge each other to deliver on our dreams. We constantly perfect our craft. We own our mission and keep pushing for the company, cities and planet. On that note, be prepared to take on exciting challenges. We operate a consumer service that sees millions of transactions every week. Our operations services are backed by deep machine learning, and our large fleet of vehicles features its own hardware and embedded software challenges. You‚Äôll get to see it all, so come along for the ride.

Closing & equal opportunities employer statement

Come as you are

Dott is an equal opportunities employer. We invest in diversity, ensure equality and encourage expression. We have a zero-tolerance policy for harassment, bias or discrimination towards applicants and employees.

Want to join us for the ride? Let‚Äôs do this right ‚Äì together.

title: Laboratory Technician in Leased Labor Contract
description:
Direct message the job poster from Micron Technology

Kevin Daniel
Talent Acquisition Innovation Manager at Micron Technology


Our vision is to transform how the world uses information to enrich life. Join an inclusive team passionate about one thing: using their expertise in the relentless pursuit of innovation for customers and partners. The solutions we build help make everything from virtual reality experiences to breakthroughs in neural networks possible. We do it all while committing to integrity, sustainability, and giving back to our communities. Because doing so can fuel the very innovation we are pursuing.

Description

of the role: a laboratory technician is responsible to organize and manage daily activities related to silicon measurements and material move. Materials are represented from silicon wafers and Micron Memory Products. He contributes in fix hardware/software problems acting as first maintenance level able to involve the experts when needed.

Responsibility
Silicon and assy parts management
Probe card management:
probe card storage and cleaning
wafer set up preparation
Daily organization
Stop and priority management
Processing of non-standard lots
Bake management
To provide ovens set-up
To track wafer in/ wafer out
Prober/tester management
Equipment reset
Evaluation of hardware problems
Equipment loading
To load material on all laboratory equipment optimizing tests in order to maximize tool usage
General support when needed to maintenance, engineering and production
manage materials move-in, move-out and storage, using a dedicated sw database

Skills

Good mechanical and electronic skills
Focus on workflow procedures
Good computer skills and knowledge
English language knowledge

Education

High School Diploma, degree in an electronics related field

Working Time

It is requested to work on shifts

This if a fixed term position in leased labor contract with duration of up to 12 months

Before uploading your CV to apply for this position, please review our Employment Privacy Notice. Micron recruiters use review tools to identify your unique skill set based on the information in your CV, to inform the recruiter of skills you may have that are not listed on your CV (based on your career history and work experience), to supplement the information provided in your CV with information obtained from publicly accessible professional-oriented sources (such as your publicly available LinkedIn profile) and to assess how closely your skill set matches the defined skill set for this position. While submitting your CV through this platform is not obligatory, we encourage you to do so.

If you do not want to benefit from the skill and qualification matching features, then you should not upload your CV through this platform. Instead, email your CV to EMEA_HR_TEAM@micron.com along with the Req Id number listed in the job description. Your CV will be forwarded to the appropriate recruiter for review.

About Micron Technology, Inc.

We are an industry leader in innovative memory and storage solutions. Through our global brands ‚Äì Micron¬Æ and Crucial¬Æ ‚Äì our broad portfolio of high-performance memory and storage technologies, including DRAM, NAND, 3D XPoint‚Ñ¢ memory and NOR, is transforming how the world uses information to enrich life. Backed by more than 40 years of technology leadership, our memory and storage solutions enable disruptive trends, including artificial intelligence, 5G, machine learning and autonomous vehicles, in key market segments like mobile, data center, client, consumer, industrial, graphics, automotive, and networking. Our common stock is traded on the Nasdaq under the MU symbol. To learn more visit micron.com/careers.

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status.

For US Sites Only: To request assistance with the application process and/or for reasonable accommodations, please contact Micron‚Äôs Human Resources Department at 1-800-336-8918 or 208-368-4748 and/or by completing our General Contact Form

Supports engineering activities such as design, test, check-out, modification, fabrication, and assembly of prototype electro-mechanical systems, experimental design circuitry, or specialized test equipment. Applications may include analog, digital and/or video circuits and logic systems. title: Senior Commercial Analyst
description:
More about the role

Join a team that is changing millions of lives.

Transforming smiles, changing lives

‚ÄØ

At‚ÄØAlign Technology, we believe a great smile can transform a person‚Äôs life, so we create technology that gives people the confidence to take on whatever‚Äôs next. We revolutionized the orthodontic industry with the introduction of the Invisalign system, and we have never lost sight of that spirit of innovation. Our diverse and collaborative teams are constantly pushing the boundaries of what‚Äôs possible.

‚ÄØ

Ready to join us?‚ÄØ

About This Opportunity

In Align Technology‚Äôs vision, Commercial Excellence lays at the heart of our commercial success. Align seeks to enhance the way we empower our sales team, scale up the sales team to sustainable growth, better support and influence our dental customers and patients to fully leverage and benefit from the digital transformation of the dental industry.

To that end, Align is seeking a Commercial Business Analyst to support the Senior Manager - Commercial Business Partner for Core Europe Markets (including DACH, France, Iberia, Italy and UK/I). The Commercial Business Analyst will be part of the EMEA Commercial Excellence organization, will report to the Senior Manager - Commercial Business Partner for Core Europe Markets and can be located in any of the 5 Core Europe Markets (DACH, France, Iberia, Italy and UK/I).

In this role, you will‚Ä¶

Analyze data to provide actionable insights to the Sales Managers and their Sales Teams related to local commercial opportunities and threats
Organize and coordinate key information, insights and actions for Quarterly Planning meetings and Sales trainings to help and support the Sales Managers prioritizing their focus areas and opportunities to improve existing sales operations, increase effectiveness and maximize impact on sales
Champion sales processes, KPIs and commercial programs to drive commercial excellence and sales force effectiveness among Sales Teams
Be responsible for adoption of the Sales Force Excellence tools and processes through change management enabling our sales force to win in a competitive market, considering local market specificities and leveraging local Marketing Managers and Sales Trainers
Identify local best practices, understand the key success factors behind them, design a scalable way of deploying them in other markets and support Sales Managers to adopt and implement them within their Sales teams.


In this role, you‚Äôll need ‚Ä¶

Master‚Äôs Degree in Economics, Computer Science, Finance, Engineering, or related fields with
6+ years of experience with sales management, sales operations, sales force effectiveness
To work in a fast-paced, high growth global matrix environment, where speed is often preferable over perfection
To be curious & analytical - must be able to ask the right questions, identify relevant sources, combine data sets, crunch numbers and present actionable conclusions
To be results-driven and pragmatic - understands that data is only valuable when it is translated to actionable insights for the business
To be experiences with managing stakeholders across marketing, sales, finance, HR, legal, IT and other corporate functions and have persuasive communication skills to clearly present business and technical issues, ideas, and recommendations in verbal, written, and presentation formats
To be experienced with process optimization, continuous improvement to enable creating capacity and reliable execution


Sound like a good fit?‚ÄØ‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

‚ÄØ

Great! Click the "Apply" link to let us know you are interested. Not the right fit? Don‚Äôt worry,‚ÄØAlign‚ÄØis quickly growing so we are creating more opportunities to expand our Align family. Please consider joining our Talent Network to receive notifications about future jobs or sharing this opportunity with others in your network.‚ÄØ‚ÄØ‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

‚ÄØ

About Align‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

Align Technology is a publicly traded medical device company that is‚ÄØtransforming smiles and changing lives. Our global team of talented employees develop innovative technology, tools and treatment options to help dental professionals worldwide achieve the clinical results they expect. Our digital ecosystem combines the power of technology to create beautiful smiles through the integration of AI and machine learning, digital imaging and visualization, biomechanics and material science to develop the Invisalign system, the most advanced clear aligner system in the world; iTero Intraoral Scanners and‚ÄØOrthoCAD‚ÄØdigital services. Did you know? Align is the world‚Äôs largest manufacturer of custom 3D-printed materials.‚ÄØ‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

By joining Align, you will be part of a global, fast-growing company in one of the most dynamic industries. Great people, innovative technologies, and meaningful work - these are just some of the‚ÄØthings‚ÄØemployees say make Align Technology a great place to work.‚ÄØ‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

We respect your privacy. Please review‚ÄØour Applicant Privacy Policies for additional information.‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

‚ÄØ

Global Diversity Statement

At Align, we believe in the power of a smile, and we know that every smile is as unique as our employees. As we grow, we will continue building a workforce of diverse cultural backgrounds and life experiences and fostering a culture of open-mindedness and compassion for all our employees. We live our company values by promoting healthy people and healthy communities. All with the intent of changing millions of lives, one unique smile at a time.

Equal Opportunity Statement

It is our policy to provide equal employment opportunity in all of our employment practices without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, marital status, protected veteran status, age, individuals with disabilities, sexual orientation or gender identity or expression or any other legally protected category. Applicants for positions with Align must be legally authorized to work in the country which they are applying for and verification of employment eligibility will be required as a condition of hire.

title: Senior Software and Cloud Engineer
description:

Eleonora Gallarati
Human Resources | Trainer | Assessment & Development Consultant

THE ROLE

As Senior Software and Cloud Engineer you will reinforce a team working on innovative data-driven projects. You will lead and contribute to the complete project delivery lifecycle, including requirements gathering, prototyping, project planning, implementation, testing and documentation.¬†




ABOUT US

Datrix is a group of 4 data-driven tech companies that develops B2B software solutions based on Artificial Intelligence for Marketing, Sales and Finance.

The Technology companies are:




3rdPlace¬†| user & customer AI¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†FinScience¬†| investment AI

ByTek¬†| performance marketing AI¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†PaperLit¬†| distribution & monetization AI




We are looking for truly motivated and passionate people. We offer you a young, stimulating and flexibly organized environment to work in. Datrix is the right place to develop your skills and knowledge.




MISSION

As a Senior Software and Cloud Engineer you will join a team of 10 to support, collaborate on and lead the development of multiple projects. Most of the initiatives leverage Google Cloud Platform to provide data-driven solutions for internal products and for consultancy services to external clients.
