Designing, developing and maintaining Python & JavaScript solutions

title: Account Executive (Italy)
description:
You will work closely with our VP Sales to acquire and build successful customer relationships in your region. You will be in charge of building long-term partnerships with key decision makers at large publishing companies. You will be responsible for making Echobox the leading provider in your region by actively selling the product by telephone and in person as well as by becoming the ambassador for our company at the highest levels in your region.

Key Responsibilities

Work with our VP Sales to grow the Echobox client base.
Be responsible for the entire sales funnel in your region.
Drive rapid growth to establish Echobox as the market leader in your region.


About Echobox

We are a fast-growing, research-driven company building an artificial intelligence that helps online publishers overcome the challenges they face every day. Using novel machine learning techniques, we are revolutionising the publishing industry and have a track record of building things that others have ruled out as impossible. Leading names from around the world rely on our product every day, including Il Sole 24 Ore, Hearst Italy, The Times, The Guardian, Vogue and many more.

Our team is our best asset. We work with extremely smart and talented individuals, who all enjoy a high degree of responsibility and independence in structuring their work.

Fluent written and spoken English

An understanding of product management and development

title: Senior Backend Software Engineer - relocate to Berlin!
description:
Vinted is Europe‚Äôs biggest pre-loved fashion marketplace, with 45 million members in 15 countries. We want to make second-hand the first choice worldwide.




A team of over 800 people from Vinted‚Äôs offices in Vilnius, Berlin, Prague, and Utrecht develop and support our platform. We share a unique work culture that‚Äôs based on aiming high, taking ownership, co-creating, caring, and growth.




As Vinted continues growing, we start expanding our Product domains teams to Berlin. Thus we‚Äôre looking for experienced Backend Software Engineers to join our Product Engineering teams there. If you‚Äôre skilled at writing elegant code and like working on big-scale projects, then Vinted could be for you!




As a Backend Software Engineer at Vinted you‚Äôll be working in a cross-functional team that has all the main competences that are needed to ship new features to our members without outside help. Usually such teams have mobile platform developers (iOS, Android), web developers, and one or two backend software engineers. You‚Äôll be the one who implements business logic and writes APIs that our mobile and web platforms can use. You‚Äôll be also responsible for growing our backend platform to handle a wider scale. Also by joining Vinted, you‚Äôll become part of an active community of engineers who are keen on sharing knowledge, organising learning workshops and so much more!




Your main aim will be preparing our product for the challenges that lie ahead and making sure it contributes to the Vinted vision of making second-hand the first choice.




Note. This role is based in Berlin thus we will expect your full relocation to Berlin. By the way, we will be supporting you in this step!




In This Position, You Will

Work in a team and shape the features to make our members‚Äô life better.
Apply Agile and Lean principles in your work.
Collaborate with other developers through GitHub pull requests and code reviews.
Write unit tests (RSpec) for all of the code you write. We have >10000 tests which run in ~5 minutes through our Jenkins setup.
See your code affect 45 million users almost instantly. Our master branch gets rolled out straight to production on each merge. We deploy many times per day.
Work with Ruby on Rails, MySQL, Memcached, Elasticsearch and many more technologies. We don't expect you to be familiar with all of them beforehand.
Craft the code which can handle more than 2M requests per minute. Monitor your deployed code through Kibana, Grafana, DataDog and new tools that you will introduce :)




What Do We Expect

You have experience working with Ruby on Rails
You should be willing to learn and master new technologies and concepts.
We expect you to be familiar with most, and have deep knowledge in some (depending on your seniority) of the following disciplines: Software Engineering, Functional Programming, Data Structures, Algorithms, Machine Learning, Web Development, Systems Programming, Distributed Systems, Systems Architecture, Computer Science.




Perks

Opportunity to join our share options programme
Learning budget (10% from gross annual salary)
28 working days of holiday
All the tech you need to do your job
Monthly team-building events
A personal budget for shopping on Vinted
Dog-friendly office




If this sounds interesting - you may well be just who we need. If you‚Äôre interested, contact us and we will be in touch with you.

Plus, take a look at https://vinted.engineering/ to see what we‚Äôre up to.

title: Middle C++ Unreal Engine4 Developer
company_name: ZURU TECH ITALY - Creative Impact (Hong Kong) Limited
description:
We want to make the design of houses and their direct manufacturing accessible to everyone through an architectural design software, with an astonishing graphical visualization and very simple to use.

What we‚Äôre developing is the first BIM software able to realize real buildings! Brilliant inventions take shape from brilliant minds. We all believe our product is extraordinary so we‚Äôre looking for extraordinary people too.

What are you going to do?

First of all you‚Äôll be part of a team of brilliant engineers, with many different specialties: coding, graphics, artist, ui/ux design and machine learning. You‚Äôll work in a funny and modern environment with outdoor team building activities like trekking and paintball, game sessions with PS4 and NES Classic, air-hockey and table tennis tournament. Starting from day one, you‚Äôll be assigned to a team of our R&D department and you‚Äôll be responsible of implementing graphic algorithms in C ++ and building software solutions for the automatic design of buildings and interior design. You‚Äôll research current trends in emerging technologies and implement them. Interacting with the UI / UX team and collaborating with other offices (primarily India and China) to create our multiplatform software (Windows, iOS, MacOs, Android, VR).

Requisiti di lavoro

If you feel different from many other software developers, let‚Äôs consider what we‚Äôre looking for.

Of course, you must be a C++ lover, because we need a proven experience in C ++ programming and analysis (2+ years). You like to solve complex problems through software engineering in general, but what really makes the difference from many others is a passion for geometry and mathematics and 3D graphics algorithms. If you consider yourself a fan of computer graphics, of course you know Unreal Engine4 is and its extraordinary functions and possibilities. So we expect you have a good knowledge about its using or the use of an equivalent graphics engine. Many of our best programmers started learning graphics engine by their own passion and amusement, so we'd be glad to see any of yours experiments or personal projects, especially if developed for Windows and mobile devices. So send us a portfolio, we'd be keen to examine it. In our workplace the level of interaction and teamworking is very high, so we seek a lively and positive person, with excellent interpersonal skills, able to work with many young people. At last we value a degree in Computer Engineering or Computer science and you speak and write english quite well.

Altre informazioni sul lavoro

WE OFFER: level and contract period commensurate with the matured experience, combined with an individual career plan. We expect you‚Äôll be a Senior dev in 2 years of work with us.

Our Compensation Plan Includes

extra salary bonus;
time flexibility;
meal vouchers;
free espresso coffee and water;
participation in international congresses and conferences in the CG field.

WORKING CENTER: MILAN TOWN CENTER

The research is addressed to both sexes (Legislative Decree No. 198/2006) and to people of all ages and all nationalities, pursuant to legislative decrees 215/03 and 216/03. Candidates interested and in possession of the requirements are invited to send their curriculum vitae, including the authorization to process personal data, pursuant to Legislative Decree 196/03 and to the art. 13 GDPR 679/16. We will only use your personal information to provide you service you requested from us. We only keep the information for as long as we need it to give you a service or for the time it‚Äôs legally required to be stored. In order to provide you the content requested, we need to collect, store and use your personal data internally. We will not disclose your personal data to third parties unless permitted to do so by law.

title: Senior Technical Staff - Milan
description:
Company Description

Microchip Technology Inc. is a leading provider of embedded control applications. Our product portfolio comprises general purpose and specialized 8-bit, 16-bit, and 32-bit microcontrollers, 32-bit microprocessors, field-programmable gate array (FPGA) products, a broad spectrum of high-performance linear, mixed-signal, power management, thermal management, radio frequency (RF), timing, safety, security, wired connectivity and wireless connectivity devices, as well as serial Electrically Erasable Programmable Read Only Memory (EEPROM), Serial Flash memories, Parallel Flash memories, and serial Static Random Access Memory (SRAM). We also license Flash-IP solutions that are incorporated in a broad range of products.

Job Description

The Data Center Solutions Business Unit is responsible for building board and silicon level products for storage, machine learning, and other accelerator applications with Best-in-Class performance and flexibility. As a Sr. Technical Staff Engineer, you will be part of the Flashtech Architecture team that defines future product direction, guides NAND characterization effort and define NAND QOS features.

Data Center Solutions include System on Chip NVMe based flash controllers. The controllers are used in products for the high performance and mainstream segment of the enterprise and data center storage markets.

Our focus is on technical excellence, teamwork, collaboration, and continuous improvement in an open and encouraging environment. We are looking for a candidate with a strong technical background in product development, embedded systems, and storage protocols.

Responsibilities

Provide a technical vision for future product direction.
Propose and specify the high-level features and architecture.
Provide guidance and insight into NAND characterization and operation.
Regularly review and discuss issues with the development teams and NAND vendors.
Assist troubleshooting of difficult problems reported by internal test/development teams and by global customers.
Write comprehensive engineering architecture documentation.

Job Requirements

Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering or equivalent (Master‚Äôs degree preferred)
15+ years of industry experience in product development
Knowledge of NAND flash architectures and features
Knowledge of storage and NAND flash protocols
Excellent analytical, problem solving, and documentation skills
Effective communicator of technical ideas, both verbal and written
Self-motivated, team-oriented, ability and resourcefulness to achieve goals with minimal supervision
Capable of working with customers and technology partners in the architecture phase and in feature design

Value-add Qualifications

Detailed knowledge of NAND flash operation and architecture
Detailed knowledge of PCI Express interface, data flow, and programming models
Knowledge of artificial intelligence topics and applications
Knowledge of security topics and applications
Knowledge of Agile development process

Cloud Academy delivers role-specific training on leading clouds (AWS,¬†Azure,¬†Google Cloud Platform), essential methodologies needed to operate on and between clouds (DevOps,¬†security,¬†containers), and capabilities that are unlocked by the cloud (big data,¬†machine learning).




Companies like Turner, Cognizant, SAS, and ThermoFisher¬†customize Cloud Academy¬†to contextualize learning and leverage the platform to¬†assign, manage, and measure¬†cloud enablement at scale.¬†Now is your chance to join our talented team that delivers unparalleled educational content to developers worldwide!




We‚Äôre looking for a¬†Staff Engineer¬†to help us take our product to the next level.¬†We move seamlessly from full-stack web development, to mobile, to deployment/scaling.¬†This position will take ownership of how features are implemented, from user experience to backend, involving our web app, mobile app, APIs and backend infrastructure.¬†You‚Äôll have an opportunity to make a large impact on the culture of our development¬†team.




Our ideal candidate is a humble leader, equally capable of teaching and learning.¬†




Responsibilities

Experience with distributed version control systems: mostly Git (Github and/or Bitbucket)

Solid experience working and designing with Docker based systemsFamiliar with cloud architecture patterns and best practices for designing highly available, scalable and secure systemsInterest and ability to learn other coding languages.
Good level of English proficiency, both spoken and written




Benefits

title: Senior Technical Staff - Vimercate
description:
Company Description

Microchip Technology Inc. is a leading provider of embedded control applications. Our product portfolio comprises general purpose and specialized 8-bit, 16-bit, and 32-bit microcontrollers, 32-bit microprocessors, field-programmable gate array (FPGA) products, a broad spectrum of high-performance linear, mixed-signal, power management, thermal management, radio frequency (RF), timing, safety, security, wired connectivity and wireless connectivity devices, as well as serial Electrically Erasable Programmable Read Only Memory (EEPROM), Serial Flash memories, Parallel Flash memories, and serial Static Random Access Memory (SRAM). We also license Flash-IP solutions that are incorporated in a broad range of products.

Job Description

The Data Center Solutions Business Unit is responsible for building board and silicon level products for storage, machine learning, and other accelerator applications with Best-in-Class performance and flexibility. As a Sr. Technical Staff Engineer, you will be part of the Flashtech Architecture team that defines future product direction, guides NAND characterization effort and define NAND QOS features.

Data Center Solutions include System on Chip NVMe based flash controllers. The controllers are used in products for the high performance and mainstream segment of the enterprise and data center storage markets.

Our focus is on technical excellence, teamwork, collaboration, and continuous improvement in an open and encouraging environment. We are looking for a candidate with a strong technical background in product development, embedded systems, and storage protocols.

Responsibilities

Provide a technical vision for future product direction.
Propose and specify the high-level features and architecture.
Provide guidance and insight into NAND characterization and operation.
Regularly review and discuss issues with the development teams and NAND vendors.
Assist troubleshooting of difficult problems reported by internal test/development teams and by global customers.
Write comprehensive engineering architecture documentation.

Job Requirements

Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering or equivalent (Master‚Äôs degree preferred)
15+ years of industry experience in product development
Knowledge of NAND flash architectures and features
Knowledge of storage and NAND flash protocols
Excellent analytical, problem solving, and documentation skills
Effective communicator of technical ideas, both verbal and written
Self-motivated, team-oriented, ability and resourcefulness to achieve goals with minimal supervision
Capable of working with customers and technology partners in the architecture phase and in feature design

Value-add Qualifications

Detailed knowledge of NAND flash operation and architecture
Detailed knowledge of PCI Express interface, data flow, and programming models
Knowledge of artificial intelligence topics and applications
Knowledge of security topics and applications
Knowledge of Agile development process

company_name: ZURU TECH ITALY - Creative Impact (Hong Kong) Limited
description:
Zuru Tech is digitalizing the construction process of buildings all around the world. We have a multi-national team developing the world‚Äôs first digital building fabrication platform: you design it, we build it!

In our disruptive offices in Modena and Milan we‚Äôre developing a BIM software meant for both the general public and experts with the power to design and manufacture any type of building. By mixing Unreal Engine‚Äôs real time rendering with the best structural simulation algorithms and state-of-the-art automated manufacturing processes we grant our users complete creative freedom and an astonishing RTX-powered graphical fidelity.

What are you going to do?

You‚Äôll be part of a big department of brilliant engineers, with many different specialties: coding, graphics, artist, ui/ux design and machine learning.

In Particular You Will

Manage and drive a team of 3 developers
Monitor the team performance and report on metrics
Provide encouragement to team members, including communicating team goals and identifying areas for new development
Provide technical leadership to teammates
Be responsible for implementing graphic algorithms in C ++ and building software solutions for the automatic design of buildings and interior design.
Develop and deliver tasks according to Agile methods (Scrum)

title: Principal Software Engineer
description:
Circle is a global financial technology firm that enables businesses of all sizes to harness the power of digital currency and public blockchains for payments, commerce and financial applications worldwide. Circle's platform has supported over 100 million transactions worth tens of billions of dollars, with nearly 10 million retail customers, over a thousand businesses, while storing and securing more than $5 billion in digital currency assets. Circle is also a principal developer of USD Coin (USDC), which together with Coinbase and the Centre Consortium oversees the standards and protocol for what has become the fastest growing, regulated, fully-reserved stablecoin. USDC now stands at well over $10 billion market cap and is adding nearly $300 million net new digital dollars in circulation every week. Today, Circle's transactional services, business accounts, and platform APIs are giving rise to a new generation of financial services and commerce applications that hold the promise of raising global economic prosperity for all through programmable internet commerce.

What you'll be part of:

With the mission "To raise global economic prosperity through programmable internet commerce," Circle was founded on the belief that blockchains and digital currency will rewire the global economic system, creating a fundamentally more open, inclusive, efficient and integrated world economy. We envision a global economy where people and businesses everywhere can more freely connect and transact with each other with new technologies for digital money. We believe such a system can raise prosperity for people and companies everywhere. Our mission is powered by the values we espouse and which we expect all Circlers to respect. We are Multistakeholder, serving the needs of our customers, our shareholders, our employees and families, our local communities and our world. Furthermore, we are also Mindful, Driven by Excellence, and High Integrity.

Engineering at Circle:

In 2020, Circle unveiled Circle APIs: a set of solutions and smarter technology to help businesses accept payments in a more global, scalable and efficient alternative to traditional banking rails (spoiler: we're using USD Coin under the hood).

Over the next 12 months, we're going to rapidly grow our API customer base and enable even more businesses to easily integrate and benefit from the breakthrough of programmable money on the internet.

If you're data-driven, interested in building something meaningful and would love to work in an entrepreneurial environment, we can't wait to hear from you.

You will aspire to our four core values:


Multistakeholder - you have dedication and commitment to our customers, shareholders, employees and families and local communities.
Mindful - you seek to be respectful, an active listener and to pay attention to detail.
Driven by Excellence - you are driven by our mission and our passion for customer success which means you relentlessly pursue excellence, that you do not tolerate mediocrity and you work intensely to achieve your goals.
High Integrity - you seek open and honest communication, and you hold yourself to very high moral and ethical standards. You reject manipulation, dishonesty and intolerance.


Here is our team hierarchy for individual contributors:

Principal Software Engineer (V)

Staff Software Engineer (IV)

Senior Software Engineer (III)

Software Engineer II

Software Engineer (I)

What you'll be responsible for:

As a Principal Software Engineer on the Circle Platform Services team, you will lead teams technically to build scalable microservices that are responsible for reliable and secure APIs that transfer value & assets across all blockchain protocols (think Bitcoin and Ethereum, for example) as well as traditional banking protocols (think credit cards, bank transfers etc).

What you'll work on:


Challenging (and fun!) problems centered around digital currencies & their adoption. Did we mention that Circle launched a "programmable dollar" called USD Coin (or USDC)?
Collaborating with our Product and Engineering teams to design, develop, test and ship phenomenal Circle features
Building publicly accessible APIs that make it simple for developers to integrate with complex payment systems.
Integrating Platform Services with leading banks & financial technologies to allow an ever greater number of Circle customers access to fast, secure & low cost payment channels.
Writing the infrastructure to deliver great payment experiences, including data sources (SQL or NoSQL), messaging systems and APIs
Extending Circle's in-house blockchain systems infrastructure to support the tokenization of the world.


What you'll bring to Circle (not all required):


12+ years of professional software development experience in object oriented languages like Java and Go.
Cross-functional partnership to align teams with external stakeholders.
Led teams technically on architecture and design.
Expert in one of the domains of API design, payments processing, risk/fraud detection, data engineering, machine learning, or blockchains.
Experience with payment systems like credit cards and bank transfers
Deep understanding of API design and REST principles
Deep experience with cloud services (AWS, Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure, etc)
Experience with container orchestration systems like Kubernetes or EKS, ECS
Deep experience with SQL databases and designing schemas
Deep experience in the deployment of production-quality, scalable software
A champion on setting coding standards and code quality -- a desire to have great test coverage to enable continuous delivery
Excellent communication skills, able to collaborate with remote teams, share ideas and present concepts effectively
Self-starter, you enjoy moving at a fast pace, shipping software that improves the user experience and constantly improving your work with little supervision


We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at Circle. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

title: Enterprise Senior Architect
description:
Snam √® una delle principali societ√† di infrastrutture energetiche al mondo e una delle maggiori aziende quotate italiane per capitalizzazione.

Grazie a una rete sostenibile e tecnologicamente avanzata, garantisce la sicurezza degli approvvigionamenti e abilita la transizione energetica. Oltre che in Italia opera, attraverso consociate, in Albania (AGSCo), Austria (TAG, GCA), Emirati Arabi Uniti (ADNOC Gas Pipelines), Francia (Ter√©ga), Grecia (DESFA) e Regno Unito (Interconnector UK) e ha recentemente avviato l‚Äôattivit√† anche in Cina e India. √à, inoltre, uno dei principali azionisti di TAP (Trans Adriatic Pipeline).

Prima in Europa per estensione della rete di trasporto (oltre 41.000 km, comprese le attivit√† internazionali) e capacit√† di stoccaggio di gas naturale (circa 20 miliardi di metri cubi, comprese le attivit√† internazionali), Snam √® anche tra i principali operatori continentali nella rigassificazione, attraverso il terminale di Panigaglia (GNL Italia) e le quote negli impianti di Livorno (OLT) e Rovigo (Adriatic LNG) in Italia e di Revithoussa (DESFA) in Grecia.

Nel proprio piano strategico 2020-2024, Snam prevede investimenti in crescita a 7,4 miliardi di euro e un impegno rafforzato nelle attivit√† della transizione energetica: biometano (Snam4Environment), efficienza energetica (Renovit), mobilit√† sostenibile (Snam4Mobility) e idrogeno. Snam opera inoltre nella forestazione (Arbolia) e si √® posta l‚Äôobiettivo di raggiungere la neutralit√† carbonica (Scope 1 e Scope 2) entro il 2040.

Il modello di business dell‚Äôazienda si basa sulla crescita sostenibile, la trasparenza, la valorizzazione dei talenti e delle diversit√†, la tutela e lo sviluppo sociale dei territori anche attraverso le iniziative di Fondazione Snam.

Enterprise Senior Architect

Nell‚Äôambito della Direzione Digital Transformation & Technology che si occupa di monitoraggio e validazione delle architetture applicative ed infrastrutturali per i progetti e le iniziative di evoluzione DT&T nel rispetto dei vincoli definiti nei cataloghi delle architetture target.

Supportare la definizione dell‚ÄôICT strategy monitorando ed evolvendo la mappa applicativa in ambito BI, Big Data & Advanced Analytics a supporto dello sviluppo del business
Condurre attivit√† di definizione, monitoraggio e validazione delle soluzioni architetturali applicative ed infrastrutturali attraverso la definizione ed evoluzione di Blueprints, e la verifica della corretta attuazione di Linee Guida Architetturali e Design Pattern di sviluppo specifici
Condurre attivit√† di evoluzione delle architetture di riferimento: continuous improvement del catalogo tecnologico di riferimento, delle Blueprints e dei Design Pattern per l‚Äôutilizzo efficiente ed efficace del parco tecnologico a supporto di BI, Big Data & Advanced Analytics
Collaborare con team inter-funzionali della direzione
Gestire e coordinare il lavoro di partner/fornitori
Supportare il manager nel monitoraggio di tempi, costi e KPI di progetto



Must have

Esperienza di almeno 3 anni nel ruolo di Solution Architect su progetti di delivery B2B in ambito: BI, Big Data & Advanced Analytics su piattaforme Cloud (Azure), on-prem (SAS Viya, Cloudera) e/o ibride
Esperienza nel design architetturale di soluzioni di: BI, Big Data & Advanced Analytics
Esperienza di livello Enterprise [e.g. >1000 utenti, >10TB dati gestiti]
Comprensione delle architetture e dei modelli di sviluppo software cloud-native: Microservices, Container Orchestration
Conoscenza di tecnologie Data Lake & Azure Analytics come: HDFS, ADLS gen2, Azure Synapse, Azure ML Studio, Azure Purview
Conoscenza di: PowerBI, Tibco Spotfire, QLIKsense, SAS VIYA



Nice to have

Certificazioni Azure Solutions Architect Expert

Certificazioni SAS Viya Administration

Conoscenza della lingua inglese
Laurea in ambito Informatico/Ingegneristico (Ingegneria dell‚ÄôInformazione)



Soft Skills

Spiccate capacit√† di problem solving, orientamento all‚Äôexecution e visione d'insieme
Ottime capacit√† di lavorare in team e di organizzazione autonoma del proprio lavoro
Buone capacit√† relazionali e comunicative


Ci impegniamo a creare un ambiente sicuro e inclusivo, basato sul rispetto reciproco e la valorizzazione delle diversit√†, offrendo pari opportunit√† di lavoro a tutti i candidati qualificati.

In generale, i candidati, il cui profilo √® in linea con la posizione aperta, saranno contattati e riceveranno un feedback nel giro di 2/3 mesi.

Verranno accettate soltanto le candidature effettuate tramite il portale Carriere Snam. Per ulteriori informazioni √® possibile contattare carriere@snam.it tel +39 02.3703.1

Luca Giacomel
Co-Founder at Plexagon | We are hiring!

iOS¬†Software Engineer, PLX-Editor¬†

Plexagon is looking for a world-class iOS Software Engineer to join our international team.

Fully Remote (worldwide) or from our Milan office




Job Description

Plexagon is an app publisher focused on mobile photo and video üì∏ editing. Our apps use Computer Vision and Machine Learning tools ü§ñ to support the new generation of content creators üöÄ




We are building the PLX-Editor, an exciting photo/video editor SDK that supports content-aware filters and effects based on state-of-the-art computer vision research. The PLX-Editor is the core of all our apps and, as an iOS Software Engineer, we want you to help us grow it!

title: Senior Embedded Software Developer
description:
TXT Group √® alla ricerca di un Software Developer per Embedded System per la divisione Digital Manufacturing di TXT e-solutions, una societ√† del gruppo.

In particolare il candidato rinforzer√† il team di TXT che gi√† opera all'interno di un team internazionale su un primario cliente operante nel settore trasporti.

Competenze Tecniche Richieste

C++ ambiente Visual Studio 2017;

Si richiede esperienza di almeno di 3 anni in player appartenenti al settore IT operanti nella Ingegneria del software o della System Integration nel settore dei sistemi di bigliettazione per il trasporto pubblico.

Laurea richiesta: Laurea Ingegneria, Informatica o discipline scientifiche (Fisica, Matematica etc..).

Completano il profilo un'ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese, flessibilit√† e velocit√† di apprendimento. La conoscenza della lingua francese sar√† considerato un plus.

Si offre contratto commisurato all'esperienza e possibilit√† di sperimetarsi in un contesto internazionale.

TXT Group (www.txtgroup.com) √® un leader internazionale nella consulenza per lo sviluppo di soluzioni software e servizi IT, supportando la trasformazione digitale dei prodotti e dei processi core dei clienti. Con un portafoglio di prodotti software proprietari e una profonda esperienza nei domini verticali, TXT Group opera in diversi mercati, con un'impronta crescente nei settori aerospaziale, aeronautico, automotive, industriale, governativo e fintech. La Capogruppo TXT e-solutions S.p.A. √® quotata presso Borsa Italiana, al Segmento Star (TXT.MI), da luglio 2000. TXT Group ha sede a Milano √® presente in 15 paesi a livello mondiale ed ha filiali in Italia, Germania, Regno Unito, Francia, Svizzera e Stati Uniti d'America.

title: Open Banking Senior Architect (xTech - MI)
description:
Direct message the job poster from BIP

Andrea Martino
Talent Acquisition Specialist presso BIP

Bip, fondata in Italia nel 2003, √® oggi una delle principali societ√† di consulenza europee e impiega oltre 3.300 persone a livello globale. I suoi professionisti offrono servizi di consulenza direzionale e business integration, seguono le aziende nei processi di ricerca e adozione di soluzioni tecnologiche disruptive. I nostri clienti sono i principali player di mercato dei settori Energy & Utilities, Oil & Gas, Telecommunication, Media & Entertainment, Financial Services, Retail, Fashion, Consumer Goods e Pharma. Abbiamo cominciato a esportare i nostri servizi all‚Äôestero seguendo aziende multinazionali, conquistando nuovi clienti e portando a termine alcune acquisizioni mirate che hanno contribuito alla creazione di un network articolato. Bip √® oggi presente in Italia, Inghilterra, Spagna, Turchia, Brasile, Belgio, Svizzera, Austria, US, Emirati Arabi, Cile e Colombia.







Open Banking Senior Architect (xTech - MI)




Vuoi essere parte della rivoluzione tecnologica?




Entra a far parte di BIP ‚Äì xTech, il Centro di Eccellenza di BIP specializzato in consulenza e servizi innovativi in ambito Big Data, Data Science, RPA, Cloud, Blockchain e Networking.




A fronte di un costante trend di crescita, siamo alla ricerca di un Open Banking Architect, esperto di disegno e implementazione di architetture e PSD2 e Open Banking in contesti complessi e innovativi. In BIP crediamo molto nell‚Äôinnovazione e siamo certi che l‚ÄôOpen Banking possa essere un ulteriore boost di crescita per i nostri clienti, per questo motivo stiamo investendo nel creare un team dedicato di specialisti del settore.




La posizione aperta riguarda un profilo senior a partire da 8 anni di esperienza maturata in grandi banche o societ√† di consulenza direzionale o informatica su Milano.




Ruolo e Responsabilit√†




Sarai promotore della nuova offerta e practice BIP sull‚ÄôOpen Banking insieme al team di riferimento. Sarai quindi responsabile di analizzare, e disegnare architetture complesse per Banche o aziende di altri settori che desiderano integrarsi con ecosistemi Open Banking e PSD2, realizzare advisory su tecnologie e architetture, coordinare programmi implementativi complessi, supervisionando e gestendo team complessi di colleghi, del cliente o di altre societ√†.




Si richiede conoscenza approfondita di architetture Legacy bancarie, di compliance BDE / PCI e altri standard nell‚Äôambito bancario o dei sistemi di pagamento e di normative in ambito Privacy/Security (es. GDPR).




Sar√† considerato fattore preferenziale la conoscenza dei concetti alla base delle Data Platform moderne, dei paradigmi Big Data e Cloud Data Architecture, e di fondamentali di Data Engineering per l‚Äôabilitazione di Machine Learning / AI.

Sarai un esperto in costante evoluzione che opera su ecosistemi informativi complessi dove Legacy, Open Banking, AI si compenetrano in logica API based per fornire servizi e business model innovativi.




Sarai spesso chiamato ad analizzare architetture esistenti, definire possibili scenari architetturali evolutivi, qualificarne PRO e CONTRO, supportare nella scelta dello scenario preferito valutando costi, tempi e piani di transizione.




Sarai chiamato a governare i programmi di transizione per conto dei nostri Clienti.




Ti sar√† richiesto, in modo commisurato alla tua seniority, di dimostrare ed evolvere le capacit√† di costruire relazione con clienti, vendor, partner, e di assicurare sempre il raggiungimento della migliore soluzione dati i vincoli del Cliente.




Competenze ricercate




Core Skills:

Laurea Specialistica in Ingegneria Informatica, Ingegneria Matematica, Ingegneria delle Telecomunicazioni, Informatica, Statistica o discipline affini (STEM)
Background in Architetture informatiche in ambito Financial Services, e di middleware/backend bancari
Conoscenza approfondita dei paradigmi PSD2, Open Banking, Architetture a microservizi
Esperienza pratica di Agile e Devops
Esperienza pratica (disegno/implementazione/integrazione) su architetture a microservizi REST e SOA, su tutto lo stack, dal frontend, includendo rich web applications e mobile, allo strato di servizi, all‚Äôautenticazione (es. OAuth2), al backend (inclusi strati COBOL e 3270)
Conoscenza delle principali tecnologie del settore: a titolo non esemplificativo e non esaustivo JAVA EE, Oracle PL/SQL, Tomcat, Apache Web Server, Spring/Hibernate, Lucene, Weblogic, JMS, JQuery, Angular.JS, C#, HTML/CSS/JS.¬†
Preferita conoscenza e competenza in ambito Big Data, NoSQL, tecnologie di analytics anche real-time, come Hadoop, Hive, Pig, Spark, Flume, HBase, MongoDB, Cassandra, Kafka
Preferita conoscenza delle soluzioni architetturali dei principali Cloud Provider (Google GCP, Microsoft Azure, AWS)
Competenze in ambito management e sicurezza di infrastrutture di Banking, di piattaforme Big Data, conoscenza di paradigmi di Data Governance e Data Quality
Esperienze in ambito Data warehousing e data mining tradizionali in contesti Banking, padronanza di costrutti SQL, concetti di mart, star schema, ETL, lineage.
Esperienza nel dimensionamento hardware di architetture complesse e clusterizzate sia on-premises sia in cloud
Conoscenza/Esperienza su piattaforme di container (es. Docker) as a plus
Competenze su metodologie Agile e Scrum
Certificazioni in ambito Open Banking, Architetture, Agile, Big Data, Architetture Cloud as a plus
Esperienza del mondo IoT as a plus




Soft Skills:

Conoscenza fluente di italiano e inglese orale e scritto
Standing consulenziale
Ottime doti relazionali e comunicative
Disponibilit√† per trasferte in Italia e all‚Äôestero
Orientamento al cliente e al raggiungimento degli obiettivi
Buona attitudine a lavorare in team e a coordinare team
Precisione e buona stress tolerance nel rispetto delle scadenze




Inserimento

La risorsa sar√† inserita all‚Äôinterno di Bip xTech ‚Äì Milano o Roma.

L‚Äôinquadramento e la retribuzione saranno commisurati all‚Äôesperienza del candidato.

Si offre l‚Äôinserimento all‚Äôinterno di un contesto lavorativo giovane, dinamico e in forte crescita.







Il presente annuncio si rivolge ai candidati di ambo i sessi (L. 903/77).

title: Architect - Digital Experience and Application Development - Cinisello Balsamo
description:
All over the world, people's lives are better because of Oracle. Want to make a difference? Join our company of change-makers.

From Oracle to culinary school and back again. Bonnie Carlson Kaypaghian uses the skills she learned to create recipes for her daughter‚Äôs Type 1 Diabetes and has written a cookbook to share with the world. #LifeatOracle
Architect - Digital Experience and Application Development-21000LMOApplicants are required to read, write, and speak the following languages:Italian



Who We Are

Preferred Qualifications

At Oracle, we see ourselves as changing the world through our own commitment to customer success, as well as by enabling our customers achieve their vision. This can range from supporting refugees and children in need, enabling companies deliver transportation and logistics services to the world, and tranform their data centers moving their workloads in cloud to enable new business models and scale. Our long established techonology as well as our research into new ones are helping solve real world problems, and we are looking for more colleagues to join us.

We believe that different points of view are essential for innovation and we will offer you the chance to be part of an inclusive culture where individuality thrives. We also see sustainability as a core value of ours, as we run our business responsibly and continue to invest in environmentally friendly business practices, and also aim for building sustainable relationships both internally with our colleagues and externally with our customers and the communities we are part of.

What Does Oracle‚Äôs Consulting Organisation Do?

Our mission is to to be a catalyst for Oracle‚Äôs customer success. We want to help our clients realize the maximum value of their Oracle Cloud solutions. We help unlock the full potential of Oracle Cloud by focusing on business outcomes and by working as an end-to-end cloud partner. This approach not only increases the value we bring to our customers, but also makes Oracle a desirable partner.

We deliver Oracle Cloud solutions with speed, efficiency and predictability based on our vast experience of more than 1,500 successful Cloud implementations in EMEA. Over 5,500 consultants across EMEA & JAPAC are passionately dedicated to ensuring Oracle Cloud success through our unparalleled experience and extensive global network. The One Oracle approach helps our clients in reducing risk and maximizing their return on investment. We look at our clients‚Äô business holistically to ensure business outcomes are met and empower continuous innovation.

Context

Digital Experience team (OCDX) from Oracle Consulting, specializes in providing digital innovation and digital delivery services in Italy, working closely with the EMEA region. Focused on achieving business outcomes, the organisation collaborates with customers to achieve success through digital innovation.

In order to fuel our current and future growth within this area, we are currently planning to hire Digital Architect(s) for our team based in either Milan or Rome. We are looking for a positive and structured individual, with excellent customer facing skills strong technical background, who can discuss digital at both a business and technical level, who thrives on innovation, and is used to work in a dynamic environment for delivering strategic projects for our customers.

This is an excellent opportunity, allowing you to work with rapidly evolving cloud technologies, where you will be constantly challenged. You will also have the opportunity to work with many of the world's leading organisations that use Oracle technology, and be part of a smart, digitally focussed team.

YOUR FUTURE ROLE ‚Äì Architect - Digital Experience and Application Development

We are looking for a new generation of Digital Architects who are pursuing innovative ways of building user-centric Digital Solutions that can scale over time. We are looking for creative, pioneering, ambitious software and technology professionals who live and breathe digital. Your life is social. You are mobile and have information available on your fingertips. You have a passion to solve challenging business problems and want to embrace new ideas to make the world a better place at home, for your community, at work and for society. You are a Digital evangelist and you love to be in rapid changing dynamic technology space of the Digital.

As a key member of the Italy Oracle Digital eXperience organisation in Italy, you will work with the latest and rapidly evolving Digital technologies on Oracle Cloud. As a recognised authority and senior contributor within Oracle Consulting, you will provide market leading innovative solutions design and deployment leadership to regional project teams across EMEA.

As a Senior Digital Architect, You Will

Assess and fully understand the customers‚Äô desired business outcomes.
Ensure that the proposed User Experience is technically viable.
Provide ownership of the supporting digital solution architecture ensuring stability, extendibility and scalability.
Provide technical input into the sales cycle, including estimations from simple to complex implementations
Work as senior technical leader during projects delivery
Act as solution and technical advisor both to the customer and project team.
Communicate regularly with internal stakeholders, providing high level solution updates at both a business and technical level.
Ensure that project approach and governance is adhered to within all internal and external projects.
Be a digital trusted advisor for customers and will be responsible for maintaining long term relationships.
Advise on candidate use cases for significant digital impact and suggest associated reusable solution assets.
Collaborate with both consulting and licensing / cloud Oracle sales areas.

What You‚Äôll Bring

Your enthusiasm, love and passion for customer success will help us become the leading cloud service provider.

Key Skills/Qualifications

5-7 years of experience in delivering innovative digital solutions and digital transformation programmes ideally using cloud technologies, with a proven record of full lifecycle implementations projects
You have experience acting as a Digital Solution Architect or similar with cloud solution design, development and delivery, functional and/or technical consulting. Prior team leadership or management experience is preferred but not essential.
You are an expert in industry standard architectural blueprints / design frameworks in the digital domain and have a practical experience of producing end-to-end technology architecture and reusable solution assets, which can be used across multiple industries and sectors.
You provide functional and technology thought leadership in Cloud Middleware and/or Cloud Infrastructure, Information Security, system integration and solution development promoting best practice approaches to solution development.
You have extensive knowledge in designing and developing innovative Web & Mobile solutions using cloud technology platforms such as Oracle, AWS, MSFT Azure, Google Cloud, etc.
You have extensive knowledge of micro-services architecture, development patterns & languages for delivering cloud-native applications.
You are proficient with DevOps, agile and lean development and Continuous Delivery methodologies and practices.
You are proficient with Cloud Infrastructure design & configuration.
You are familiar with design thinking, innovation methodologies, user experience and user interface (UX/UI) design principles. You are familiar with human-centric design principals. You can clearly articulate fundamental concepts and value of design, agile development and UX/UI methodologies to uninitiated audiences. You are familiar with tools such as Sketch and Adobe XD or similar tool
You have extensive knowledge of Web Content Management solutions
You have extensive knowledge Chatbot and Voice assistants
You have extensive knowledge of JavaScript frameworks - NodeJS, and/or AngularJS, and/or React, etc. Knowledge of Oracle Visual Builder or Oracle JET is preferred but not essential.
Extensive knowledge of one or more of the following topics would be a plus: Geofencing, Blockchain, IoT, AI/Machine Learning, TensorFlow, Augmented Reality. As a minimum, we require you to be able to articulate each of these as part of a digital solution.
You are familiar with enterprise applications in CRM, ERP and HCM space and expertise on how Digital Solutions can be designed to deliver innovation and business value with those applications.
You have strong verbal and written communications skills. Preferably experience writing and publishing research briefs, white papers and blogs.
You are familiar with Agile and SCRUM delivery, preferably within large organizations.
Depending on the seniority, proven experience in working with and influencing customer senior managers or executives
You are experiernced in technical lead of remote and offshore teams
Adaptability and ability to embrace and drive change. Ability to work in heterogeneous environments, with multiple actors / companies involved in the customers delivery context
Graduate degree (Diploma/Master/Bachelor) or equivalent experience.
Language: Italian as native language (or extremely fluent), fluency in English

What We Offer

A driver‚Äôs seat in leading your own career. We give you the freedom, skills, tools and techonologies to shape your future. Whatever avenue you go down, you‚Äôll gain access to immense learning experiences and you‚Äôll always be backed-up by Oracle‚Äôs impressive resources. We offer a good work / life balance to our colleagues, and an international culture that is vibrant, dynamic and inspiring, helping you reach your full potential.

Apply Now

Visit oracle.com/careers or contact our recruiter Felix Wehmeyer: felix.wehmeyer@oracle.com



Detailed Description And Job Requirements

As a recognized authority and leading contributor within their practice, this senior-level consulting position provides consistent high quality and innovative solution leadership to a project team. Leads the solution design and implementation aspects of engagement(s) ensuring high quality, integrated software solutions within constraints of time and budget.

Analyzes business needs to help ensure Oracle solution meets the customer‚Äôs objectives by combining industry best practices, product knowledge, and business acumen. Exercises judgment and business acumen in selecting methods and techniques to deliver functional and technical solutions on non-routine and very complex aspects of applications and technology installations. Provides direction and mentoring to project teams, and effectively influences customer leadership on key decisions. Supports the business development efforts by pursuing new opportunities and extensions. Collaborates with the consulting sales team by providing domain expertise. Resolves complex customer issues by recommending and implementing solutions. Demonstrates expertise in multiple business processes across two or more product families or ability to architect and design technology solutions encompassing multiple products and make decisions based on impact across the stack.

8-10 years of experience relevant to this position including 4 years of consulting experience. Prior team leadership or management experience preferred. Undergraduate degree or equivalent experience preferred. Product or technical expertise relevant to practice focus. Ability to communicate effectively. Ability to build rapport with team members and clients. Strong influencing and negotiation skills. Ability to travel as needed.

As part of Oracle's employment process candidates will be required to successfully complete a pre-employment screening process. This will involve identity and employment verification, professional references, education verification and professional qualifications and memberships (if applicable).

title: (Senior) Consultant, Integrated Demand & Supply Planning
description:
Direct message the job poster from Chainalytics

Liz Dickerson
Talent Acquisition at Chainalytics
Bright Minds. Better Methods. Best Outcomes. Chainalytics accelerates fact-based transformation for supply chain leaders around the globe, including 18 of Gartner‚Äôs Top 25 supply chains. We bring unparalleled passion to our core purpose: to help leaders realize maximum value from their supply chains. Our combination of top supply chain talent, proven methodologies and proprietary market intelligence delivers actionable insight and measurable outcomes. With locations across North America, Europe, and Asia, Chainalytics serves companies globally in a borderless fashion.

The Integrated Demand and Supply Planning (IDSP) practice of Chainalytics assists clients with creating more value out of their supply chain by improving their planning. For example, we support clients with implementing state-of-the art planning technologies (like e.g. BlueYonder and o9), and we improve their forecast accuracy by using Artificial Intelligent (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) technologies (like e.g. DataRobot, R and Python).

Beside technology implementations and data analytics our professionals work closely with clients on initiatives to balance demand and supply by helping them design their demand and supply planning processes, and ultimately, implement the executive S&OP process. For example, we make important trade-offs between inventories, costs and service transparent. This allows companies to determine their optimal in this so-called ‚ÄúBalancing Act‚Äù.

Key Responsibilities

Support or lead one stream (e.g. Demand Planning or Supply Planning) of a planning technology implementation (like e.g. o9 and BlueYonder). This covers support or lead the development, design and/or implementation.
Work closely with the project manager, solution architect and other team members to develop, design and/or implement a solution for the client needs
Interface with the client to acquire business data, information and insights
Work closely with the project manager to design, develop, and integrate material for client presentations
Support the project manager during presentations to the client
Identify and communicate ways to improve Chainalytics‚Äô solutions
Develop and maintain positive client relationships
Support creation of thought leadership materials (blogs, public speaking, etc.) that support Chainalytics‚Äô overall brand and positioning
Support the ongoing development of methodologies and new service offerings, including SaaS capabilities that generate recurring revenues where applicable.

Skills

Impeccable integrity, passion for supply chain consulting, creative, and energetic
Ability to work creatively and analytically, both independently and in a problem-solving team-oriented environment
Strong organizational, multi-tasking, and time-management skills

Qualifications

Masters degree in Logistics, Industrial Engineering, Information Systems, Supply Chain Management or Transportation and Logistics
Experience in planning (i.e. demand planning, supply planning, S&OP) is preferred, with minimum of 4 years experience for Sr. Consultant
Experience in implementing planning solutions (like e.g. BlueYonder, o9) is preferred
Experience in supply chain consulting, especially involving solution design and implementation, is preferred
Excellent client communication skills and experience
Have superior and creative problem-solving skills
Experience with AI/ML technology is preferred
Expertise for managing large-scale datasets in database, data mining and/or business intelligence tools is preferred

Additional Information

This position is based out of our Italian office in Milan, Italy.
Salary is commensurate with experience, with an attractive variable compensation package and benefits.
This position will report to our Principal based in Italy

title: QA Engineer
description:
PLEASE NOTE: This position is based in our Swiss HQ in Mendrisio, Switzerland, just 7km over the border from Como, Italy. Mendrisio is easily commutable from Milan, Como, Varese or Lugano and Cloud Academy provides the train ticket for you!

Cloud Academy is the leading digital skills development platform that enables every enterprise to become a tech company through guided Learning Paths, Hands-on Labs, and Skill Assessment. Cloud Academy delivers role-specific training on leading cloud technologies (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform), essential methodologies needed to operate on and between clouds (DevOps, security, containers), and capabilities that are unlocked by the cloud (big data, machine learning). Companies like Turner, Cognizant, SAS, and ThermoFisher customize Cloud Academy to contextualize learning and leverage the platform to assign, manage, and measure cloud enablement at scale.

We are looking for a QA Engineer to strengthen our Product Development organization.

In this role, you will be responsible for testing our platform and catching defects before they reach our users.

We expect you to learn and grow a lot in this role and over time assist the whole organization with improving the platform‚Äôs quality holistically, by working closely with engineering and product management.

You will need to be able to deliver changes using your capability to influence stakeholders at all levels.

Our ideal candidate is humble, equally capable of teaching and learning.

You will work in our Switzerland office (Mendrisio, CH), together with our international team and we‚Äôre happy to facilitate your relocation to this area if needed.

Responsibilities

Execute test cases manually or automated, and analyze results
Participate in the product squads‚Äô daily standup meetings and retrospectives
Collaborate with Software Engineers to develop effective strategies and test plans
Help troubleshoot issues
Report bugs and errors to development teams
Work with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the software development lifecycle

Degree in a technology-related field
High level of English proficiency, both spoken and written
Excellent communication skills
Attention to detail
Analytical mind and problem solving aptitude
Good organizational skills
Bonus Points

Familiarity with Agile frameworks is a plus
Passion for and experience in e-learning projects is a strong bonus
Able to find creative solutions to interesting problems
Curious with a constant desire to learn and collaborate
Benefits

Competitive salary including a bonus plan
Possibility to influence the product development org from day 1 and then keep developing your career
Train ticket paid for by the company
Budget for professional development
4 weeks paid vacation and 15 paid holidays per year
Great company culture and work environment!
Highly-skilled teammates and lots of opportunities for growth and development

Relocation bonus

description:
We believe in a future where inner cities are free of cars, congestion and pollution. By offering our dockless electrical scooters and bikes as convenient alternatives for short-distance travel, we believe we can make that future possible. Our mission is to thoughtfully design micro-mobility for safety, comfort and durability, improving city life in Europe and beyond.Founded in Europe, Dott compromises a highly experienced team of inquisitive minds in mobility and tech. What we do today has a tangible impact on tomorrow. We reached our in-house sustainability target of 100% renewable energy, and ensure equitability in our communities through collaborating with city charities, officials and safety boards.We‚Äôre looking for an entrepreneurial Marketing Manager to join the Italian team. The Marketing Manager will be responsible for all marketing activities in the North of Italy, with focus on branding and demand generation. They will work hand in hand with the Central Marketing team and local operations. You will report to the Senior Central Marketing Manager.

Demand and acquisition (80%)

Excellent oral and written communication skills in English and Italian

Excellent problem-solving skills

What‚Äôs in it for me? Alongside a competitive compensation plan, we invite our employees to participate in our stock option plan. We operate a consumer service which millions of transactions every week, a set of operations services with deep machine learning and large fleet of vehicles with their own hardware and embedded software challenges. You'll get to see it all. Closing & equal opportunities employer statement Come as you are Dott is an equal opportunities employer. We invest in diversity, ensure equality and encourage expression. title: Sales Trainer Italy
description:
More about the role

Join a team that is changing millions of lives.

Transforming smiles, changing lives

‚ÄØ

At‚ÄØAlign Technology, we believe a great smile can transform a person‚Äôs life, so we create technology that gives people the confidence to take on whatever‚Äôs next. We revolutionized the orthodontic industry with the introduction of the Invisalign system, and we have never lost sight of that spirit of innovation. Our diverse and collaborative teams are constantly pushing the boundaries of what‚Äôs possible.

‚ÄØ

Ready to join us?‚ÄØ

About This Opportunity

As a Sales Trainer for Align Technology Italy your main responsibilty is to provide sales training which contribute to the achievement of the company‚Äôs strategy and supports improvements in the sales ability and performance of the sales staff.

The Key Areas Of Responsibility For The Sales Trainer

Initial Sales Training Course - Theory & Practical
Daily Individual Sales Training
Creation of a Training Academy
Recruitment and Selection
Teamwork


In this role, you will‚Ä¶

Work with the General Managers across Italy to develop the Sales Training strategy which supports the delivery of company priorities and meets operational requirements, ensuring that the best commercial outcome is delivered from the resources available.
Be responsible for all sales training for new sales starters, ensuring that their skills and knowledge are enhanced to maximise sales and revenue.
Ensure that newly recruited sales executives are suitably equipped and motivated to make a significant contribution to the business.
Be responsible for delivering training solutions to agreed KPI‚Äôs to ensure that all targets are met and continuous improvements are made.
Be responsible for the delivery of all company sales training, influencing the sales style and approach throughout the business. Areas covered will include objection handling, negotiation skills and closing.
Review the effectiveness of Sales Training provision against company requirements, in terms of the appropriateness, quality and level of that provision.
Work with the local management teams across Italy to ensure appropriate team development.
Ensure that all training is of a professional standard and that employees are able to sell to the standard required by their businesses and achieve their sales targets.
Produce any course materials and other documents such as notes, handouts, manuals and exercises that is necessary to ensure the delivery of high quality training courses.
Prepare the learning environment and resources, including setting up equipment, ensuring the company training facilities and associated training resources are properly maintained, meeting best practice standards and compliance with Health and Safety requirements.
Review all course evaluation feedback, and the effectiveness of the training and course outcomes; and identify areas for improvement
Take responsibility for the maintenance of any hardware and software used for training purposes and recommending repairs and upgrades to management where appropriate.
Be responsible for the management of the new starter process and induction programmes for Academy trainees, creating role-specific induction plans together with the line manager, liaising with the HR department to ensure that the relevant documentation is in place, monitoring quality and progress and ensuring that end of probationary period review meetings are scheduled.


In this role, you‚Äôll need ‚Ä¶

Bachelor's degree in a related area or equivalent and/or 5-8 years of experience in the field or in a related area.
Strong interpersonal skills, demonstrative ability to multi-task, comfortable with ambiguity, comfortable with conflict, and must be a self-starter.
5 + years professional experience in training needs analysis, working at first line manager level
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal
Fluent in Italian and English
Knowledge of sales process
Ability to motivate, inspire and develop others, leading by example
A confident, strong, friendly personality
Self motivated with ability to work and deliver under pressure
Excellent rapport building skills
Flexible approach to work
Ability to travel across Italy


Sound like a good fit?‚ÄØ‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

‚ÄØ

Great! Click the "Apply" link to let us know you are interested. Not the right fit? Don‚Äôt worry,‚ÄØAlign‚ÄØis quickly growing so we are creating more opportunities to expand our Align family. Please consider joining our Talent Network to receive notifications about future jobs or sharing this opportunity with others in your network.‚ÄØ‚ÄØ‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

‚ÄØ

About Align‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

Align Technology is a publicly traded medical device company that is‚ÄØtransforming smiles and changing lives. Our global team of talented employees develop innovative technology, tools and treatment options to help dental professionals worldwide achieve the clinical results they expect. Our digital ecosystem combines the power of technology to create beautiful smiles through the integration of AI and machine learning, digital imaging and visualization, biomechanics and material science to develop the Invisalign system, the most advanced clear aligner system in the world; iTero Intraoral Scanners and‚ÄØOrthoCAD‚ÄØdigital services. Did you know? Align is the world‚Äôs largest manufacturer of custom 3D-printed materials.‚ÄØ‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

By joining Align, you will be part of a global, fast-growing company in one of the most dynamic industries. Great people, innovative technologies, and meaningful work - these are just some of the‚ÄØthings‚ÄØemployees say make Align Technology a great place to work.‚ÄØ‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

We respect your privacy. Please review‚ÄØour Applicant Privacy Policies for additional information.‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

‚ÄØ

Global Diversity Statement

At Align, we believe in the power of a smile, and we know that every smile is as unique as our employees. As we grow, we will continue building a workforce of diverse cultural backgrounds and life experiences and fostering a culture of open-mindedness and compassion for all our employees. We live our company values by promoting healthy people and healthy communities. All with the intent of changing millions of lives, one unique smile at a time.

title: Staff Software Engineer
description:
Circle is a global financial technology firm that enables businesses of all sizes to harness the power of digital currency and public blockchains for payments, commerce and financial applications worldwide. Circle's platform has supported over 100 million transactions worth tens of billions of dollars, with nearly 10 million retail customers, over a thousand businesses, while storing and securing more than $5 billion in digital currency assets. Circle is also a principal developer of USD Coin (USDC), which together with Coinbase and the Centre Consortium oversees the standards and protocol for what has become the fastest growing, regulated, fully-reserved stablecoin. USDC now stands at well over $10 billion market cap and is adding nearly $300 million net new digital dollars in circulation every week. Today, Circle's transactional services, business accounts, and platform APIs are giving rise to a new generation of financial services and commerce applications that hold the promise of raising global economic prosperity for all through programmable internet commerce.

What you'll be part of:

With the mission "To raise global economic prosperity through programmable internet commerce," Circle was founded on the belief that blockchains and digital currency will rewire the global economic system, creating a fundamentally more open, inclusive, efficient and integrated world economy. We envision a global economy where people and businesses everywhere can more freely connect and transact with each other with new technologies for digital money. We believe such a system can raise prosperity for people and companies everywhere. Our mission is powered by the values we espouse and which we expect all Circlers to respect. We are Multistakeholder, serving the needs of our customers, our shareholders, our employees and families, our local communities and our world. Furthermore, we are also Mindful, Driven by Excellence, and High Integrity.

Engineering at Circle:

In 2020, Circle unveiled Circle APIs: a set of solutions and smarter technology to help businesses accept payments in a more global, scalable and efficient alternative to traditional banking rails (spoiler: we're using USD Coin under the hood).

Over the next 12 months, we're going to rapidly grow our API customer base and enable even more businesses to easily integrate and benefit from the breakthrough of programmable money on the internet.

If you're data-driven, interested in building something meaningful and would love to work in an entrepreneurial environment, we can't wait to hear from you.

You will aspire to our four core values:


Multistakeholder - you have dedication and commitment to our customers, shareholders, employees and families and local communities.
Mindful - you seek to be respectful, an active listener and to pay attention to detail.
Driven by Excellence - you are driven by our mission and our passion for customer success which means you relentlessly pursue excellence, that you do not tolerate mediocrity and you work intensely to achieve your goals.
High Integrity - you seek open and honest communication, and you hold yourself to very high moral and ethical standards. You reject manipulation, dishonesty and intolerance.


Here is our team hierarchy for individual contributors:

Principal Software Engineer (V)

Staff Software Engineer (IV)

Senior Software Engineer (III)

Software Engineer II

Software Engineer (I)

What you'll be responsible for:

As a Staff Software Engineer on the Circle Platform Services team, you will lead teams technically to build scalable microservices that are responsible for reliable and secure APIs that transfer value & assets across all blockchain protocols (think Bitcoin and Ethereum, for example) as well as traditional banking protocols (think credit cards, bank transfers etc).

What you'll work on:


Challenging (and fun!) problems centered around digital currencies & their adoption. Did we mention that Circle launched a "programmable dollar" called USD Coin (or USDC)?
Collaborating with our Product and Engineering teams to design, develop, test and ship phenomenal Circle features
Building publicly accessible APIs that make it simple for developers to integrate with complex payment systems.
Integrating Platform Services with leading banks & financial technologies to allow an ever greater number of Circle customers access to fast, secure & low cost payment channels.
Writing the infrastructure to deliver great payment experiences, including data sources (SQL or NoSQL), messaging systems and APIs
Extending Circle's in-house blockchain systems infrastructure to support the tokenization of the world.


What you'll bring to Circle (not all required):


7+ years of professional software development experience in object oriented languages like Java and Go.
Led teams technically on architecture and system design.
Expert in one of the domains of API design, payments processing, risk/fraud detection, data engineering, machine learning, or blockchains.
Experience with payment systems like credit cards and bank transfers
Deep understanding of API design and REST principles
Deep Experience with cloud services (AWS, Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure, etc)
Experience with container orchestration systems like Kubernetes or EKS, ECS
Deep Experience with SQL databases and designing schemas
Deep Experience in the deployment of production-quality, scalable software
Deep focus on coding standards and code quality -- a desire to have great test coverage to enable continuous delivery
Excellent communication skills, able to collaborate with remote teams, share ideas and present concepts effectively
Self-starter, you enjoy moving at a fast pace, shipping software that improves the user experience and constantly improving your work with little supervision


We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at Circle. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

title: Manager, Client Services
description:
The Role

The RepTrak Company is the world's leading provider of reputation measurement, research, and consulting services. Across the globe, hundreds of the world's leading companies leverage our RepTrak¬Æ methodology for measuring and managing reputation. We work closely with organizations' Chief Communication Officers and Chief Marketing Officers as well as professionals in specialized areas such as risk and reputation management, corporate communications, and Public Affairs.

You will work closely with our Vice President, Client Services to deliver high-quality Reputation focused guidance. You will be instrumental as clients will come to rely on you as their main point of contact.

This role will be at the Quadro level

Responsibilities Include

The main function of the role is to work alongside our Client Services Director to deliver high quality Reputation focused guidance. Specifically;

Client delivery and revenue growth from existing clients:
Act as the lead on a portfolio of Clients, and work alongside a Client Services Director on a number of our larger clients
Creating and developing client facing content before, during and after Client deliveries and workshops
Guiding our clients in the areas of Brand and Reputation, Corporate Communications efficacy, Reputation Risk, ESG, Stakeholder profiling and prioritization
Develop and utilize industry sector expertise
Analysing our market leading database of Company Reputations to identify patterns, themes and trends that can influence our analysis, insight and thought leadership
Identifying expansion opportunities within existing clients and work with Client Service Directors and Strategic Account Managers to position additional services to meet identified client needs.
Growing long-term client relationships based on client satisfaction that renew/upsell consistently.
Knowing our clients best by contributing to our ongoing drive for knowledge about our client's businesses, markets and industries



Professional Qualifications

5+years of experience within strategy, market insights or branding/communication is preferred.
Proven expertise in turning data into an insightful story.
Proven track record to positively impact client outcomes and ability to influence clients.
Excellent verbal and written communication with internal/external clients using logical reasoning and problem-solving skills.
Proven ability to develop strong relationships that drive internal/external customer satisfaction.
Ability to develop an expert level command of reputation management concepts including corporate communications, stakeholder management, messaging campaign management, press relations, investor relations, marketing alignment and corporate social responsibility, HR and change management
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Social Sciences or related field desired, Masters preferred.
Fluent in English is a requrement



About Us

The RepTrak Company‚Ñ¢ is the world's leading reputation data and insights company. We provide the only global platform for data-driven insights on Reputation, Brand, and ESG. Our proprietary RepTrak¬Æ model is the global standard for measuring and analyzing the sentiment of the world using proven data science models and machine learning techniques across industries and geographies.

Subscribers to the RepTrak¬Æ Program use our predictive insights to protect business value, improve return on investment, and increase their positive impact on society. Established in 2004, The RepTrak Company owns the world's largest reputation benchmarking database of over 1 million company ratings per year used by CEOs, boards, and executives in more than 60 countries worldwide.

For more information about the firm, please visit our website at https://www.reptrak.com/

title: Senior Technical Staff - Architect
description:
Company Description

Microchip Technology Inc. is a leading provider of embedded control applications. Our product portfolio comprises general purpose and specialized 8-bit, 16-bit, and 32-bit microcontrollers, 32-bit microprocessors, field-programmable gate array (FPGA) products, a broad spectrum of high-performance linear, mixed-signal, power management, thermal management, radio frequency (RF), timing, safety, security, wired connectivity and wireless connectivity devices, as well as serial Electrically Erasable Programmable Read Only Memory (EEPROM), Serial Flash memories, Parallel Flash memories, and serial Static Random Access Memory (SRAM). We also license Flash-IP solutions that are incorporated in a broad range of products.

Job Description

The Data Center Solutions Business Unit is responsible for building board and silicon level products for storage, machine learning, and other accelerator applications with Best-in-Class performance and flexibility. As a Sr. Technical Staff Engineer, you will be part of the Flashtech Architecture team that defines future product direction, guides NAND characterization effort and define NAND QOS features.

Data Center Solutions include System on Chip NVMe based flash controllers. The controllers are used in products for the high performance and mainstream segment of the enterprise and data center storage markets.

Our focus is on technical excellence, teamwork, collaboration, and continuous improvement in an open and encouraging environment. We are looking for a candidate with a strong technical background in product development, embedded systems, and storage protocols.

Responsibilities

Provide a technical vision for future product direction.
Propose and specify the high-level features and architecture.
Provide guidance and insight into NAND characterization and operation.

description:
CONSULTING

CONSULTANT/SENIOR CONSULTANT ‚Äì ACTUARIAL AND INSURANCE SOLUTIONS - DANNI

What Impact will you make?

YOUR OPPORTUNITY

Sarai coinvolto nell‚Äôaiutare i leader di mercato nei servizi attuariali alle imprese di assicurazione, che supportiamo nelle iniziative di trasformazione e cambiamento.

Your Responsibilities

Per una piena copertura del tuo ruolo, dovrai in particolare essere in grado di:

Incorporare informazioni finanziarie nella formulazione e valutazione delle opzioni strategiche
Mostrate maturit√† professionale in situazioni complesse e delicate, fungendo da modello per i colleghi junior
Collaborare efficacemente attraverso il Network, al fine di poter fornire soluzioni globali.
Integrare le proposte ai clienti con soluzioni basate su utilizzo di analytics e nuove tecnologie, in collaborazione con i colleghi esperti in materia.

Our Requirements

La ricerca √® rivolta a candidati che abbiano maturato un‚Äôesperienza di almeno 2 anni in ambito attuariale danni, in particolare nelle seguenti aree:

Actuarial modelling su piattaforme di mercato (Prophet, MoSeS)

Technology

About Deloitte

Deloitte offre servizi integrati di Audit, Consulting, Financial Advisory, Risk Advisory, Tax e Legal. Il nostro purpose

Make an impact that matters. Questo √® il nostro obiettivo, e ci√≤ che ci definisce. Si invita a leggere l‚Äôinformativa completa relativa alla descrizione della struttura legale di Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited e delle sue member firm all‚Äôindirizzo www.deloitte.com/about.

Deloitte Italy SpA ("Deloitte Italy") √® la member firm di DTTL in Italia, dove √® presente dal 1923.
